story:
The numbers are appalling. Just here in the US, we generate 250 Million tons of garbage each year or about 5 lb person per day – Yikes! About 6 months ago we came across these beautiful sets of plates, bowls, trays and spoons that are 100% biodegradable and compostable, and have only one single ingredient --- a leaf.  

 

And the idea was born. We have been using them in our personal lives and believe they are a welcome option for everyone when you have a party or a get-together and would prefer using single-use dinnerware.

The facts

  • Most of the waste we generate finds its way to landfill or worse still, the oceans.
  • Over 60 percent of what we put in our landfills is organic waste, such as food scraps. 
  • Decomposing landfills release large amounts of greenhouse gases including methane.
  • Aerobic decomposition from composting produces almost no greenhouse gases.
  • Compost improves soil, adds important nutrients for plants, and reduces the need for expensive commercial fertilizers.

 

 

Our solution

4eSync products are completely natural and made from the leaves of the arecanut tree. The arecanut leaves completely decompose within a period of 50-60 days. There are no colors or any external additives added to make these products giving them a natural look and feel. Water and heat are the only two components used in the production process.

They are microwave safe! You can use these products to heat food in the microwave or store food in the refrigerator. The leaves are washed with fresh water during the production process. They are also heated to temperatures above 90-degree centigrade which ensure that they are completely germ-free.

 

 

The dimensional stability of the product is amazing. It is as light as other disposable plates, such as styrofoam, and nearly as sturdy as melamine or glass. The extra edges of the products make it very comfortable for holding. These qualities make it ideal for a buffet or sit down dining.

Though the material is light, it is 2-3 mm thick which enables it to hold liquids very easily. It can hold liquid items for several hours without affecting its shape. Thus it works for serving soups and foods with sauces which would make other single-use plates soggy. 4eSync leaf plates have all the qualities of a regular plate, but the benefit of being disposable, compostable and biodegradable.

Thanks to progressive communities around the country, composting activities are catching on. Over 198 communities across various states such as CA, WA, OR, CT, IL, MA, KY, and Maryland have adopted food waste and compost collection programs. In SF over 80% of the waste is either recycled or marked for compost.

We provide a viable compostable and biodegradable option for single use dinnerware.

***NO TREES ARE CUT DOWN OR HARMED DURING THE PRODUCTION OF OUR PRODUCTS***

Our products are made from the fallen leaves of arecanut (betel nut) plants.

These products made out of arecanut leaves have better dimensional stability besides being hygienic and are biodegradable. The leaves are collected from arecanut plantations, brought to manufacturing units, cleaned and processed to make high-quality products. No chemical is used in the production process - just the leaf, water & heat.

 

 

With over 40 years of combined experience in product management, across various industries, we are equipped with the knowledge to ensure a steady supply and react quickly to increase in demand.

Visit www.4esync.com for more details.

Risks and challenges

As with any production, the primary challenge here is the possibility of delays. Since the products are made in India there is the additional challenge of accounting for the delivery time

However, since we anticipate these products to be in high demand, we will be planning for some safety inventory as well as tight coordination with our partners. We plan on having multiple purchase orders open with scheduled delivery times. We also anticipate carrying about one month of inventory at the minimum. With these checks and balance in place, we seek to ameliorate the risk.

story: We live in the Scotch Highland  and run our own farm. We produce perfect honey with our new design beehive. We are now introducing our lovely honey with the pride from Scotch highland.

story:
What's it all about? 

I'm Jason, an eco-conscious entrepreneurs concerned with a couple of things: Making great beer, and helping to save the planet, starting with our little friends the bees. We're crowdfunding so we can hit the ground running. 

We are a super eco-friendly beer company looking to launch our first product called The Pollinator. A 5% highly sessionable pilsner lager brewed in Essex, UK. It has a complex and balanced bitter finish and a crisp clean taste. It's vegan and our whole ethos is around sustainability and providing pragmatic solutions with our business, starting with our wildflower packaging. Our wildflower coasters literally grow a habitat for bees, butterflies and other insects, and each time you plant them you can get money off your next order with us (more on that later). Our aim is to grow 1 million square meters of wildflower space to help save our bees and have a real impact on these eco-systems. 97% of all wildflower habitats have disappeared since WW2 and we want to directly change that. 

We are crowdfunding to get our project off the grand and gauge consumer interest. Think of us like fair trade coffee, sure you can drink someone else's beer, but what are they doing for the planet? We'd love you to be a part of our journey to make a positive change. 

Our perks 

We are pre-ordering our first full scale batch of beer. We are asking for £50,000 so we can start out business, the minimum we need to produce the contracted brew itself is much lower but obviously we would like to raise this amount or far more in order to fulfil our commitments. We give 10% of our profits to bee saving charities and to have a wider impact on our causes we'd obviously like to produce lots of beer! 

The perks are literally vouchers to pre-order our beer, there's no prototyping or fear of you not being able to get this beer for your money, and range from £5 - £100 so anyone can try our beer and see our packaging concept for themselves. 

If the whole goal is not reached we can supply our backers with beer no problem, but we'd obviously like to spread our message far and wide, which is why we picked indiegogo and the crowdfunding route. 

By backing our campaign you are advocating for these causes and supporting a small business truly trying to change how they operate from the very beginning. We want to build a business on the basis of our ethics. For instance there are several mainstream beer brands that are vegan, but they don't promote. We want to promote these things and they are at the heart of everything we do. 

Risks & Challenges

In terms of challenges for our crowdfund, we don't really have any, we would just like you to be a part of our journey and be our first customers. We have grand ambitions and would like to affect our charitable and environmental concerns by expanding more rapidly than traditional craft beer entities. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support us by purchasing one of our redeemable vouchers then fear not! You can still help us and our beer loving eco-friendly mission! Please share this post on your social media, and get in touch about how you can help. Maybe you don't have much money but if you have some followers we may be interested in sending you a sample! Just get in touch and we will see if we can help you, as helping you is helping us! Please use the indiegogo share tools to get the word out!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ryan, co-owner of Juice for Joy Oklahoma City and I am seeking to raise funds to help get us kickstarted after COVID-19 setbacks! For now, it is just myself and the owner of the company, my best friend, Benoris. We are an Oklahoma City based, raw, cold-pressed juice company! Since 2018, Benoris has been deeply inspired by juicing and knew when he first started that he would find a way to build his own company. He's been motivated since then to figure out how to make his dreams come true. In March 2020, we were on the brink of beginning the journey together - only to have our course change due to COVID-19. Now we're back and more motivated to prosper than EVER!

More About The Owners:

Oklahoma City born and raised - our lives lead us to a passion for cold-pressed juice and healthy living! Since a young age we've both had a strong desire to help others - from our families to people of all walks of life. Ryan has an extensive background in Customer Service and has a Holistic Health Certification. Ben has a background in Horticulture and is almost done with his Associates in Biology! They both met in early 2019 and with their passion for healthy living, this dream started to become a reality!

What We Need and What You Get:

We are seeking $8,000 for several things we will need to officially open our business.

In March 2020, we were on the brink of beginning, only to have the United States declare a state of emergency due to the COVID-19 pandemic. All of our efforts were halted. Since then, things have been difficult at times but we haven't taken our thinking caps off! We have a couple of pending partnerships with successful businesses in the Oklahoma City area. This money will go towards a couple things, including: a commercial fridge, part of our first month's rent, product labelling, equipment, manufacturers licensing.

For providing us with this help, we're offering two gifts, including:

- a Juice for Joy logo sticker 

- if you are local, a Juice "Sample Pack", consisting of our four signature juices in 8 ounce bottles! 

*PLEASE REACH OUT IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN BEING A PRIVATE INVESTOR! 

What This Means To Us

 

This company means the world to us. We each began our own health journey several years before we met and we can each say that these experiences have changed our lives in an unimaginable way! Cold-pressed juice was the CORNERSTONE of the vibrancy we now feel and we want nothing more than to share this joy with the WORLD, hence the name, "Juice for Joy". Long term we wish to have our juice distributed in stores and restaurants all over Oklahoma. "Health and Wellness" is something that many Oklahomans (including ourselves) weren't all too keen on and the community is growing day by day. As well as the vegan community in the Oklahoma City metro area!

Risks & Challenges

We have done everything we possibly can to get ourselves set up for success. We have talked with our health department multiple times and with the items we are seeking funding for, we truly can't see much of ANYTHING else stopping our momentum! The biggest challenge for us has been financial - due to us both being laid off from our day jobs due to COVID-19 earlier this year. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share with your friends and family! A simple share could reach another person who respects and believes in our journey, and that alone means the world to us. If you have read this far, you are an angel!! Please visit our website at www.juiceforjoyokc.com!

MUCH LOVE,

Ryan Massad and Benoris Green

story:
The Goal of this Campaign

The reason for this campaign is to raise the funds we need to take MannaBrew to the United States and make this a global project by scaling the awareness, demand, and production of MannaBrew. 

We want to scale up hard and fast, in order to broaden the reach of the positive impact MannaBrew has in its various stages to as many people as possible. This includes creating jobs, having a positive impact on the environment, and helping more people make healthy choices. 

In the end, it is not about how many units have been sold, but how many lives have been changed for the better - that's why we are here. 

 

 

 

 

MannaBrew: The mesquite superfood coffee that's changing the lives of everyone involved. 

We're not another coffee brand trying to convince you that our coffee is the best, because this is NOT coffee in the traditional sense.

MannaBrew is, in fact, made from a superfood known as Mesquite, roasted in almost the same way as coffee. 

So you still get to enjoy a cup of rich, smooth, delicious dark liquid - but it is unlike anything that you have ever tasted before.

To summarise... It looks like coffee, can be brewed by the same methods as coffee, enjoyed the same way coffee would be, but it is a superfood and tastes super good!

"As an avid coffee addict -this is possibly one of the most palatable beverages." - Joy
 

What exactly is "mesquite"? 

Quite simply, mesquite is a type of thorn tree. It bears its "fruit" in the shape of a long, pod-shaped legume. These legumes are what we use to craft the delicious beverage called MannaBrew. BUT the Mesquite tree is an invasive species in South Africa and is using up precious resources on our farmlands!

 

The story of MannaBrew 

We like to break the story behind Mannabrew into four parts, and it goes a little something like this...

1. Harvesting: Wild Harvested

The Mesquite tree is one of the hardiest trees on earth. Its roots can grow up to 50 meters, seeking precious water in desert areas.

As an invasive species in South Africa, it can cause havoc when it takes over precious farmland.

Once a year, in the scorching summer months, the beans are ready to be collected and the harvesters must work fast before the animals eat these nutritious fruits.


​The poorest of the poor within this community get the opportunity to collect the beans which we purchase from them according to the weight they have collected. This helps to provide them with seasonal work and supports their local economy.

These trees only grow in the wild and are not cultivated, farmed, or nurtured in any way.

 

2. Processing: Slow Roasted

Processing the beans is quite a challenge… We first have to clean them, and then they are slow-roasted in a specialized oven at exact temperatures to get the perfect roast.

The roasted beans are milled in two stages, with specially made grinders, and then blended to get the right consistency in order to be used in as many different coffee-brewing devices as possible.

 

3. Packaging: Sustainable & Effective

 

The blended Mesquite Coffee is packed in specially made bags that are designed from fully recyclable materials.

MannaBrew has a stated shelf life of 24 months, although it has been tested for up to 48 months, after which it still retains its freshness, flavor, taste, and utility when stored correctly. 

Unlike coffee, it does not oxidize and lose its flavor over time. This means that it can be kept for much longer - although we doubt that would be the case once you have tasted how delicious it is!

 

4. The Final Product: Flavor-Rich & Delicious Mesquite Coffee

The slow roasting process brings out the natural sweetness and unique flavors of this superfood from nature.

The Mesquite Coffee has no caffeine, but the essential sugars from the Mesquite beans are known to energize and uplift, similar to caffeinated coffee, but without the negative side effects.

Also, MannaBrew will not cause acidity in the body, nor acid reflux.

The Mesquite beans are hand-selected in the wild to secure consistent flavor, batch after batch.

Once you have tasted the amazing flavor MannaBrew offers, everything else may taste a bit bland in comparison.

Love it! You can taste the goodness of this superfood coffee straight away!! Remember it’s stronger tasting than usual coffee, so halve your coffee to water ratio, add a dash of milk, and no sweetener necessary as it’s naturally sweet!! - Lize-Marié

 

 

 

 

 

 

I’m a huge cappuccino fan. So when I was first introduced to this new product called MannaBrew, I was highly skeptical! After the second sip, I was SOLD! The Smoothness, the creaminess, out of this world! Furthermore, it’s HEALTHY!!!! - Lyn

 

 

Get in touch with us:

Website:

www.mannabrew.com

Telephone: 

+27 218 528 446 

Email:

info@mannabrew.com

Physical Address in South Africa:

Dune Foods (Pty) Ltd,

ASLA Business Park, Unit 20 Meerlust Park

Hazelden Drive, Somerset West, 7130
South Africa

Address in the US:

Dune Foods Corp. (USA)

108 West 13th Street, Wilmington, Delaware, 19801

United States of America

 

Thank you for the support and we are excited to have you along for the journey!

With warm regards,

The MannaBrew Team

(USA)108 West 13th Street, Wilmington, Delaware, 19801United States of America 
Thank you for the support and we are excited to have you along for the journey!
With warm regards,
The MannaBrew Team

story:
Short Summary 

My Name is Raymond and I am a Namibian Refugee in the United Kingdom, I've been an asylum seeker since 2016 and received my refugee status 2020. I am a collage trained chef an entrepreneur and a business degree student at the University of London Birkbeck. 

Culinary arts training, coupled with 12 years cooking experience and loads of passion, I have the opportunity to launch my Namibian street food business, the first of its kind in the United Kingdom. Through various migrant help entrepreneur support organisations, i was able to build and test my product. I entered a cooking competition and won, the prize is a free stall in a renowned high end street (40 stalled) food market with traffic of 50 000 people a week. For 3 months I have the opportunity to run/trial my business in this market (and else ware) for free (0% commission to the market). In the next 3 years I would like to replicate this street food stall in three different markets around London and continue through out the country!

All I need is saving grace to get the most essential cooking equipment, transportation, stall branding, salaries for 2 people for 1 month and start up stock. These things will not only enable me to successfully launch my business but change my story. Coming from a family of 15 transitioning form Africa to Europe as a refugee, getting an education, surviving, all this has culminated to end of 2021 when my destiny will change and my struggling story rewritten. for this to happen I NEED YOUR HELP!

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Below is my Business Start-up checklist where most of the money will go: 

Company Registration Kapanna: Done 

Council Registration: Done

  (looking at renting a community kitchen for production) 

Level 2 Food Hygiene Certificate : Done

Health and safety Certificate: Done

Food Allergen Certificate: Done 

 First Aid fire safety and Level 2 (mandatory training): Done 

HACCP -(explaining hazards):Done 

Allergens information sheet: Done

Employment contract 3 months and casual

Business Bank Account/payment system cashier box: Done (account open)

Business Plan/Model finance plan: Done

Branding/Logo/Banners/business cards: Done (logo only)

Stall Branding

All insurance

Grill Brush

Basting Brush

Spatula

Gastronom 1/1 200mm

Gastronom 1/9 100mm

Kitchen premium megamix power Blender

 Basket 2x5Ltr Countertop Fryer 2x2.8kW

Mixing bowls 4.8l

Kitchen chef Knives 

Chopping boards 455(L) x 305(W) x 12(H)mm | HDPE set

Peeler

Chest Freezer - 290L

346l Upright Display Fridge

skimmer Spider 6

Grader

Commercial Stand mixer

Vacuum bags

Large Foil

 containers 11L

Food Stocks:

Car/Small van

Insurance 

Road tax

Fuel

 

Risks & Challenges

For the First 3 months all income i will generate minus the salaries and stock replenishment will be profit, so the risk is really low for losses.

I will have free treats at my stall to drive and do allot of social media campaines to drive traffic to my stall. I also will have small brochure to tell my story the origin of the food recipes and a background of where I'm from, keeping people engaged.

Every Morning we will shoot a video as we light the fire for the braai and start the food preparation, this will be posted on all our social media platforms to allow our customers to be part of the whole food process. This makes Kapanna more than food, it makes it an EXPERIENCE. all this will help reduce the risk of most people going to the other 39 stalls and not ours.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share my campaign.
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary 
My Name is Raymond and I am a Namibian Refugee in the United Kingdom, I've been an asylum seeker since 2016 and received my refugee status 2020. I am a collage trained chef an entrepreneur and a business degree student at the University of London Birkbeck. 
Culinary arts training, coupled with 12 years cooking experience and loads of passion, I have the opportunity to launch my Namibian street food business, the first of its kind in the United Kingdom. Through various migrant help entrepreneur support organisations, i was able to build and test my product. I entered a cooking competition and won, the prize is a free stall in a renowned high end street (40 stalled) food market with traffic of 50 000 people a week. For 3 months I have the opportunity to run/trial my business in this market (and else ware) for free (0% commission to the market). In the next 3 years I would like to replicate this street food stall in three different markets around London and continue through out the country!
All I need is saving grace to get the most essential cooking equipment, transportation, stall branding, salaries for 2 people for 1 month and start up stock. These things will not only enable me to successfully launch my business but change my story. Coming from a family of 15 transitioning form Africa to Europe as a refugee, getting an education, surviving, all this has culminated to end of 2021 when my destiny will change and my struggling story rewritten. for this to happen I NEED YOUR HELP!

story:
We've discovered the fountain of youth and now we’re taking on the sugary, chemical-laced energy drinks and sodas. 

  • Pledge $5 or pledge $500 dollars (any amount will help).
  • Be a part of the revolution. Help us bring this product to market.
  • We want to make a great product — and we also want to be good to the planet and the people around us.
  • That means using organic ingredients, sustainable harvesting, and fair-trade farming.
  • Let’s take care of our planet!

IT'S TIME FOR A NEW GENERATION OF ENERGY DRINKS.

Our team started LET'S GET GOOD! with the mutual dream that we can create a new generation of healthy beverages. We wanted something better than what we were seeing in the local grocery stores. With our team from South America, we were lucky enough to be introduced to the Maqui Berry. It’s also known as the Patagonian Superfruit — sustainably harvested and blended with our other amazing ingredients. Our sparkling antioxidant beverage will be low calorie, low sugar and use the highest quality ingredients. Yum!

A FOUNTAIN OF YOUTH

In our journey to find the best functional ingredients, we were introduced to the Patagonian Superfruit – Maqui Berry. The Maqui Berry is considered to be a “modern day fountain of youth” because of the high level of antioxidants the berries carry. The berries are also rich in minerals, B-vitamins, high in fiber, very high in protein, and contain a potent amount of Omega-3, Omega-6, and Omega-9 fatty acids. And, if that’s not enough, they also contain a high level of vitamin C, along with a plethora of other powerful nutrients that naturally help boost our immune systems and reduce inflammation.

  • It's time for a new generation of functional organic beverages. Sure there's already some out there — but they taste horrible and the ingredients are not clean.
  • Our team is comprised of beverage industry pros and millennial entrepreneurs. 
  • We intend to bring our unique formulation and superior flavors to a store near you.
  • As a contributor, you can make a difference. You can help us choose our flavors, weigh in on our packaging design, and collaborate with our founders. You can be a part of our movement.
  • It’s up to you to help this young group of passionate “makers” create a new product for a new generation.

“Our brand is already established in South America. Now it’s time to bring it to California — and beyond.”

– Mauricio De Pablo, Co-Founder - LET’S GET GOOD!  

THE EXPERIENCE AND THE PASSION:

Our team has the passion, skills, and determination to make this brand a reality. We want to raise a million dollars in order to purchase our first batch of product and get it into the retail distribution channels.

The funds that we generate will allow us to order our first production batch — and continue our growth, enabling our team to build our dream. Help us reach our goal. Join our growing team of enthusiastic supporters. Be a part of the action and get in on some of the first production run (and get a t-shirt too!).

YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL MAKE AN IMPACT

  • We’re just getting started and you will be a part of this critical moment in our company history.
  • Let’s come together to create a better tasting, healthier alternative to all of the crappy energy drinks, sodas and nasty tasting so-called healthy energy drinks.
  • Our team is comprised of beverage industry veterans who have had success launching juices, beers, sodas, teas, coffees, and liquor for some of the biggest brands in the world.
  • We decided it was time to launch our own brand – but we need your help.
  • Check our Facebook page for Special Secret Perks! These are limited edition perks so don't hesitate — they will be gone soon.

“I went to college in Santa Cruz to study organic farming, I also worked on a farm in Hawaii and worked in Napa making wine. To prepare for our launch, I studied mixology and started mixing ingredients in the kitchen. I studied other brands, researched the best ingredients and crafted the best flavors — using things like ginger, limes, lemons, blood oranges and maqui berries.”

– Jackson Patrick, Chief Tastemaker/Mixologist - LET’S GET GOOD!

Risks & Challenges

Let’s be honest, it’s not easy to start a beverage company. LET'S GET GOOD! is already an established brand in Chile and Argentina but has not cracked the US market yet. We’ll be competing against some established brands and some organic energy drinks that already have a head start. We know it’s going to be a struggle but we’re willing to work hard and be relentless in our pursuit of greatness…

THIS AIN’T OUR FIRST RODEO!

  • Our veteran team has been in the business for 20+ years. We’ve seen a lot of concepts come and go and we’ve been involved in some doozies.
  • Our integrated team includes beverage manufacturing, distribution and marketing experts – as well as a veteran financial executive to guide us on this journey.
  • We already have a solid track record with our juices in South America.

“We want to make a great product but we also want to be good to the planet and the people around us. That means using organic ingredients, sustainable harvesting, and fair-trade farming. We’re also helping take care of our rivers and streams so we’ll have clean beaches to surf at.”

– Hayden Miller, Lead Brand Ambassador - LET’S GET GOOD!

IT’S OKAY IF YOU CAN’T PITCH IN RIGHT NOW, BUT WE VALUE YOUR INPUT:

Maybe you can help us get the word out — make some noise on social media about our campaign. Tell us what ingredients and flavors you would like to see.

There’s a lot of ways to amplify our cause including using Indiegogo’s share tools!

“Help us raise enough money to get our first batch of LET’S GET GOOD! Organic Energy produced. We’re excited to bring it to store near you. Pledge $5 or pledge $500. Any amount will help. Help us bring this product to market.”

- Jorge Saud, Co-Founder - LET’S GET GOOD!

About the Company

Let’s Get Good! Is already established in Chile and Argentina as a premium juice brand. We launched in 2015 and have had great success with our products. We stand out because our juice is the highest quality and our name, identity, and packaging tell our story – we are all about being good to each other, our partners, and the planet.

We are launching three flavors of Organic Energy drinks into California in 2017. These will be 12-ounce slim cans, using our unique hand-crafted flavors and proprietary flavors. Our team in California are authentic artisans who understand how to create great tasting beverages for a new generation. We look forward to meeting you and sharing our vision for making the world a better place. LET'S GET GOOD!

 

The Team

JACKSON PATRICK - CHIEF TASTEMAKER/MIXOLOGIST

Jackson has a degree in organic farming and has been working in the wine industry - learning how to make wine. He has also studied mixology, gaining knowledge around unique taste profiles, original recipes, and clever flavor combinations. Along with surfing and music, Jackson and his family have a long history in "making cool stuff".

HUNTER PATRICK, ROSS PATRICK - MARKETING & DESIGN

Ross and Hunter Patrick are the perfect father-son duo in the design world. Ross has been in the business for 30 years, starting his career at Nike and Capitol Records. He's worked with some of the largest beverage brands in the world, from Anheuser-Busch to Starbucks. Ross created the original LET'S GET GOOD! brand name and packaging for the South American juice company. Hunter has been designing snowboards, skateboards, and apparel for one of the hottest brands in the industry. 

HAYDEN MILLER – ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT MANAGER

Hayden studied human-environment relations, sustainable development, and natural resource management at Sonoma State University. As a recent graduate, Hayden will be leading our environmental impact efforts. He will be traveling to South America and engaging with the farmers and their communities to ensure that our growing and harvesting methods are creating sustainable results for the people and the environment.

JORGE, MAURICIO AND JUAN CARLOS - SALES & DISTRIBUTION TEAM 

Jorge Saud, Mauricio De Pablo and Juan Carlos Ladevig have been running a successful beverage company in Santiago, Chile for the past 5 years. They have been importing juice and almond milk into Chile and Argentina. Last year they launched their own brand: LET'S GET GOOD! and have the passion and the smarts to make the brand successful here.

PIERRE GALLANT - FINANCE

Pierre Gallant is a veteran financial consultant with numerous start-ups under his belt. He has successfully bought and sold over a dozen companies, creating vast wealth and lasting value for his shareholders. This expertise is at our disposal and will guide us through the many challenges faced by a start-up brand.

MORE ABOUT OUR AMAZING INGREDIENTS

Maqui Berry - contains the highest level of antioxidants amongst all fruits. It has a whopping ORAC score (anti-oxidant value) of approximately 27,600 per 100mg compared to Acai's 16,700. The antioxidants contained in this berry combat free radicals. Maqui berries are also an excellent source of vitamin c, calcium, potassium, and iron. They are sustainably harvested from the Patagonian rain forest in Chile.

Acai Berry – our sustainably harvested acai is a low-sugar energy boost which contains minerals that help aid muscle activity and regeneration. The berry is loaded with antioxidants that fight free-radical molecules.  Acai also contains Omega-6 and Omega-9 fatty acids as well as excellent amounts of iron, calcium, fiber, and Vitamin A. 

Green tea is also a great source of antioxidants that support immune function, cardiovascular health — oh yeah, and fat loss.

Ginseng has traditionally been taken in order to aid a number of medical conditions. Ginseng may help with stimulating physical and mental activity if you're feeling tired. It may also improve your thinking ability and cognition.

Yerba Mate is a traditional drink made from the dried leaves of the evergreen holly, a native plant of South America. Our good friend and co-founder Jorge is from Argentina where Yerba Mate is the national drink. It’s well known for providing a clean energy boost that’s been described as gentle and calm. Enthusiasts say they experience a state of alert wakefulness similar to that of coffee, but without coffee’s jittery side effects.

B Vitamins are vital nutrients involved in everything from cognitive function and mood, to energy production and heart health. Vitamin B12 is an amazing energy booster, it burns fats and carbs for energy, forms healthy red-blood cells, and reduces stress.

WHY ORGANIC? Organic certification requires that farmers and handlers document their processes and get inspected every year. Organic on-site inspections account for every component of the operation, including, but not limited to, seed sources, soil conditions, crop health, weed and pest management, water systems, inputs, contamination and commingling risks and prevention, and record-keeping. Tracing organic products from start to finish is part of the USDA organic promise.

WHAT IS FAIR TRADE? Quality Products. Improving Lives. Protecting the Planet. Fair Trade Certified™ products were made with respect to people and planet. Our rigorous social, environmental and economic standards work to promote safe, healthy working conditions, protect the environment, enable transparency, and empower communities to build strong, thriving businesses. When you choose products with the Fair Trade label, your day-to-day purchases can improve an entire community’s day-to-day lives.

WHAT IS SUSTAINABLE AGRICULTURE? The goal of sustainable agriculture is to meet society’s food and textile needs in the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs. Practitioners of sustainable agriculture seek to integrate three main objectives into their work: a healthy environment, economic profitability, and social and economic equity. Every person involved in the food system—growers, food processors, distributors, retailers, consumers, and waste managers—can play a role in ensuring a sustainable agricultural system.

OUR INGREDIENTS

Serving Size 12 fl. oz. Servings Per Container = 1

Calories 50, Carbohydrate 12g, Sugars 10g, Vitamin B-complex, C, D, E

Natural Caffeine 85mg per serving

Contains: Filtered carbonated water, organic stevia and organic agave nectar sweetener, organic ginseng, natural flavors, citric acid, orange juice concentrate, organic yerba mate, natural green tea extract, malic acid, ascorbic acid, sodium citrate. No artificial preservatives

© Lets Get Good LLC, All Rights Reserved.

Servings Per Container = 1Calories 50, Carbohydrate 12g, Sugars 10g, Vitamin B-complex, C, D, ENatural Caffeine 85mg per servingContains: Filtered carbonated water, organic stevia and organic agave nectar sweetener, organic ginseng, natural flavors, citric acid, orange juice concentrate, organic yerba mate, natural green tea extract, malic acid, ascorbic acid, sodium citrate. No artificial preservatives© Lets Get Good LLC, All Rights Reserved.

story:
Born into a family of winemakers and wine-lovers, and a fan of Game of Thrones, Thibault Bardet dreamt of drinking the wine from his favourite series. 

He set about researching how to make wines that would have the same flavours and characteristics those served in Game of Thrones. He began by gathering every reference to the style of wine drunk in the series and books, then he worked with his father to recreate them.

Starting in 2016, Thibault experimented and tasted many different blends and techniques to get exactly the right flavours and aromas. He sourced glass bottles of an authentic shape and colour and worked to get just the right label design. With your help the wines can be bottled and delivered to you during the 7th season.

There are two cuvees, ‘Dornish Wine’ and ’The Imp’s Delight'. Both are produced by the Bardet family at Vignobles Bardet in the world-famous Saint-Emilion region and Bordeaux area, France. The majority of the grappes will be Merlot.

'Dornish Wine' offers flavors of fruits. It aims to resemble the style and flavours of the wine drunk in the series and the book as closely as possible. 

'The Imp’s Delight' goes one step further. This is ’natural wine' made using highly traditional winemaking techniques and with no added sulphur, to give a truly authentic representation of the wines that would have been drunk in the Game of Thrones era. 

The Bardet family has produced world-class wine for generations, owning several chateaux in Bordeaux, France. Find out more about Vignobles Bardet.

 

 

Making wine is an expensive business. Although the family possesses state-of-the-art facilities and the expertise to produce the wines, we need support and investment for the final, costliest stage of the project: ramping up production and purchasing all the materials necessary to bottle and package the wines. 

We need your support so that we can afford to buy barrels, bottles and wax. We also need to purchase and print labels and boxes so that we can ship you the 1000 bottles we are aiming for to make the project sustainable.

With your help all of us can enjoy the 7th season of Game of Thrones while tasting wines created in its honour.

 

Transporting natural wines long distances is a complex business. Taxmen and legal systems around imports and exports also make our lives more difficult. Therefore, we can only guarantee delivery to the following regions:

France - Europe.

 

However, if demand is strong, we will do everything we can to create distribution channels to other regions. If you live in other parts of the world, we urge you to express your support by choosing reward options 1 and 2, which do not include bottles of wine.

 

Last but not least, thank you for taking the time to read about our adventure. Please share the page and tell everyone you know about what we’re doing!

story:
My name is Waleed Shamsid-Deen and I am the President of Supreme Burger.   Over the last year, my partners “Team Supreme” and I have launched a new concept entitled Supreme Burger.  Supreme Burger is a Halal gourmet burger concept which focuses on preparing the best burger experience with awesome customer service in a clean and friendly environment.  
Since opening we have experienced a number of challenges, from hiring great people to covering short term operating expenses.  We realize that it takes a community to build a business and we are inviting you to be a part of ours.  We have partnered with the schools, department of corrections, county offices, neighborhood associations and religious institutes to share our vision for creating businesses in our community.  We have hired students and even employed people who were homeless at the time. We consider ourselves and our business to be a community staple and an advocate for entrepreneurship.  


Despite our challenges, and the plight of a small business entrepreneurs, we are committed to building a global franchise company.  


This campaign is designed to support us in achieving several goals. From identifying the much-needed operating capital, to completing renovations of our flagship location.


You all are assisting us in developing a new franchise company and supporting our efforts to position ourselves for growth and expansion all the while supporting the urban community!  

What We Need
Operations – Working capital to support basic day-to-day operations, to meet the start-up capital needs of a small business, to assist in marketing and advertising to build our sales!

Training – Create programs to support the appropriate training to bring the best service to our customers and life skills to our employees.


Renovation and Expansion Capital – Improve the customer experience by renovating our existing location and create more jobs by launching a second Metro-Atlanta location 

What We Do
Hire second chancers– providing an outlet for those less fortunate to begin a path for job opportunities which lead to business management and possibly ownership

Provide a "Pathway to Ownership" - provide a pathway for ownership for individuals to franchise Supreme Burger and bring it into their own communities 


Create Real Opportunities for those less fortunate – Over the last year, we have hired five ladies from the transition center, several young men recently released from prison for committing nonviolent crimes and a number of youth from local schools.  We are not just a business, we are a business that cares about our community and gives second chances for those who are trying to get back on their feet. We consider our employees to be part of the family and push them to be the best they can. 


The Impact
Job Creation 

Opportunities for our youth, young adults and single moms

Working towards business ownerships and entrepreneurship

Other Ways You Can Help
Eat Supreme – stop by our Decatur location today and try one of our burgers.  We have several specialty burgers to choose from.   Have a party or order catering!  Invite Supreme Burger to feed your office.  We have burgers for everyone: Beef, Lamb, Turkey, Salmon, Vegan & Veggie!

Think Supreme - Share the word  - Post your support and share on all of your platforms.  Ask others to promote and make a donation.  Stop by in groups and take a photo in front of our step-n-repeat!


Live Supreme - Invest in a franchise - Looking to be an owner?  Inquire about opening a Supreme Burger in your community.  Ask about financing opportunities through banks that work with the SBA.

story:
My name is Chibuike Wogu, the managing director of Carl Commodities Nigeria Limited.

I am passionate about processing agricultural products into edible snacks. So for the past five years, I have been working hard to setup a peanut snack processing factory that will process raw peanuts into edible peanut snack.

I strongly believe that achieving my goal of setting up a peanut snack processing factory will be of a great benefit not just to me as an individual and the satisfaction that comes with achieving a set goal but also to the peasant Nigerian farmer who will find market for his farm produce and the jobs my business venture will create for unemployed Nigerians.

Through self-funding, I have successfully purchased the complete set of peanut snack machines production line. My efforts so far serves as a demonstration of my commitment to this project.

Due to the erratic power supply in my location, Lagos Nigeria, I will purchase a 60 KVA power generator set in order to generate reliable electricity to power the machines in the factory for production.

At this stage in the factory setup, I am reaching out to my community of friends and colleagues for financial support to enable me purchase a 60 KVA power generator set, a product distribution van and to print the products packaging materials.

When fully setup, the factory will create five jobs which will be scaled up as I grow the business.

I greatly appreciate your donations to this project and your support in sharing my fundraising campaign on social media using the Indiegogo share tools as I hope to raise $20,000 needed to fully setup my peanut snack processing factory.

To donate to this project, simply click on the red BACK IT button on our crowdfunding page and donate any amount that you want.

Thank you for your support and donations.

Product Label

story:
Here are more details about the incredible products you will receive when you purchase your KeysStrong Crate.      

 

  

Key West Whiskey Glasses: These modern whiskey tumblers with our etched Key West Smuggler Co. logo are sure to make an impression whenever you are serving Key West Bourbon Whiskey!

 

Media Coverage

 

THE STORY BEHIND KEY WEST

Key West Smuggler Bourbon Whiskey, or ‘bottled sunshine’ as we like to call it, is a smooth bourbon with an island feel. We use a revolutionary aging process that removes unwanted congeners (materials created from the distilling process that contribute to bad hangovers) for a smooth tasting bourbon with a 4-year aged taste.

 

TERREPURE AGING PROCESS  

Our aging process reduces several known congeners (such as methanol, isobutanol, amyl alcohols, propanol, and free radicals) to a greater degree than any other industry method. In addition to this reduction of congeners, our technology also induces a conversion of certain harsh-tasting acids to smooth-tasting esters (glycerides). This conversion produces a spirit with a much smoother mouth-feel and dramatically enhanced taste and flavor and results in taste and quality levels that would otherwise take 4-6 years.  

 

WHY KEY WEST?

We are based in Key West, Florida because Key West embodies the lifestyle and values that are important to us: relationships with friends, family and neighbors, and the belief that we should all just get along.

 

HURRICANE IRMA ALTERED OUR COURSE

Our houseboat was our home and headquarters, and it was completely destroyed by Hurricane Irma before we even launched our bourbon. Due to the KeysStrong Charity, and the support of the local community, we were able to rebuild and relocate to a small distribution office. 

 

Within six months, Key West Smuggler Bourbon Whiskey won three internationally recognized tasting medals!  

ALL GLASS RECYCLABLE BOTTLE REDUCES THE RISK OF OCEAN BORN PLASTIC

 

Being based in Key West makes us hypersensitive to ocean born plastic pollution. We pick it up on our beaches every day. So our handsome bottles are made from 100% recyclable glass.

 

OUR FUTURE

This campaign, for which we are looking to raise $10k, is important to us on many levels and for many reasons. When Hurricane Irma hit, many homes were lost, destroyed or sunken, including our own. KeysStrong helped us find a temporary home where we could start doing business again, and we have been rebuilding every since. This campaign will allow us to put the money we need towards growing our business and creating a tasting room where we can meet our customers, share stories, provide tastings and make that one-to-one customer connection. Some of the proceeds will also go to support local businesses and artists that are being promoted through the packages you can purchase, and some will go directly to KeysStrong.org to help support the needs of the local community.

 

THE END GOAL

Despite the amount of money raised, if we don't reach our goal the funds will still go toward a physical location for our brand, as well as creating jobs for the community. We feel this is incredibly important for our company to be successful and engage with our customers. We are growing at a rate where a permanent location is necessary to continue to thrive.

Please join us in this One Human Family philosophy. Even if you can't contribute please share this with family, friends and coworkers on any social media platform you have.  Spreading the word would be a wonderful contribution in helping us achieve our goal of finding a permanent 'home' for Key West Smuggler Co.

WHO WE ARE

Jim is a Kentucky-born native determined to bring Kentucky bourbon to Key West, Florida. The Key West Smuggler Company isn’t a big corporation, but a small, community-based business. We are always around, so if you’re in the area, stop by and say hello!

 

 

WHAT IS INCLUDED

In order to accomplish our goals, we need your help. We created a bunch of incredible perks from which to choose!

Simple Life: Crate + 750 ml Bottle

I Drink Alone: Crate + 750 ml Bottle + 1 Etched Bourbon Glass

I'm Outta Here: Crate + 750 ml Bottle + 1 Etched Stainless Flask

An Evening Together: Crate + 750 ml Bottle + 2 Etched Bourbon Glasses

An Evening Together in Style: Crate + 750 ml Bottle + 2 Etched Bourbon Glasses + 2 Tee Shirts

I'm A Local: Crate + 750 ml Bottle + 2 Etched Bourbon Glasses + Salt Scrub + Keez Beez Honey + Piece of Local Art

Let's Party!: Crate + 750 ml Bottle + 2 Etched Bourbon Glasses + 2 Tee Shirts + Salt Scrub + Keez Beez Honey + Piece of Local Art + Flask

 

Per Indiegogo rules, we are selling vouchers for our perks that include alcohol. Please go to our FAQ section to learn more. 

Some states do not allow direct shipment of alcohol. If your state does not allow direct shipment, your voucher will be redeemable at a retailer in your area. Redemption and deliveries are subject to state, local and federal laws. If your voucher is unredeemable for any reason, your total perk purchase will be refunded.

Signature by a recipient over 21 years of age is required upon delivery of alcohol. FedEx includes a $7 fee for signature upon delivery, which we have rolled into your shipping costs here.

Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

story:
Imagine, it's 3 o'clock in the afternoon. You are sitting in the office. You are so sleepy that you can barely open your eyes. You can't wait to collapse on the desk, but wait, there are piles of files that need you to work on. You turn your head toward the old vending machine in the corner. You drink up the whole can of red bull in a gulp. However, you get nothing but a jittery mind.

 

 

You must have suffered from these and so do we. That’s why we want to change the status quo, and that’s why Focuz is created. We want to use our energy tea to improve concentration, lighten anxiety, and eventually, provide a healthy, effective lifestyle.

 

When it comes to energy tea, you may think of energy drink: weird taste, tons of added sugar and chemicals. You are drinking it only because you have to stay awake like a walking dead. You have to stand the jitter and anxiety those energy drinks bring. But no, WE ARE DIFFERENT!

 

Focuz is a healthier, tastier, and effective product compares to traditional “energy drinks". When drinking Focuz, you’ll feel like drinking a homemade lemon mint tea with a smooth, natural taste: that’s because each can of Focuz is delicately made by tea, mint, and lemon which are all naturally grown in Australia. It‘s going to be the most refreshing thing you’ve ever had.

And here comes the key point: The unique energy base of Caffeine + L-theanine + Vitamin B, developed by the industry tycoon, Dohler and us. It is proven to have the effects of focusing, improving alertness, and relieving anxiety.

 

When you are busy with work or study: when you barely got a clue on an essay or project, Focuz will provide you with better concentration, higher efficiency, and a pleasant mood, just to make sure you can finish work on time without getting battered. In your spare time, if you want to play video games, just try focuz, you’ll be surprised by how fast you can react. Most importantly, we care about your health. All ingredients are strictly selected by us, the natural flavor we choose and the natural sweetener we use ensures you a healthy, happy consumption experience.

 

We need you! We need an amazing crowd who want an effective lifestyle to join our community! Each one of you is an extension of our team: please give us feedback, share our campaign, and most importantly, enjoy focuz and celebrate for the clear mind！

 

Our Energy Base

 

 

What is L-theanine?

L-Theanine is a natural substance found in tea leaves that effectively reduces the anxiety and irritability associated with caffeine, consistently improving mental performance.

 

Why Guarana?

Guarana is a natural-grown herbal which has been used for centuries in Brazil. Compare to artificial caffeine, the guaranine (or natural caffeine) it contains generate the same energy but sustainably and durably. It has also been proven to have the effect of enhancing both mental and physical performance, boost mood, and lose weight.

 

L-theanine & Caffeine

Focuz effectively combines L-theanine and natural caffeine from Guarana fruits, which team up to give a one-of-a-kind refreshment without jitter and anxiety. Now you can enjoy a clear mind.

 

Explore the Flavors

 

 

Made from natural herbs grown under Australian sunlight, Focuz offers a 100% natural taste, smooth and delicious.

 

What your pledge support？

We have a big goal. We want to bring people around the world a better, healthier option to enjoy concentration. Your pledge will help us:

Deliver our first run!

Bring Focuz to more people! Nation-wide, and Worldwide!

Developing new tasty flavors for Focuz!

Developing new excited products that change people’s everyday life!

 

Our Production Process

To change the status quo is never easy, but we are almost there. As a part of our team, we want to keep you informed on what we’ve done and what our future plan will be.

We are much more than a concept. We’ve been working hard with Döhler to perfect all aspects of our formula and now it’s ready to go. Currently, we are confirming details of production with our co-packer in order to perfect our first production run. There’s only one big piece missing from the puzzle: your support. With your support, we can finish our first production run by the end of July, and distribute in August. So stay with us, and witness the born of the new Era of energy drink! 

 

 

Contact Us

Questions, comments, any random thought, etc., etc., we would love to hear that from you. Follow us and get in touch today! 

Our Website: https://focuzenergydrink.com.au/

Our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/focuzenergydrink/

Our Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/FocuzEnergy

Or Email us directly, and we will reply ASAP!: info@focus-energydrink.com

 

FAQ

1. What’s “Mystery gift”?

We’ve carefully selected some gifts to give you a little surprise, that’s why we want to keep it mysterious for now. Trust me, they are great.

2. What are the ingredients? Is it suitable for vegan or dairy-free diets?

Focuz uses plant-based natural flavors of black tea, lemon, and mint, it’s perfectly suitable for vegan and dairy-free diets.

3. Does Focuz contain added sugar?

No, Focuz does not contain any added sugar, we use stevia, a natural sweetener instead of added sugar to make sure it’s healthy and very low in Calories.

4. Where do you ship?

Currently, we ship to Australia, North America, New Zealand, China, Japan, Korea, and some other regions listed, but we will put all of our effort to make Focuz available in more and more regions.

5. How long does Focuz take to work and how long will the effect last?

Focuz takes less than half an hour for you to actually feel the effect and it will last up to 8 hours. The effect could vary from person to person.

6. Who’s going to need Focuz?

Focuz has the effect of refreshing, improving concentration, and relieving anxiety. So it’s a perfect fit for office professionals, students, early risers, night owls, and anyone who wants a cup of great-tasting lemon mint tea.

7. Are there any cautions?

Focuz contains caffeine so children and women during pregnancy are not suitable for drinking Focuz. We recommend you drink no more than two cans of Focuz per day.
story_txt: Imagine, it's 3 o'clock in the afternoon. You are sitting in the office. You are so sleepy that you can barely open your eyes. You can't wait to collapse on the desk, but wait, there are piles of files that need you to work on. You turn your head toward the old vending machine in the corner. You drink up the whole can of red bull in a gulp. However, you get nothing but a jittery mind.  You must have suffered from these and so do we. That’s why we want to change the status quo, and that’s why Focuz is created. We want to use our energy tea to improve concentration, lighten anxiety, and eventually, provide a healthy, effective lifestyle. When it comes to energy tea, you may think of energy drink: weird taste, tons of added sugar and chemicals. You are drinking it only because you have to stay awake like a walking dead. You have to stand the jitter and anxiety those energy drinks bring. But no, WE ARE DIFFERENT! Focuz is a healthier, tastier, and effective product compares to traditional “energy drinks". When drinking Focuz, you’ll feel like drinking a homemade lemon mint tea with a smooth, natural taste: that’s because each can of Focuz is delicately made by tea, mint, and lemon which are all naturally grown in Australia. It‘s going to be the most refreshing thing you’ve ever had.And here comes the key point: The unique energy base of Caffeine + L-theanine + Vitamin B, developed by the industry tycoon, Dohler and us. It is proven to have the effects of focusing, improving alertness, and relieving anxiety. When you are busy with work or study: when you barely got a clue on an essay or project, Focuz will provide you with better concentration, higher efficiency, and a pleasant mood, just to make sure you can finish work on time without getting battered. In your spare time, if you want to play video games, just try focuz, you’ll be surprised by how fast you can react. Most importantly, we care about your health. All ingredients are strictly selected by us, the natural flavor we choose and the natural sweetener we use ensures you a healthy, happy consumption experience. We need you! We need an amazing crowd who want an effective lifestyle to join our community! Each one of you is an extension of our team: please give us feedback, share our campaign, and most importantly, enjoy focuz and celebrate for the clear mind！ Our Energy Base  What is L-theanine?L-Theanine is a natural substance found in tea leaves that effectively reduces the anxiety and irritability associated with caffeine, consistently improving mental performance. Why Guarana?Guarana is a natural-grown herbal which has been used for centuries in Brazil. Compare to artificial caffeine, the guaranine (or natural caffeine) it contains generate the same energy but sustainably and durably. It has also been proven to have the effect of enhancing both mental and physical performance, boost mood, and lose weight. L-theanine & CaffeineFocuz effectively combines L-theanine and natural caffeine from Guarana fruits, which team up to give a one-of-a-kind refreshment without jitter and anxiety. Now you can enjoy a clear mind. Explore the Flavors  Made from natural herbs grown under Australian sunlight, Focuz offers a 100% natural taste, smooth and delicious. What your pledge support？We have a big goal. We want to bring people around the world a better, healthier option to enjoy concentration. Your pledge will help us:Deliver our first run!Bring Focuz to more people! Nation-wide, and Worldwide!Developing new tasty flavors for Focuz!Developing new excited products that change people’s everyday life! Our Production ProcessTo change the status quo is never easy, but we are almost there. As a part of our team, we want to keep you informed on what we’ve done and what our future plan will be.We are much more than a concept. We’ve been working hard with Döhler to perfect all aspects of our formula and now it’s ready to go. Currently, we are confirming details of production with our co-packer in order to perfect our first production run. There’s only one big piece missing from the puzzle: your support. With your support, we can finish our first production run by the end of July, and distribute in August. So stay with us, and witness the born of the new Era of energy drink!   Contact UsQuestions, comments, any random thought, etc., etc., we would love to hear that from you. Follow us and get in touch today! Our Website: https://focuzenergydrink.com.au/Our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/focuzenergydrink/Our Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/FocuzEnergyOr Email us directly, and we will reply ASAP!: info@focus-energydrink.com FAQ1. What’s “Mystery gift”?We’ve carefully selected some gifts to give you a little surprise, that’s why we want to keep it mysterious for now. Trust me, they are great.2. What are the ingredients? Is it suitable for vegan or dairy-free diets?Focuz uses plant-based natural flavors of black tea, lemon, and mint, it’s perfectly suitable for vegan and dairy-free diets.3. Does Focuz contain added sugar?No, Focuz does not contain any added sugar, we use stevia, a natural sweetener instead of added sugar to make sure it’s healthy and very low in Calories.4. Where do you ship?Currently, we ship to Australia, North America, New Zealand, China, Japan, Korea, and some other regions listed, but we will put all of our effort to make Focuz available in more and more regions.5. How long does Focuz take to work and how long will the effect last?Focuz takes less than half an hour for you to actually feel the effect and it will last up to 8 hours. The effect could vary from person to person.6. Who’s going to need Focuz?Focuz has the effect of refreshing, improving concentration, and relieving anxiety. So it’s a perfect fit for office professionals, students, early risers, night owls, and anyone who wants a cup of great-tasting lemon mint tea.7. Are there any cautions?Focuz contains caffeine so children and women during pregnancy are not suitable for drinking Focuz. We recommend you drink no more than two cans of Focuz per day.

story:
WELCOME

Introducing Sypertek - The fun partner for a beer bottle has just arrived.  This summer indulge and enjoy your beer with a fun opener that will get you a lot of attention and happiness . Needless to say , a great gift for anyone you love at an early bird offer that ends with this campaign . 

Coming to every beer lovers home shortly :)

 

 

A LITTLE BACKGROUND...

We are a group of tech engineers  who enjoy life , travelling and of course our beer :) .  We have seen our parents, friends or near and dear ones always having issues opening a bottle be it a beer  bottles or  soda pop bottles. We have been researching for over two years now to improve this process and we are so happy to introduce Sypertek and yes it comes with some humor too :). 

​Compact and classy design for any occasion

 

Witty and funny phrase's for all

 

A great gift for any occasion

 

This summer make it memorable with Sypertek

 

Fun,anywhere and anytime...

 

​Simple to use and kid friendly

 

Excellent Christmas gift

 

Fun times.. Always with Sypertek

 

A gift for any occasion 

 

Built solid

 

Trendy

 

Make peace with Syperktek :)

 

 

WHERE ARE WE IN THE PROCESS ?

We have researched the product for over two years now and gone through numerous designs and manufacturer's to perfect our opener. We are very happy with our current version and definitely excited to roll it out ..

Your support and contribution will help us roll out Sypertek  , the fun and humorous bottle openers all across the globe. Thank you for your help in advance.

 

REWARDS

 

 

TIMELINE

SYPERTEK SPECS

  • Size : 5.2*8.5cm
  • Material : Plastic and Aluminium 
  • Logo color : Red and Blue
  • Logo Print : Silk -Screen
  • Weight : 160gms
  • Metal grip tooth that locks onto the cap of your beverage
  • Solid built to last

 

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING 

"Love the pop sound it makes while opening the bottle" -  John

"Fun and easy to use. Wish I had got this earlier"- Sumesh

"My son  loves to use it to open his soda pop bottles" -  Susan

"Inexpensive gift and I got one each for my siblings " - Joseph

" Love the humorous quotes, friends love it" - Nirmal

 

SHIPPING DETAILS

All orders will be shipped by USPS and  will also include a tracking number.

 

​RISK AND CHALLENGES

 

Our only risks are unforeseen events that may delay our manufacturing.We have spent months on the quality and identifying the right manufacturer so we are confident to deliver on time the same quality that initiated us to start this project.
The cost of raw material could rise in the future- We don't have any concerns now as the rates of raw material has been consistent and we expect to finish this project in the next couple of months.

 

RETURN AND REFUND POLICY

We believe in our product and for any reason you do not like the item , please feel free to return it within 10 days and no questions asked.  Customer will bear the cost for return shipping .

Refund will be debited to your credit card within 7 business days.

 

YOU CAN HELP

Even if you have no need for an opener but know friends or family that would love it .. Feel free to share it .Sharing is caring and definitely what goes around comes around :)

 

Share on Facebook

Share on Twitter

story:
Oy!

Hello! Thank you for visiting our Indiegogo campaign. We’re incredibly excited to share this with our family, friends and tiki fans alike.

Recently, we’ve developed our budding Promistyx company brand together, which Mistyx Tiki falls under. We’re both big mythology nerds, and the Promistyx name represents a promise we’re making to ourselves to bring this product and this campaign to life.

We have SO MANY great designs, so this campaign will also help in developing future designs and bringing this tiki to (virtual, and someday in-person) shows in the SoCal area.

Thanks for giving us this chance!

Aaron & Jenn

About the Product

While we're deep in production on our first (and successful) Kickstarter for the Death Blow tiki mug - we were thinking about our Halloween campaign all along. We're not the kind of people who just decorate for Halloween... We're year-round fanatics! And what better way to launch this side of our tiki product line than a design that embodies this crazy year we've all been experiencing: the Plague Doctor.

We've been gobbling up plague doctor merch from our favorite artists and product companies, but we noticed something missing. So here we are. And we're thrilled to finally be sharing it!

Our "Doctor Plague" tiki mug will stand at around 8" tall. Our primary open edition will have a black glossy glaze from head to toe with a bone matte mask and bright red interior. Our second edition variant, the "Infected Doctor Plague," will be filled with bright, poison green interior and a gradient on the bottom, as if he's trudged miles through sickness.

Check out our progress below:

Early concept art.

Early concept art.

Early concept art.

Early concept art.

First samples; bisqueware.

First samples; bisqueware.

First glazed samples.

First glazed samples.

 

Extras

In addition to the mugs, we’re producing some accessories for our Doctors. 

The first is a new enamel pin designed by Aaron. Every decent plague doctor needs to be able to inspect wounds and lesion from a distance. So we've crafted a fashionable Winged Hand Lens enamel pin to aid their examinations. 

We also have some special stretch goals lined up that we’re hoping to reach during this campaign! The first is a swizzle stick modeled after our Doctor's walking stick.

 

 

Who We Are

Promistyx is a husband-wife team based out of Los Angeles featuring 2D digital art and enamel pins as well as the development of artisan drinkware and apparel prints.

Aaron is a longtime product developer in the toy and collectibles industry. He has a background in industrial design and over ten years of combined experience in art direction and product manufacturing. It’s a dream to finally bring his designs to life!

When not helping run the business side of her husband Aaron's designs and product development, Jenn also produces one-of-a-kind functional ceramics pieces. Her art is heavily inspired by nature and autumnal themes.

 

 

 

Shipping:

 

But why tho?

Here's what we need to cover and why we need the $27,500:

  • Samples and Tooling for the tikis and pins
  • The tikis have minimum order quantity (MOQ) of 850 total for these two versions
  • Factory to Promistyx product shipping
  • Packaging and Shipping materials
  • Companion pins and certificates of authenticity (COAs)
  • "Winged Hand Lens" enamel pins
  • Postcards
  • Our blood, sweat and tears

 

Risks & Challenges

With ceramics, there's always the chance of breakage, especially when shipping them overseas. We've integrated the cost of ordering enough to cover standard breakage rate, and have the ability to tailor the order to the final total if it goes above and beyond the MOQ. Through Aaron, we have years of experience working with international manufacturers on a wide range of products and quantities.

 

Not for you?

We get it, we do! If this isn't traditionally tiki enough for you, share it with a creepster or Halloween fan that would love it. We appreciate the word of mouth from our friends and followers.

"Winged Hand Lens" enamel pins
Postcards
Our blood, sweat and tears

Through Aaron, we have years of experience working with international manufacturers on a wide range of products and quantities.
 

Not for you?
We get it, we do! If this isn't traditionally tiki enough for you, share it with a creepster or Halloween fan that would love it. We appreciate the word of mouth from our friends and followers.

story:
Hi! We are Ajax and Tash, and we have a small business providing custom knives for homes and restaurants throughout Australia. We take pride in taking all of our knives from concept through to a handcrafted end product to match their owners cooking style. 

We are also very passionate home cooks, and having the best tools makes the experience of creating food so much more enjoyable. Who likes bumping their knuckles, squashing tomatoes, or wielding something that's the wrong size? No one.

Often people come to us looking to purchase one of our knives because they have seen one of our knives in the wild and they want one, but they don’t necessarily need a custom knife fitted to them, they want to know what our most popular knife is. At over $350 per custom knife, it can be a bit pricey for the average cook! This lead us to develop the Freehand Knife Set, same great quality, but much more accessible.

Chef knife design process

Freehand Knives

After more than a year in development, we are proud to have created this set of knives. The Freehand Knives boast beautiful balance and stunning geometry, that will make these knives feel like they are an extension of your hand. We believe that once you try them, you will never look back! 

The Blade

They will be made from N690 stainless steel which is a much higher grade of steel than is commonly available in department stores and current large scale production. What that means for you is they will be super sharp, and retain their edge for longer than most readily available knives. 

They are also able to be cut to a finer edge, and this is where these knives really shine! A 17 degree cutting edge means that rather than splitting the food like an axe to wood, they slice with a precision which changes the texture of the food you prepare. Whether you are cutting hard carrots, lean meat, or soft fruits, the difference is immediately noticeable.

 The handles 

Made from locally sourced spotted gum, which is an incredibly beautiful and durable timber, native to the east coast of Australia. These will be complimented with carbon fiber pins. The inspiration for the handle geometry came from traditional Japanese Wa handles, which have hexagonal facets, crossed with the contoured ergonomics found in European styles. We are pretty sure we nailed both looks and comfort!

Best of all, they are hand crafted by us, in our workshop in South East Melbourne!

story:
Mission Statement

With everything that we do, Bennett's Coffee Co. strives towards two simple aims; serve outstanding products, and serve our community. With corporate responsibility held with the same weight as our bottom line, we hope to introduce the world of third-wave coffee extraction to our consumers while meeting our social and environmental aims. By relying on community and corporate partnerships we believe that we can maintain sustainable business practices without sacrificing the needs of our community stakeholders.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Bennett's Coffee is for people who care about what's in their cup. We provide outstanding food & beverage experiences by responsibly sourcing our products, and paying forward the goodwill of our patrons.
  • Although we are hoping to raise substantially more funding for equipment, we cannot meet the required downpayment on our loan. By turning to crowdfunding, we believe that we can provide a better alternative to the over-priced, low-quality coffee that we see today.
  • For a detailed outline of our startup-costs, please email: bennettscoffeeco@gmail.com

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out on this project and understand that any amount helps!
  • Also please check out our website and social media accounts
    • www.bennettscoffee.com
    • @bennettscoffeeco

story:
Your House Beer Company

YHBC will focus on being highly approachable, remaining true to style to the beer, brand, and hospitality you would receive at your best friend's weekend cookout.With a unique small batch approach, future offerings will be determined by our house guests, not chasing the trends that alienate while keeping an eye on innovation.
