YHBC will focus on being highly approachable, remaining true to style to the beer, brand, and hospitality you would receive at your best friend's weekend cookout.With a unique small batch approach, future offerings will be determined by our house guests, not chasing the trends that alienate while keeping an eye on innovation.

story:
One Great Story

I'm Gabrielle and I'm an actress, singer, veggie-lover, and serious afro-grower! I've been vegan for about 8 years and in my time I've fallen in love with all things vegan, vegetarian, plant-based, organic, and all-natural! Before I went vegan I was weighed down by pressure to count calories, restrict myself from food for multiple days, and constantly judge and belittle myself for not being as skinny or petite as my peers. Eventually this led to a self-hating mindset and a two year long eating disorder. Veganism and living a plant-based lifestyle SAVED me from my own personal darkness and now I’m the healthiest and the happiest I could ever shine!

Being a performer I always knew that sick days were NOT an option and I had to have camera ready skin in a moments notice. So, when it came to my diet and what ways I was nourishing myself I knew that if I kept my insides squeaky clean, and the number of ingredients I consumed minimal, that I was bound to be in tip-top condition on the daily and also have my outsides reflect my insides! I created One GReat Vegan so that others seeking health and wellness would have a source for recipes, guidance, coaching, and catering.

One Great Vegan is a plant-based, meal prep & catering company helping you take the right steps towards a healthy, vegan lifestyle! After 8 years of being a tried and true vegan, I’ve gathered the best tips and recipes to make the most out of what Mother Nature has to offer. For some, eating a plant-based diet can be a challenge when transitioning for the first week or so. Take the journey of growth and green-goodies and see how you can get your glow on!

Great Services

CATERING - It’s time to celebrate! One Great Vegan brings catering to your event in the DFW area at all times of the year for any occasion. Satisfying your flavor pallet we prepare appetizers, self serve meals, and delectable desserts for your festivities.. You have the power to create your plant based menu depending on theme, allergies, event type, and of course your cravings! With hundreds of vegan options to choose from we create a personal plant-based menu for you and your guests to enjoy. Whether you are raw-vegan, gluten free, or want to provide food for your veggie-lover friends and coworkers One Great Vegan brings you appetizers, self serve meals, desserts, and drinks for events of all sizes!

MEAL PREP - From personal experience I know what it means to have a hectic schedule. Balancing work, fitness, family, social life, and the occasional Netflix binge session it’s hard to find time to breathe much less make a meal! One Great Vegan will handle your plant based needs with filling meals that not only taste incredible but will leave you feeling energized and ready to tackle the rest of your busy day.

CLASSES - Trying out plant-based eating but don’t even know where to start? Going on 8 years of cooking and eating a vegan diet, I now specialize in vegan/plant-based cuisine by creating and customizing a menu that you will learn how to prepare, cook, and enjoy! This is perfect for bachelorette parties, date nights, or family fun.  

A Great Future

One Great Vegan has a glowing future ahead! With your donation, it will be an investment towards the bight and beautiful things we have planned! Starting 2019 we will:

-In 3 MONTHS - have a consistent system for my weekly recipe videos uploaded and partner with 3 major gyms in and 3 community outreach programs in Dallas-Fort Worth
-In 6 MONTHS - have shipping available for online customers across America
-In 9 MONTHS - own and operate the One Great Vegan brick and mortar restaurant.
-In 12 MONTHS - pitch and create “Glowing with Gabrielle” a colorful cooking show on TV as well as online

Great Perks

For your contribution you will receive:

$1-$20 Personalized shout out on instagram

$20-$100 (above) +Personalized plant-based menu 

$100-$500 (above) +Personalized vegan meal made by Gabrielle

$500-$1000 (above) +Catered Event
story_txt: One Great StoryI'm Gabrielle and I'm an actress, singer, veggie-lover, and serious afro-grower! I've been vegan for about 8 years and in my time I've fallen in love with all things vegan, vegetarian, plant-based, organic, and all-natural! Before I went vegan I was weighed down by pressure to count calories, restrict myself from food for multiple days, and constantly judge and belittle myself for not being as skinny or petite as my peers. Eventually this led to a self-hating mindset and a two year long eating disorder. Veganism and living a plant-based lifestyle SAVED me from my own personal darkness and now I’m the healthiest and the happiest I could ever shine!Being a performer I always knew that sick days were NOT an option and I had to have camera ready skin in a moments notice. So, when it came to my diet and what ways I was nourishing myself I knew that if I kept my insides squeaky clean, and the number of ingredients I consumed minimal, that I was bound to be in tip-top condition on the daily and also have my outsides reflect my insides! I created One GReat Vegan so that others seeking health and wellness would have a source for recipes, guidance, coaching, and catering.One Great Vegan is a plant-based, meal prep & catering company helping you take the right steps towards a healthy, vegan lifestyle! After 8 years of being a tried and true vegan, I’ve gathered the best tips and recipes to make the most out of what Mother Nature has to offer. For some, eating a plant-based diet can be a challenge when transitioning for the first week or so. Take the journey of growth and green-goodies and see how you can get your glow on!Great ServicesCATERING - It’s time to celebrate! One Great Vegan brings catering to your event in the DFW area at all times of the year for any occasion. Satisfying your flavor pallet we prepare appetizers, self serve meals, and delectable desserts for your festivities.. You have the power to create your plant based menu depending on theme, allergies, event type, and of course your cravings! With hundreds of vegan options to choose from we create a personal plant-based menu for you and your guests to enjoy. Whether you are raw-vegan, gluten free, or want to provide food for your veggie-lover friends and coworkers One Great Vegan brings you appetizers, self serve meals, desserts, and drinks for events of all sizes!MEAL PREP - From personal experience I know what it means to have a hectic schedule. Balancing work, fitness, family, social life, and the occasional Netflix binge session it’s hard to find time to breathe much less make a meal! One Great Vegan will handle your plant based needs with filling meals that not only taste incredible but will leave you feeling energized and ready to tackle the rest of your busy day.CLASSES - Trying out plant-based eating but don’t even know where to start? Going on 8 years of cooking and eating a vegan diet, I now specialize in vegan/plant-based cuisine by creating and customizing a menu that you will learn how to prepare, cook, and enjoy! This is perfect for bachelorette parties, date nights, or family fun.  A Great FutureOne Great Vegan has a glowing future ahead! With your donation, it will be an investment towards the bight and beautiful things we have planned! Starting 2019 we will:-In 3 MONTHS - have a consistent system for my weekly recipe videos uploaded and partner with 3 major gyms in and 3 community outreach programs in Dallas-Fort Worth-In 6 MONTHS - have shipping available for online customers across America-In 9 MONTHS - own and operate the One Great Vegan brick and mortar restaurant.-In 12 MONTHS - pitch and create “Glowing with Gabrielle” a colorful cooking show on TV as well as onlineGreat PerksFor your contribution you will receive:$1-$20 Personalized shout out on instagram$20-$100 (above) +Personalized plant-based menu $100-$500 (above) +Personalized vegan meal made by Gabrielle$500-$1000 (above) +Catered Event

story:
How many times have you wanted to enjoy your favorite wine, soda or beer at the perfect, cool, refreshing temperature?
How long does it usually take to cool down your favorite beverage? 
What do you use for chilling? Fridge, ice bucket or water? 

Have you ever frozen your bottle on accident?

We used to ask ourselves these questions too and shared your frustration. Now, we don't have to put up with ineffective chilling methods and neither do you!  It's a true game-changer; a device that chills any drink as fast as a kettle heats water, and as portable as a juice-machine!​

Reserve your Chill&Cheers today and help us get our project launched.  The sooner we reach our goal, the sooner you'll have the best drink accessory you'll take everywhere you go. 

What are you waiting for?!  Let's get this party started!

 

Meet the world’s FIRST portable, smart electronic beverage chiller – Chill&Cheers!

 

 

 

 DOWNLOAD PRESS RELEASE  

 

 


Fast Chilling 

Depending on the amount, type of beverage, and the set temperature delta, the chilling time normally varies from 1 to 8 minutes. Although we have a working prototype, we are still improving the technology to make the serial product faster and more powerful.  

 

No Ice or Water Needed

Usually you need ice or cold water to chill your beverage fast. But these methods are messy and inconvenient. Preparation of ice or cold water requires time and effort. Chill&Cheers chills your drink without the effort or mess.  

 

Easy to Use 

Our goal in designing Chill&Cheers is simplicity. It is easy to operate and clean. Chill&Cheers works like an electronic kettle but in reverse. All interfaces are intuitive and comfortable. It means that together with the fast chilling, you have more time to enjoy your favorite beverage.

 

App Сontrol 

Chill&Cheers is the first device of its kind. The Chill&Cheers app will be available for both iOS and Android smartphones and operates through Bluetooth interface. The app provides more control and customizable options compared to traditional device buttons. Prefer manual buttons on the device? Those are present too.     

 

Chill to the Exact Temperature

To experience the full flavor and taste of your drink, you need to chill it to a precise temperature. Other devices on the market offer only a few possible temperatures. Chill&Cheers says YES! to any temperature you set within its working range. 

 

Keep the Temperature

Chill&Cheers will maintain the set temperature. If you forget to take the beverage out, or just don't drink the full volume at once, the device will automatically switch on if the temperature changes just one degree.  Chill your drink and have it ready for whenever you need it.    

 

Preset Temperature Modes

The preset feature is exclusive to the app. We're in the process of compiling a  database of the best temperatures for different beverage types: wines, spirits, beers, etc. All you need to do is select the right beverage and click "Start". You can also set your own temperature and save it as a preset. 

 

Can't wait to get your Chill&Cheers? Order yours today! Say goodbye to warm or watered down drinks and always enjoy your favorite beverage just the way you like it.

 

"At the size of a home coffee-machine, Chill&Cheers allows you to chill any drink to the set temperature in minutes.  Just pour your wine, beer, soda, water, gin, or whatever inside, select the mode with an iOS or Android application, and enjoy your beverage at the perfect temperature".

Eugene Lopatin, co-founder.

"What we kept in our mind while designing the Chill&Cheers is simplicity. It's so easy to use it's hard to believe. There are plenty of ways to use it - at home, at work, in the gym, or at any place where a refrigerator cannot be installed. It's the perfect gift for wine lovers, or liquor connoisseurs. Moreover, once it cools the drink, Chill&Cheers will keep it cold even if you forget about it.”

 Pavlo Haiduk,  co-founder.

 

 

Chill&Cheers is designed for easy use, giving you more time to relax and enjoy your favorite drinks.  

 

 

Enjoy chilled drinks in 5 easy steps:

STEP 1:  Pour your favorite beverage inside Chill&Cheers
STEP 2: Set the target temperature manually, using on-the-device buttons
OR:  Set the temperature with the help of the iOS /Android app, using manual mode or the preset temperatures mode we created. 
STEP 3: Press START and in just a few minutes, Chill&Cheers gets the work done for you.
SPEP 4: Pour the beverage in your glass, sit back, and enjoy!
STEP 5: When you're done, wash the chilling container.  It's dishwasher safe!
 

That's all there is to it!

 

 

 

 

Chill&Cheers uses a technology of thermo-electric phase cooling, which means it doesn’t require any ice, water, compressor or freon gas. Chill&Cheers measures the current temperature of your drink with high-sensitive sensors at different layers. Then you select the preferred temperature and press the "Start". Microprocessor controls multiple cooling elements and the express-chilling process by a specially programmed algorythm, which makes it capable to remove ~40000 Jouls of Heat (20 degrees) in a period of 1 to 8 minutes, depending on the beverage type and temperature. After your beverage is chilled – take it out and enjoy it!

 

 

Power Supply: V/Hz ~110V-~240V/50-60Hz
Power Consumption: W/h 500 W/h
Cooling Capacity: Btu/h 1500 Btu/h
Dimensions (approx): HxD, mm (inches) 330x240mm (13"x9.5")
Weight (approx): kg (lbs) 7kg (15.5 lbs)
Package Сapacity: litres (gal) 0,75l (0.2 gal)
Chilling Time to 5 °C (41 °F)*: minutes
*depends on room temp, starting temp & bev. type		 1-8 min
Max. Beverage Starting Temperature: °С (°F) 55 °С  (131 °F)
Min. Beverage Cooling Temperature: °С (°F)  0 °С  (32 °F)
Working Conditions: °С (°F)  -15 °С + 40 °С (+5 °F +104 °F)

 

 

 

  

Like a great wine, a great product takes time to get it just right.  We are working on finalizing the end design and tweaking the working prototype before we send Chill&Cheers to production.  We want the product you receive to be perfect, don't you?  We're aiming for production to begin by the end of this year.  Make your order now to reserve you Chill&Cheers at a good price! Or back the poject with Your support.  Trust us.  It'll be well worth the wait!   

 

Eugene Lopatin, Founder. While working for a beer company, Eugene had the idea for a chilling device.  He received the practical knowledge to create this device while working for an air-conditioning company. He has dozens of other innovative ideas in mind to bring to life after Chill&Cheers fully launches.

 

Pavlo Haiduk, Co-Founder. Pavlo brings huge experience in product marketing for international brands to the project. A perfectionist with a  never give up attitude, he catches hype from every job he's working on. He's only happy when the client is happy.

 

Anna, Sales Guru. Client-oriented, she knows how to approach any customer. Anna has impressive sales experience as a Key Account Manager. Just give her your order  and she will do her best to deliver perfect service. Have questions in corporate sales? Get in touch with Anna!  

 

Ann, Designer. Ann brings 20 years of design experience in every aspect for hundreds of projects . She is passionate about how it looks and fits. Ann does not accept less than perfect and will always look for the possibility to improve the result.  

 

Dmitry, IOT Man. Dmitry knows everything about user experience and app coding, and is the beta-testing guru. H believes in the formula hard work=hard fun. He's always open-minded to new and interesting ideas. A beer and wine enthusiast, Dmitry is a great addition to the team. 

 

Timur, Crazy Engineer. A man without borders, living on his own planet, sums up Timur. With 24/7 construction addiction there is no such a word as "impossible" in his vocabulary. Timur has plenty of work to do for Chill&Cheers to make it perfect. His arch enemy in life? The designer.

 

 

A huge shoutout goes out all our supporters around the world, real wine enthusiasts, and all amazing people we've met down the road to creation of Chill&Cheers cooler.

We'd also like to express our gratitude to all those who helped us, shared their knowledge, expertise and contributed to the Chill&Cheers campaign:

  • Bad Boy Liquor Store - Gleb Kapinus and Dmitriy Sergieni
  • Like a Local's Wine bar - Eugeniya Nikolaychuk 
  • AIN.UA - Ilya Boshnyakov
  • Petcube - Alex Neskin
  • Grand Bud Production - Timur Avlastimov  
  • Umka Ice Cream - Slava Shestakovskyi  
  • Video production - Denis Duzhnik  
  • Art Direction - Dimko Rodyk
  • DIZAAP -  Uspenskiy Denis

 Thank you, people, you're amazing!

 

Will the Chill&Cheers final product vary from the design above?

Yes. What we are showing now is the preliminary design of our fully working prototype. However, we intend to make the final product twice compact and chill even faster. We will surely make some improvements which we know you'll like. We love hearing from our supporters and if you have any suggestions, we would be more than happy to consider them. As we are in an prototype & initial investment stage only with your support we can make it come to life.

 

Why can't we just put the bottle inside instead of pouring in the liquid?

The technology works best in terms of time and exact temperature control with constant contact of the liquid with the chilling surface through our specially designed chilling cup. Bottles come in many different shapes and sizes, which makes designing the chilling cup to fit very tough. You can try to put your bottle inside the device, but we cannot guarantee it will work properly. However this is our dream to make Chill&Cheers bottle-friendly. Such an adoption requires bigger investments. As we see bigger interest in the product, we will apply it as our most Desired Stretch Goal! 

 

Will there be different colors available?

For now, Chill&Cheers will only be available in Black. This decision is grounded on the minimal order pricing requirements. However, because we see a bigger interest in Chill&Cheers based on preorders, we will definitely apply some stretch goals. Some of these will be color-oriented. Just follow the updates of our current page to not miss something new. 

 

What happens if Chill&Cheers doesn't reach its goal?

We strictly follow the terms and conditions of Indiegogo. You will receive a full refund if the campaign ends without reaching our goal. With your support and sharing the campaign within your network, we are sure to meet the goal and go far beyond!

 

What about the shipping?

Chill&Cheers is not a tiny device, so we are forced to apply certain charges for its shipping. As we intend to ship worldwide, we take into consideration the fares of shipment to different locations. We do our best to select the best possible logistic providers in terms of price and quality to ensure the product is delivered safely and quickly.

 

Who is responsible for taxes and duties?

The backer is responsible for any additional duties, taxes, and VAT upon the product delivery. Duties, Taxes, and VAT vary from country to country . For example, in the U.S, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%.  For other countries, please check the local regulations before purchasing. 

 

What will be the time of beverage chilling?

Chill times depend on different factors such as the temperature delta (your beverage starting temperature and the set temperature), amount of beverage that needs to be chilled (the less you pour in, the faster it is), outside air temperature, air humidity, and even beverage density (the denser the beverage is, the more time is needed). Our own tests show chill times between 1 to 8 minutes.  

 

What are the minimal temperatures of chilling I can set?

The machine is capable of chilling your beverage down to 0 ℉ ( ~ -18 ℃), but this setting increases the risk of damaging the beverage cup or the chilling elements. To keep your device working properly, we have limited the lowest temperature setting to 32 ℉ (0 ℃) in the Chill&Cheers software. Doctors recommend consumption temperatures no lower than 41 ℉ (+5 ℃).If you want a colder drink, check with your doctor to maintain your health.

 

How do you control the exact temperature of beverage chilling?

There are two types of temperature sensors: wireless infrared which analyses different layers of liquid, and hard temperature sensors. The Chill&Cheers processor utilizes both sensors and knows exactly when to stop.  

 

How do I clean the beverage chilling cup?

The cup is easily removed and can be washed either by hand or in the dishwasher. You can also buy additional cups to avoid contamination of different drinks in social situations. The cup surface is made of alloy approved for food and drink use. 

 

How to clean the tap? 

The tap can be unscrewed easily and washed separately. You can also pour the washing liquid inside the cup and run it through the tap. Be sure to flush the cup and tap with clean water to rinse.

 

Where can I download the Chill&Cheers app?

The app will be available for both iOS and Android devices. Download it by scanning the QR code in the owners' manual, which comes inside the Chill&Cheers package.

 

How does Chill&Cheers connect to my phone? 

Once you install the app, the connection is executed via Bluetooth. 

 

What possibilities does the smartphone application offer?

We are working to create a database of the ideal temperatures for each beverage by type, sort, brand, etc. You will be able to access this in the user-friendly menu by beverage type. You can also set desired temperatures manually, and save your own preset modes.

story:
Time to Grow

During the holiday season, we made a decision that we would direct all of our energy into growing the Sweet-n-Cheezy food trailer into a permanent restaurant in the Round Rock area. We have found three potential locations, and each requires some level of investment. 

  • Option 1 is a large space in west Round Rock. It requires the largest investment but it provides the potential for the best returns. It also provides the ability to expand the menu and services. 
  • Option 2 is a mid-sized space in north east Round Rock and it provides the most flexibility. The space could start out as a sandwich counter and grow into a full restaurant location. 
  • Option 3 is a small space in central Round Rock and it requires the most work. If we select this space it would require starting as a sandwich counter and expansion possibilities would be limited. 

The final decision will depend on the amount of funding raised and the availability of spaces. Each of these properties is currently available and we have limited the length of the campaign so we can commit to one of these spaces in time to open our doors in June. 

We have set the campaign as a fixed funding campaign because without a retail location, you would need to chase us around the city to fulfill your perks. Therefore, if we don't reach our goal, your full perk will be refunded. If we reach or exceed our goal, we can get back to doing what we love. 

If you want to assist but you are unable to provide financial assistance right now, please share our campaign with anyone you know who loves good food. 

The Food

Food as Unique as You Are

We all know that Chef Brian is really an artist. In three years, he has created over 150 specials. It all started with a few of our customers who would make special requests. Brian would take each request and do his best to surprise and delight our customers. The first few specials were so personal, we started naming them after our customers. That's why we have the Hamby, the Lucy and the Ramzel, just to name a few. Soon Brian started creating specials every week and we named them after football games, events and school mascots. The food became the essential ingredient in the creation of the Sweet-n-Cheezy community.  

Creativity and community are two things that set us apart from the crowd. The third factor is our food philosophy. We want each meal to meet the same high standards; and that means interesting flavor combinations, natural ingredients and foods prepared the way you like them. 

The Gourmet Melt

A grilled cheese is a nostalgic favorite, especially, with a bowl of soup. At Sweet-n-Cheezy we make grilled cheese sandwiches; but we specialize in Gourmet Melts. The cheese is always a critical ingredient because it infuses flavors as it blends with the ingredients of the sandwich. However, our creations are filled to the brim with vegetables and meats and unique sauces. Our sandwiches take your pallet on a journey of sweet to spice to savory and all the flavors in between. 

The primary limitation of the food truck is space. Food Trucks are great operations for testing a concept but to truly deliver unique food options a food artist needs a kitchen. Today, our menu is extensive for a food truck operation but with the expansion, we plan to add many of your favorites to the menu. More importaly, we can't wait to introduce you to new flavors and combinations. 

The Fresh Freeze

When we opened in 2016, we were one of the few shaved ice vendors to provide all natural fruit-based syrups. We would complement these syrups with fresh fruit and cream for our signature Fresh Freeze desserts. The Pina Colada was a customer favorite. Imagine, fresh pineapples, atop a mountain of finely shaved ice that has been coated with pineapple syrup, coconut syrup and cream.  On a hot day, a fresh freeze was pretty close to a day at the beach. 

Many of you have told us how much you miss the Fresh Freeze and the shaved ice. Well, once we have the space to really prepare and refrigerate our all natural syrups, we plan to expand the flavor options and add sugar free flavors to the menu.   

 

The Sweet-n-Cheezy Family

When we started this business, we never imagined how our family would grow to include so many beautiful people. We have shared meals with you in times of celebration, sadness, congratulation, anticipation and plain old ravenous hunger. We miss you and -- judging by the many calls and messages -- the feeling is mutual. Well, family, we are ready to grow!

Chef Brian

Chef Brian has been very busy these last few months. Since our last meal service at the Growler Bar, he has been working on creating a new and exciting menu. The new menu will preserve some of the old favorites (how can we get rid of the Hungry Hippo?), add some of our most popular specials to the standard menu (can you say, Double Trouble?), and introduce a few of his most flavorful parings, which we hope will become your new favorites. 

Angelia

Angelia or Sweetie as she is sometimes called, has searched and searched to find a location that she can make into a home away from home for our customers. We have said no to many potential locations because they just didn't quite "fit" for our Sweet-n-Cheezy Family. 

Our Hearts

As we move into this next phase, we will do it with out our three children because they all decided to go to college somewhere "other than Austin". Myles, Alex and Gideon were the heartbeat of Sweet-n-Cheezy we could always depend on them to treat each customer like family. They won't be with us everyday but we just MIGHT be able to get them to join us for the grand opening.   
 

The S-n-C Fam

You have each become like family to us. We have had the honor to watch your children go to kindergarten, graduate from high school and succeed in college. We have celebrated with you as you have found your life partner.  We are always excited to hear about new employment opportunities but we are sad when those opportunities take you far away.  We think of you everyday and we can't wait to get back in the kitchen and around the table so we can see what lies ahead.
story_txt:
Time to GrowDuring the holiday season, we made a decision that we would direct all of our energy into growing the Sweet-n-Cheezy food trailer into a permanent restaurant in the Round Rock area. We have found three potential locations, and each requires some level of investment. 

Option 1 is a large space in west Round Rock. It requires the largest investment but it provides the potential for the best returns. It also provides the ability to expand the menu and services. 

Option 2 is a mid-sized space in north east Round Rock and it provides the most flexibility. The space could start out as a sandwich counter and grow into a full restaurant location. 

Option 3 is a small space in central Round Rock and it requires the most work. If we select this space it would require starting as a sandwich counter and expansion possibilities would be limited. 
The final decision will depend on the amount of funding raised and the availability of spaces. Each of these properties is currently available and we have limited the length of the campaign so we can commit to one of these spaces in time to open our doors in June. We have set the campaign as a fixed funding campaign because without a retail location, you would need to chase us around the city to fulfill your perks. story:
Anytongs instantly turns your flatware into versatile kitchen tongs. Why have multiple clunky tongs when you can simply use the forks and spoons you already have? Go ahead and turn those hearty meats, stir some noodles, and serve that delicious salad. You’ll always have tongs ready when you need them with Anytongs.

Anytongs uses tension strength to easily and quickly attach a wide range of flatware. It's specially designed to ensure your flatware stays in place securely while in use. The rubberized slots are tapered to fit flat styled handles various widths, shapes and even curves! Go ahead and grab, flip, stab, and tug with total confidence and control. 

Kitchen drawers and utensil holders are filled with clutter. We all know how important it is to have multiple tongs available but they just take up too much space. With Anytongs, you'll have best of both worlds! Multiple tongs using your existing flatware without having all the extra clunkiness taking up precious storage in your kitchen. 

Health and food experts agree that using the same kitchen utensils to prepare meats and vegetables increases the risk of cross-contamination. Switching out for freshly clean tongs is effective food handling hygiene that helps stop the spread of foodborne illnesses. Have confidence and peace of mind when using Anytongs to prepare and serve food for your family, friends, and guests!

We've put in a lot of thought into the construction and design of Anytongs. Dozens of prototypes and over a hundred different pieces of flatware were tested. What we've come up with is a truly simple and elegant design that's a joy to use. This small, lightweight tool doesn't make wimpy tongs either. The unique attachment method securely keeps your flatware in place and the fine-tuned torque hinge operates smoothly for maximum control, precision, and comfort. You're going to love how Anytongs feel in your hands!

 

 

Prototyping Process

 Our First Test Run!

story:
Our Story

Overview

At Anima Alembic Distillery we intend to produce gin, an essential ingredient for Mr Bond favorite drink- Martini. Our project is sustainable and use all local ingredients from the beautiful island Korcula.

What is our story

Our family fell in love with Korcula and we make it our home. We came here to the island of Korcula to initiate the spark for a very sustainable and unique project. This is the place where the essence of the island is put together for our premium London dry gin. With the soul of this place, the tradition of the old distillery we will fuse a high-end product that Korcula will be proud of. Ancient Greeks named the island ‘’Kerkyra Nigra’’, what translates to ‘’Black Corfu’’ as island was covered in dense, rich forests. So, it looked dark from the distance. Island is still very much green even to this day, and we are going to make a good use of natural resources.if you look at our video you will see the  diversity of herbs, citrus fruits, lemon, pomace, angelica root, orris, juniper, which will be combined with the pomace. This will give an authentic taste of the island of Korcula to our 007GIN

Our still

Korcula is the home of superb wines and famous for its 2,000 years of wine producing tradition, starting from ancient Greeks. On the island you find grapes that grow nowhere else on Earth: Grk and Posip.

We want to re-use the grape pomace from local farmers to refine and create the base of our gin. This gives us the proud of creating a sustainable project as today the pomace is not entirely used and create the base of circular economy ecosystem on the island.

Our product

The 007Gin  is a 100% dry London gin. We will produce first batch of 700 bottles in January/February 2022 and we already connected with local farms to have all the local ingredients from pomace to juniper, citrus, angelica roots, orris that will ensure high quality product that not only Korcula will be proud of.

The team

  1. Sinisa   – Project Master
  2. Luka     – Distiller
  3. Stana   – Chemist Master
  4. Florin   – Community Master

Your contribution

It is no secret that our set-up is small. We can’t compete with the big scale productions of many other distilleries, nor is that our ambition. What we wish to do is make innovative, premium sustainable quality London dry gin. And we will not compromise on the quality of our product.

Your contribution will allow us to perform all of our experiments and to develop our products. Without your contribution we won't be able to unfold the full potential of our distillery. Become a part of our journey and support us achieve our 007Gin dream and cement Korcula as a stronghold on the gin scene! 

If you don’t have the financial capacity or motivation to support us economically that’s okay! Luckily, there are other ways through which you can support us. Spread our name on social media and in your personal networks. Chances are you know someone who might be interested in our 007Gin  – let them know our name!

Timeline

Thank you so much for reading so far! Now that we've uncovered the basics of our project in general and who we are, we would like to get a little nerdy and elaborate on some of the ways that we want to run our distillery.

Experiments

We wish to be an innovative and experimenting distillery. We want to explore not only taste but also different methods and processes. This is why we also experiment with our own different local materials – we just can’t help but explore the impact that it has on the final product.

We will also be experimenting with different pomace and various herbs in order to give different flavour profiles to our gin. A part of this experiment will also be to test the different cuts of our spirit and taste how the different cuts impact our gin .

We hope that in next years’ time or so we will continue and develop while we invite you to produce your own gin with us. Our distillery will offer also in April/May 2022 gin tasting programs where you can come and decide the future products! Or you can produce with us your own gin starting Summer 2022!  

 Thank you!

Thank you very much for reading our page! Should choose to buy a perk you are helping us launch our dreams of making 007Gin !However, your contribution should be seen as exactly that - a contribution. Please keep in mind that, while we will do everything in our power to keep our production on schedule, unforeseen delays that are out of our hands may occur. In such case, we will of course inform our backers appropriately. In next year time, however, our first and foremost priority will be to provide our wonderful backers with their products!

story:
Why The Kivu by Sussen?

I was inspired to develop The Kivu Mason jar French press after breaking too many carafes, and being sorely disappointed with the options available. French press carafes are too fragile, a pain to replace, and cost too much. I want to be able to see what I’m brewing when using a French press, and to easily tell the carafe is clean, so a metal option just won't do.

I figured someone must have made a Mason jar French press, because it seemed so sensible. They had; it cost $100 and was made of wood. So much for sensible. The only other option was made of siliconized rubber, was not very attractive, and barely worked. Even at $30 it was a waste of money. Neither is available anymore anyway. So, in collaboration with Ratio Product Lab in Atlanta, I made The Kivu.

- John DeMicco, Founder of Sussen

 

Made of the Right Materials

Unlike past attempts at the Mason jar French press, The Kivu by Sussen is reasonably priced and solidly constructed of stainless steel and BPA-free materials. A naturally water-resistant cosy, hand-crafted by the women of The Nziza Collective in Rwanda, provides a stylish grip. 

Made with Purpose

Through a fortuitous connection via Land of a Thousand Hills Coffee's Do Good Initiative, we were able to establish a partnership with The Nziza Collective in Rwanda. These former victims of abuse produce the cozies for The Kivu. Each cozy earns one woman three days' wage.

 

Sustainable

The spout and plunger assemblies are meant to last. The Mason jar carafe is solid  glass, not borosilicate, so it is 100% recyclable. Another environmental advantage of Mason jars is that they already exist in the market, and don't require additional resources to design, create, or manufacture. The hand-crafted grips are made by the women of The Nziza Collective from natural fibers.

Sensible

You deserve a french press that’s practical, well designed, and isn’t overly expensive, and that’s what we’re making. The spout and plunger assembly are made of solid stainless steel. The dome accents are made using BPA-free food-grade polypropylene. Your coffee brews in contact with just glass and stainless steel, and pours over a stainless steel spout. The carafe is easily replaced for a couple of bucks.

Social Purpose (and the other sustainable)

The Nziza Collective is comprised of several hundred former victims of abuse, who now produce some of the finest coffee in the region, and craft baskets and mugs for sale through Land of a Thousand Hills Coffee during the coffee off-season. By selling components to Sussen directly, as part of our supply chain, they lessen their dependence on just one entity, and take a big step toward self-sufficiency and economic sustainability. By supporting The Kivu, you’re helping create ongoing economic opportunity for these women, and ensuring the sustainability of their business.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $65,000 and manufacture 2000 units in order to get The Kivu to you at a reasonable price, while covering the costs of tooling and manufacturing. Tooling - creating the molds and dies for manufacturing - makes up half the cost of The Kivu in this first run; the other half is the cost of manufacturing and parts. In exchange for your support we will provide you with The Kivu itself. 

 

Back us in any amount and select a specially priced perk.

You don't have to select a perk, but if you do, you can get The Kivu for up to 26% off the projected retail price!

 

As an extra perk, Nziza Coffee is available as an add-on and as part of a special bundle!

The coffee produced by the Nziza women is some of the highest rated coffee available and produces a brew with floral,tea, and honey notes as French press. 

 

What happens if we don't meet our goal?

If we don't meet our goal, any money will be refunded and no product will ship. If this happens, we will likely try again at a later time. Again, our ability to manufacture and ship requires us to raise $65,000 in funding through this campaign.

 

What we're all about

 Sussen was formed as a company in early 2019 to make sustainable, sensible, everyday products with social purpose. We realize sustainability takes two forms - environmental and economic. Sussen aims to address both. We're also big fans of sensible yet artful design. So, we're happy to bring you The Kivu, a useful, beautiful product that creates economic opportunity for women in the Kivu coffee growing region in Rwanda.

We are using only durable, premium materials in the production of The Kivu to ensure your coffee experience isn't ruined by cheap materials and that your press lasts a very long time.

 

Collaborators

We are incredibly lucky to have been able to work with Ratio Product Lab. They have extensive experience designing all sorts of consumer products and understand crowdfunding very well, having launched several of their own products this way themselves.

 

Land of a Thousand Hills Coffee creates purposeful work, and cultivates flourishing communities in Rwanda. Through their Do Good Initiative, they founded The Nziza Collective and provided them with supplies and training so these women could make and sell hand-crafted goods during the coffee growing off-season.  They jumped at the opportunity to involve Sussen and create a new opportunity for the Nziza women, and hand carried our cosy samples all the way to Atlanta from Rwanda.

 

The entrepreneurial women of The Nziza Collective designed and hand-made the cosy prototypes and samples.  From the samples they provided, we chose the final design for the grip, which appears in the latest photos. The cozies they will be crafting for you are extremely well made and unique to The Kivu. We couldn't be happier to work with them on this project.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Since we have made it through the design process and have a working prototype, we are ready to begin manufacturing. The next step is to have the molds and dies created so that the parts can be made and assembled. 

Tariffs and Trade

Unfortunately, there just aren’t US-based firms that have the ability to manufacture stainless steel parts with over-molding at the high quality and reasonable cost we require. It is still better for quality and cost-effectiveness to import these parts from China even with the current tariffs imposed by The U.S.. The Mason jars are made in The United States.

Shipping and Transportation

Shipping from Rwanda is challenging. Shipments of our cozies will need to be accompanied by a courier or combined with Land of a Thousand Hills coffee shipments bound for Atlanta, which complicates scheduling.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Love the project, but can't contribute? That doesn't mean you can't help. Whether you are contributing or not, we need your help spreading the word! Share our campaign with your friends and family.  Use the share icons up top and share it to Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, and even Facebook.

The Nziza Collective is comprised of several hundred former victims of abuse, who now produce some of the finest coffee in the region, and craft baskets and mugs for sale through Land of a Thousand Hills Coffee during the coffee off-season. By selling components to Sussen directly, as part of our supply chain, they lessen their dependence on just one entity, and take a big step toward self-sufficiency and economic sustainability. By supporting The Kivu, you’re helping create ongoing economic opportunity for these women, and ensuring the sustainability of their business.

 
What We Need & What You Get
We need to raise $65,000 and manufacture 2000 units in order to get The Kivu to you at a reasonable price, while covering the costs of tooling and manufacturing. Tooling - creating the molds and dies for manufacturing - makes up half the cost of The Kivu in this first run; the other half is the cost of manufacturing and parts. In exchange for your support we will provide you with The Kivu itself. 
 
Back us in any amount and select a specially priced perk.
You don't have to select a perk, but if you do, you can get The Kivu for up to 26% off the projected retail price!
 
As an extra perk, Nziza Coffee is available as an add-on and as part of a special bundle!
The coffee produced by the Nziza women is some of the highest rated coffee available and produces a brew with floral,tea, and honey notes as French press. 


 
What happens if we don't meet our goal?
If we don't meet our goal, any money will be refunded and no product will ship. If this happens, we will likely try again at a later time. Again, our ability to manufacture and ship requires us to raise $65,000 in funding through this campaign.
 
What we're all about
 Sussen was formed as a company in early 2019 to make sustainable, sensible, everyday products with social purpose. We realize sustainability takes two forms - environmental and economic. Sussen aims to address both. We're also big fans of sensible yet artful design. So, we're happy to bring you The Kivu, a useful, beautiful product that creates economic opportunity for women in the Kivu coffee growing region in Rwanda.
We are using only durable, premium materials in the production of The Kivu to ensure your coffee experience isn't ruined by cheap materials and that your press lasts a very long time.
 
Collaborators

We are incredibly lucky to have been able to work with Ratio Product Lab. They have extensive experience designing all sorts of consumer products and understand crowdfunding very well, having launched several of their own products this way themselves.
 
Land of a Thousand Hills Coffee creates purposeful work, and cultivates flourishing communities in Rwanda. Through their Do Good Initiative, they founded The Nziza Collective and provided them with supplies and training so these women could make and sell hand-crafted goods during the coffee growing off-season.  They jumped at the opportunity to involve Sussen and create a new opportunity for the Nziza women, and hand carried our cosy samples all the way to Atlanta from Rwanda.

 

The entrepreneurial women of The Nziza Collective designed and hand-made the cosy prototypes and samples.  From the samples they provided, we chose the final design for the grip, which appears in the latest photos. The cozies they will be crafting for you are extremely well made and unique to The Kivu. We couldn't be happier to work with them on this project.
 
 
Risks & Challenges
Since we have made it through the design process and have a working prototype, we are ready to begin manufacturing. The next step is to have the molds and dies created so that the parts can be made and assembled. 
Tariffs and Trade
Unfortunately, there just aren’t US-based firms that have the ability to manufacture stainless steel parts with over-molding at the high quality and reasonable cost we require. It is still better for quality and cost-effectiveness to import these parts from China even with the current tariffs imposed by The U.S.. The Mason jars are made in The United States.
Shipping and Transportation
Shipping from Rwanda is challenging. Shipments of our cozies will need to be accompanied by a courier or combined with Land of a Thousand Hills coffee shipments bound for Atlanta, which complicates scheduling.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Love the project, but can't contribute? That doesn't mean you can't help. Whether you are contributing or not, we need your help spreading the word! Share our campaign with your friends and family.  Use the share icons up top and share it to Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, and even Facebook.

story:
Overview

Polaris is now available: the first compact and multifunctional Machine for “Shaked Coffee” with low energy consumption (550W for coffee group + 80W for mixer and ice crusher). It is able to make, in a few minutes, a real Italian espresso coffee or an excellent Shaked Coffee, but also Slushes, Milkshakes, Cocktails and much more thanks to the different independent functions.

We have presented the first prototype on Indiegogo and now that the production phase has started, we are offering you a preview of the final product, ready to be purchased. Polaris is currently available for Espresso Point capsules or for compatible and original Nespresso capsules.

Thanks to your suggestions, over time, we have improved its aesthetics, reducing its size and enhancing its performance. Now it can be yours with just one click.

Polaris is available with 220V and 110V voltage; thanks to your valuable contribution, it will also be available in 24V and 12V (for campers, boats and buses).

 

With your funds we could also develop a new version for paper pods or for special capsules with closed systems.

Polaris's Key Features and Functionality

 

Polaris's Being Built and Assembled 

 

3D Printer 

Some of the Polaris components are manufactured with 3D Printer

 

Polaris's Mass Production and Tooling for Electronic data Testing

 

Polaris's Manufactured Components 

 

Polaris's Spare Parts 


Polaris's Spare Parts Video

 

Project Timeline

story:
Uncle Budsy's Barbecue Food Truck

Uncle Budsy's Barbecue has it's roots based in Texas going back to 1964. The original Uncle Budsy has recently passed away at the age of 79. He cooked great tasting BBQ for customers in Dallas for over 45 years with a secret Texas rub of 16 herbs and spices along with a delicious Jamaican flavored glaze and BBQ Sauces that only he could master. Uncle Budsy was a true Pit Master having passed his Texas/Jamaican Secret onto our Founder.

Our founder Michael Davis learned how to cook the great taste of Uncle Budsy's from the master himself at the age of 14 and is carrying on as Uncle Budsy now. He has since moved to Portland, Oregon and teamed up with another Pit Master of 45 years, Chef JP to bring the best BBQ imaginable. And what better place than Portland Oregon where cannabis is legal and BBQ fans can solve their cravings of "The Munchies".

Chef JP established his catering business in 1998 and has operated a catering kitchen and specialized in full-service catering and event planning for events in the region both at client sites and street fairs along with event spaces and halls. For most events, Uncle Budsy's Barbecue provides referrals to additional vendors, manages client rental equipment needs and provides event management expertise on the day of the event.

With the legalization of recreational cannabis use in Oregon in 2014, we have plans for establishing a cannabis friendly restaurant under the name Uncle Budsy's Barbecue. Currently public consumption of cannabis and cannabis infused products are still not legal in Oregon but anticipation for that legalization within the next 5 years is expected. Until that time Uncle Budsy's will be a straight Texas Barbecue Restaurant. In the meantime the release of a Cannabis Cookbook and Infused Barbecue Sauces sold in retail cannabis stores along with   catered cannabis dinners hosted in a private cannabis lounge in Portland. These together will allow the connection with the cannabis industry until it is completely legal.

Uncle Budsy's Barbecue will initially only sell traditional non infused barbecue from the restaurant with CBD infused sauces offered online and through health food stores. THC infused sauces can only be sold through licensed retail cannabis stores. In addition we intend to hold monthly private cannabis dinners at our establishment. This until we can also have cannabis infused products on our public menu.

We intend to merge Uncle Budsy's into a NASDAQ publicly traded company along with our, cannabis friendly hotel and lounge - www.420HolidayHotel.com a cannabis lounge www.420Holiday.club and our ticket brokerage www.CannaTixx.com

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $60,000 to fund the launch of our BBQ Food Truck and BBQ Sauce Line. This will require $10,000 for a 5,000 gallon run of sauce with our co-packager, $30,000 for the actual truck and finish out, $10,000 for licensing and $10,000 for supplies and marketing.

We are preselling 10ounce bottles of Uncle Budsy's Original Texas Style BBQ Sauce with the Secrets of Jamaica for $10 Contribution

All contributors of at least $25 will receive a complimentary BBQ Dinner which includes 3 meats and tasty sides.

All contributors of at least $500 will receive a $50 Uncle Budsy's Restaurant Visa gift card.

All $1,000 contributors will receive an advanced copy of our soon to be released cookbook titled: Uncle Budsy's 420 Favorite Cannabis Recipes.

All $2,000 contributors will receive an Uncle Budsy's T-shirt or Baseball Cap with the Uncle Budsy logo.

All $5,000 and up contributors will receive both Uncle Budsy's T-shirt and Baseball Cap with the Uncle Budsy logo, a copy of the Uncle Budsy's 420 Favorite Cannabis Recipes and 5 BBQ Dinner Coupons.

The Impact

There is a definite need to bring great tasting BBQ here to Portland as who doesn't like BBQ? I have been vegetarian 4 times in my life the last ending in 2013. Now I am back over to the Dark Side slinging meat dinners to people here in Portland. People love our food and we have a duty to bring that to as many people as possible. In addition this will enhance the local economy and increase jobs in the area. 

Risks & Challenges

Any new restaurant or food establishment is a risk to success. We intend to establish a brick and mortar restaurant but the proof of concept about our BBQ will be tested on the lower scale of the Food Truck.

Other Ways You Can Help


If you can't help right now as a contributor we ask you to:

Tell your friends and relatives about our campaign.
Like us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
Use the Indiegogo Share tools!
Visit Portland and come see us.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
• My Name is Jack Tracy and Im extremely (extremely) passionate about delivering people healthy food. I've gone unto the far depths of the internet exploring the current health paradigm in our culture and why people are so sick. My answer...because of the food and environement provided for us. I'm an avid health-nut and nutrition obsessed and have educated myself to a high degree in the subject (bachelors in dietetics officially). Active Milk is the only raw, living food beverage available on the market. It's glass only, made with organic ingredients, sugar/dairy/gluten/plastic free, and provides the necessary means for proper every day nutrition. 
  • Active milk is the first installation in a multi-faceted system designed to get people off of drugs and processed food (interchangable) and into a healthy state of mind and body to facilitate the consciousness evolution happening on the planet right now.
  • Contributors will help achieve total political, economic, energetic, and agricultural freedom through the renewal of our food supply. Active Milk will enable me to fund the projects I've created to re-localize food and free us all from our enslavement to the system of corporational food ownership. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

I need enough money to get off the ground and make active milk available to every demographic which is possible with the very inexpensive production costs and the owner(me) willing to cut his profits in order to make the food available to everyone. 

Active Milk is the only real, true, living beverage on the planet. This product has the ability to raise the bar for the food market as a whole. When a product enters the system and is far better than everything and tastes great and it less expensive people will be forced to upgrade the substance of their product. The reason everything out there is not as good is because everything is usually 2-4 weeks old which is long enough to render it useless. Active milk is made fresh every week and is preserved with means that do not destroy the integrity of the product. 

The funds will go into active milk and furthering the goals as best we can. 

The biggest challenge is delivering the high integrity of the product. But we will do this with multiple production facilities across the Us who will distribute to their accounts locally. We will also accomplish this by staying up to date on all scientific breakthroughs in the field of food preservation and maintaining the integrity of the product that is going to give people the health benefits we promise. We will not send the product more than 500-1000 miles to ensure sustainability and integrity of the product. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help I encourage you to research the nature of the food supply today in america, as well as alternative methods to maintaining optimal health. There is a myriad of information available today and each individual exposed contributes to this cause.

story:
Pop Up Event in London

 

If you have visited all the dog, rabbit and cat cafes already, we’ve got something new for you – a special cafe where you can see real sheep. Sheepland is a place where you can eat snacks like an apple pie with cinnamon ice cream, sandwiches, salads, various chocolate desserts and many other delicacies. Drink some coffee, tea or other beverage you like and most important pet and spend time with the friendly outgoing sheep Jake and Jenny

The idea is to experience nature in the middle of a big city. Having these two cute sheep nearby makes it easy to commune with nature and to learn more about the interesting creatures.

 

 

              

 

6 000 tickets available for the event

To be able to organize the event, we need at least 500 bookings. If we do not reach this number until 12.05.2017 you will get your money back. In that case, we will try to set up event once again in the near future. If our event succeeds, there is a big chance that Sheepland will become permanent cafe.

 

Inspiration

If you are wondering how it will work, here you can see an example of a similar cafe located in Korea :)
 
 

For updates visit our website

www.sheep-cafe.com

story:
I have had an engineering company for 12 years, but this project came from a health issue. The first of January of 2016 I woke up with an excruciating pain in my toe and after getting a checkup from my Doctor he said that I had a high concentration of uric acid. I tried some recommendations but the big surprise was when my grandmother recommended me to use the seed of the avocado to do a Tea, only 4 hours after drinking it, I fell good. I have been using it for 2 years now and I think is a great use for a product that usually goes to the trash.  

I have done plenty of tests, like cutting the avocado seed in smaller parts, letting it dry, drying it on the oven, with similar results. Actually, I have found the best is to cut it in small slices or even chop it and let it dry for a couple of days before doing the tea.   

What surprised me the most was that the flavor is good, I could drink it without any sweetener. But trying to eat the seed directly, the taste is really bitter and very unpleasant. So I think the best option is the tea.   

I have contacted one of the biggest producers of avocado in Mexico, actually, his company is the one that runs an add on the Super Bowl every year. (Check out the last one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ijVLdH5dt-c) So, the possibility to get the seeds and a very huge quantity of them is real.  

I plan to use the funding for starting a small production line of avocado seed tea and maybe in the future scale it up.   

I have already quoted some machines to have a production of 45-60 bags, with 3 to 4 grams of tea, per minute and that will be possible with the funding. I already have the place to locate the machines and the experience to do the startup of the line, I am planning to take advantage of our automation experience to do an automatic production line. Anyway I will hire some people for getting the seeds and the shipment of the tea.

I think is a great product, and is not available everywhere in the world. It still needs more tests to know the actual benefits and other things like the expiry date, but as a first step, we can make the tea available. 

The biggest risks I see on this project are:
-The delivery of the machines on time and working, I own an engineering company and I know the delivery dates can change but my company is able to do the installation and maintenance of the machines. Also, the delivery times are of 1 month so I am trying to cover the due dates.
-A study to know the components of the seed could make it not suitable for human consumption. I plan to do some of this studies with the universities of my hometown that have food engineers.
-Sourcing the seeds could become difficult if the producers see value on it. I plan to close a good deal and a contract to be sure the sourcing will not be a problem for at least 3 years.

story:
Cocktail Life

Everyone loves and enjoy a refreshing cocktail, whether it’s on a beach, in your favourite bar or local restaurant. 

But it’s not always easy to just make your favourite cocktail in the comfort of your own home. But Cocktail Life is here to help...

 

What We Need & What You Get

High quality Spirits

Marvellous Mixers

Fresh Ingredients 

Your box will have the right amount of everything you so you can make your cocktails for you and your close ones to try. 

Along with a history about the cocktail and the instructions on how to perfectly craft the cocktail, to get the best and most refreshing taste! ? 

We will be working with small and large companies to provide the best and newest spirits for you to discover, along with a little snack to go along with your cocktail.

 

The Club

Our goal is to teach people at home to become a mixologist with our skills, but to also help new distilleries get their name out in the market, whilst providing high quality cocktails for our club members.

We have a history of running e-commerce businesses and our love for cocktails and making cocktails got us excited to not only spread the joy of cocktails, but to also teach people a new skill that can be learnt at home.

 

Risks & Challenges

We expect lots of challenges but have our ideas to overcome them and to be the best on the market that our club members stay with us due to our high quality customer service and valuable service. 

We will see competitions from other companies, but we do see a small gap in the market, where people aren’t just being taught how to make the cocktail, but just sent a pre made cocktail. (Where’s the fun in that!?) 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

A contribution does not have to be in the form of money, we know times are tricky at the moment and everyone is in a different situation. BUT a share on social media, let your mate know what you saw, tell your family about cocktail life, tell your work colleagues and just spreading the word can MASSIVELY help us achieve our goal!

Thank you for your support for Cocktail Life
story_txt: Cocktail LifeEveryone loves and enjoy a refreshing cocktail, whether it’s on a beach, in your favourite bar or local restaurant. But it’s not always easy to just make your favourite cocktail in the comfort of your own home. But Cocktail Life is here to help... What We Need & What You GetHigh quality SpiritsMarvellous MixersFresh Ingredients Your box will have the right amount of everything you so you can make your cocktails for you and your close ones to try. Along with a history about the cocktail and the instructions on how to perfectly craft the cocktail, to get the best and most refreshing taste! ? We will be working with small and large companies to provide the best and newest spirits for you to discover, along with a little snack to go along with your cocktail. The ClubOur goal is to teach people at home to become a mixologist with our skills, but to also help new distilleries get their name out in the market, whilst providing high quality cocktails for our club members.We have a history of running e-commerce businesses and our love for cocktails and making cocktails got us excited to not only spread the joy of cocktails, but to also teach people a new skill that can be learnt at home. Risks & ChallengesWe expect lots of challenges but have our ideas to overcome them and to be the best on the market that our club members stay with us due to our high quality customer service and valuable service. We will see competitions from other companies, but we do see a small gap in the market, where people aren’t just being taught how to make the cocktail, but just sent a pre made cocktail. story:
Introduction

 

My name is Munish Sharma, founder of OM DATA, a Norway based software company. I have 19 years of work experience (as a manager) from Norwegian restaurant industry and more than 7 years of work experience in Information Technology.  

 

           

 

https://www.dagsavisen.no/demokraten/nyheter/smart-losning-for-de-sma-1.1434820 . 

When I was working in the restaurant business (as an owner-manager), I was coming across a number of problems (mentioned below) on the daily basis. Inspite of all the hard work, after almost no family time, with so many repeating problems and with expensive available solutions to run the business every year, I almost had nothing called as savings.

One day, I asked myself, how I can address these problems once for all and can have some more time to spend with my family without making my business suffer or using business resources which have always been very limited.

 

             

 

This was the time when I decided to find a solution to these problems and started searching for a reliable and effective solutions to address these problems. After approx. 8 months of research I couldn't find any reliable or effective solution available in the market, but instead I found that it’s not only me who was suffering from such problems, but many other small and medium scaled restaurant owners and managers are also facing the same issues.

 

     

 

Now it was clear to me that I should do something, and I founded OM DATA company to create a solution, after two and half years of research and development my company OM DATA was finally able to develop an "All-In-One" digital solution called ORC (OM Restaurant Cloud) for the hospitality industry (restaurants, clubs, pubs, cafes, food-courts, street food stalls etc.). ORC simplifies their work. It is a cutting-edge technology that streamlines the restaurant business to a higher competitive position.

 

Problem we are solving 

 

The hospitality industry is suffering from a number of problems like: 

  • Every day increasing competition.
  • Regulatory frameworks. 
  • Expensive rents.
  • Overburdened with work.   
  • High working & maintenance cost. 
  • Increasing raw-product prices. 
  • Expensive and complex modular-based solutions from multiple vendors. 
  • High wastage and paper consumption. 
  • Poor knowledge of IT and its benefits to their business. 
  • Poor routines etc.

 

                                                             

 

 

All these issues get combined, create a situation wherein the total cost of running a business often exceeds the total income for many small and medium scaled restaurant business resulting in increased debts and consequently forcing the business to close or shut down. 

 

         

 

But now these businesses can have a simple, reliable, effective, smart and innovative solution by their side, guaranteeing positive results. 

 

ORC All-In-One Solution

 

ORC will address a number of above-mentioned problems simply by providing knowledge and needed tools of new smart technology, clearly showing & providing huge benefits to their everyday business. ORC has been created after a detailed study and many years of work experience in the restaurant industry.

 

        

 

ORC is a much reasonable and user-friendly digital solution for the hospitality industry than today's single modular-based solutions. ORC will replace complex and single modular-based products and services with an "All-In-One" cloud-based solution. ORC is an innovation for the hospitality industry, which guarantees positive results to our customers, our partners, community, environment and our company.

                                   

                                               

 

 

With ORC, client company can realize reduction in:

  • Annual operating expenses.
  • Paper and paperwork.
  • Wastage.
  • Vendors.
  • carbon foot print.
  • Over work and much more. 

 

ORC creates new value in the form of:

  • Digitalization of work.
  • Smart, simple and easy to use back-office.
  • Simplification of work.
  • New digital sales channel.
  • More customer engagement.
  • Increased efficiency and productivity.
  • Streamlining communication with employees.
  • Higher security & clarity of business data, with global access.
  • New saving-opportunities both in terms of resources, time, work and environment.
  • And much more.

                  

Worlds first digital restaurant system, where technology is paying to its user in a number of ways without increasing their business operating cost. 

 

The Impact

 

Innovation in technology has changed many traditional methods and business-models in recent years. New disruptive innovative technologies contribute in simplification of work, cost-cutting, increased data clarity + security and are continuously adding new values in user businesses.

 

                          

 

Disruptive innovative technology in the hospitality sector can make a huge difference to the small and medium-sized restaurant businesses, which are often exposed to huge competition from large chains/ brands, which are well equipped with technological tools finally driving out the smaller food outlets/ restaurants out of the competitive market.

Our goal is to offer a user-friendly and cost-effective digital solution to the small and medium-sized restaurant businesses to ensure their digital growth and increase their competitiveness by using disruptive innovative technology ORC.

 

                                        

 

 

Epidemic crises

 

ORC will also contribute and help member businesses in case of any future epidemics like world has just witnessed. ORC will secure member businesses by freezing some of their costs and by making a contribution in member business loss, incurred by any such crises like covid-19.  

                                                                                                                                    

 

This will provide member business increased financial security for their business and will decrease the threat of increase in liability. 

 

Accomplishments & challenges

 

OM DATA consists a team of 5 experts with their core expertise in hospitality industry as well as in information communication technology (ICT). We are also in co-operation with two leading accounting companies, DNB bank and Mastercard.

 

 

              

             

 

ORC solution is approved by Norwegian authorities and is granted as an innovation (global level).

 

 

                                          

 

This industry includes approximately 7490+ restaurant businesses in Norway and approximately 23 460+ restaurant businesses in Scandinavia (according statista, Norway business registry office and our own R&D), where our plan is to provide our solution to 15-20% of the mentioned businesses within our first 3 operational years, starting from 01.06.2020

 

 

      

 

      

 

ORC doesn't have any direct competitor yet in the market who can provide similar results as ORC can, which gives us the unique opportunity to be in the lead or to be two steps ahead from the competitors. The only big challenge we are facing is lack of funds to promote & provide this product and service to the above-mentioned businesses.

 

What do We Need? 

 

We are in need of funds to ensure:

  • ORC product launch in Norway and Scandinavia. 
  • Acquisition of support from Innovation Norway and EU.
  • Hardware purchase.  
  • Further research & development. 

 

 

What we are offering  

We are offering 4 types of smart membership cards to our backers for their support.

 

        

 

I-Cards                                            10%   (validation 1 year, after activation)

C-Card                                            15%   (validation 1 year, after activation)

S-Card                                            20%   (validation 3 years, after activation)

G-Card                                           30%   (validation 3 years, after activation)

 

These smart membership cards will provide discount/ bonus opportunities in all ORC member Restaurants, clubs, pubs, cafe etc., OM DATA products and services and at many other digital platforms where we are @ work. 

 

Extra Benefits of becoming a early supporter:

1. These smart cards will provide you valuable benefits, 5 - 11 times of paid card value.

2. Receive a surprise gift from your own Real Tree (planted by TREE FOR LIFE), or get a WISH      fulfilled from your Wishlist. 

3. Add your favourite restaurants, clubs, bars or cafes in your preference list. Providing you a quick opportunity to gain extra benefits, and at the same time you are helping your favourite place.

4. Let our Technology appreciate you for being a real backer & user, even when times are hard like these days.

 

 

Please note: It is not a standard offer, it is a very special and limited offer for our backers as our token of appreciation for their early support. Let us know if you have any questions or please check frequently asked questions and answers section. 

 

Please visit our company website to review our products and services www.omdata.world.  

 

Other Ways, You Can Help

 

We are also looking for passionate and talented people, and if you think you can help in one or another way and you have any kind of experience from the hospitality or IT industry, then please let us know. You may also help us to spread the word in your city or restaurant community.

And let's make a difference for these small and medium-sized restaurant businesses.

 

We heartily thank you all for sparing your valuable time and effort to support this project.

story:
Short Summary

I love new things, and this idea of having a dark kitchen represents a change of path in my life.

I currently work in the advertising and design area, but due to life circumstances, this new purpose appeared that could solve many things in my life

Many people see me trying something, and because of my physical defect they do not believe that I can achieve it, that is a motivation for me, since I must show them that I can do it, and they must also try new things in their life.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need to resolve some current debt issues.
  • We must legalize and form a company
  • Get a space where we can install the kitchen and that is in a place with a good demand for food.
  • An internal communication and billing system, computer or tablet
  • Industrial kitchen equipment, deep fryer, griddle, rotary heater, an industrial kitchen, dishwasher, meat grinder, blender, food processor, refrigerator and freezer, stoves, raw material and supplies
  • All this for our Lebanese food project, but in the future we want to build other kitchens with different food concepts, in order to expand income and generate more sources of employment
  • Having set up our project, I would like to set up a professional video studio, to open a YouTube channel with easy cooking recipes, prepared by me (Juanfra) ... and finally I would also like to rejoin the gamer world, through twitch, setting up a good computer for playing games with live broadcasts

The Impact

We have been working with Lebanese food, from my home, and people have been delighted with the taste, but we are already full, since we currently have no space or opportunity for growth

We want many more people to be able to enjoy our products, and to be able to reduce production and delivery times.

Risks & Challenges

We have the confidence of our current clients, but we have not wanted to expand the business, since we do not currently have capacity due to lack of equipment and space

Other Ways You Can Help

Do not worry if you cannot support this project, if you are reading these lines, it means that you were interested and that makes us happy

What we can ask you is to share this publication so that more people can see you support our project
