story:
My name is Robert Rupnik. I am a serial entrepreneur. My first businesses were begun in early 90's. I am an alumnus of Faculty of Electrical Engineering at the University of Ljubljana, Slovenia, EU. For the last twenty - five years I was actively running companies professionaly dealing with designing and manufacturing  of  Material handling products - plastic crates equipped with RFID systems, Biblioteca - RFID automatic library systems, High -Tech packaging machinery, Robotic systems , Material handling, Supply Chain management and Logistics in general. My professional career comprises good understanding of the matter and astounding achievements in all these fields. 

I have had a grand vision in my mind, since I was born. I am a adrenaline junkie, practicing car racing, extreme cycling, wind-surfing, sailing and off-piste skiing.I am also a former Basketball & Baseball Player.

I can calmly say, that I am an Optimistic Thinker, who can create a Compelling Vision of the future, with an Initiative. I enjoy being in charge and making decisions, and yes I am motivated to lead. Of course I am Self-motivated and Energetic too, and prepared to work hard, for a very long time, to realize my goals and goals of my Team. I am able to take Risks, and make Decisions, plus that I am Resilient as well. 

This is also a family business.

We all love to cook, especially my nephew, Alen who is actually generating his own recipes and is a proud member of top 13 amateur chef selection of MasterChef Slovenia season 1 in year 2015. He also joined this project as an important team member. 

Alen is following his motto "Food is Chemistry" faithfully.

He participated in school competitions, where he achieved some bronze and silver prizes from mathematics and physics, and also won gold award in logic. He led some school events, where he gained some experience in public speaking. He's always been interested in chemistry, on the basis of which he continued his studies. Alen is a Student at The Faculty of Chemistry and Chemical Technology of the University of Ljubljana. He is currently attending a master's degree program. 

He's done diverse student work, such as promotion, tasting, sales promotion, storage, easier construction work, work and production management. He is a team player, but he can also work independently. He has been participating in the Celje Students' Club as an activist and a member of the Supervisory Board for the fourth year where he has already organized many independent youth projects and gained experience in the field of organizing. As a member, he was able to attend various lectures and workshops on the topic leadership skills and teamwork.

He can recognize opportunities.

Alens's main hobby is cooking. From the beginning, he was inspired to create and bake cakes or various confectionery. Later, he was also overwhelmed by a bit more serious cooking, which led him all the way to participation in the MasterChef Slovenia competition, 1st season, where he passed the top 13. amateur chefs in Slovenia. He confirms his passion for cooking by stating :

"Now I am most pleased to discover and refine new cooking technics. I love cooking Italian food, I simply admire Italian cuisine, preparing those real, original pizzas and homemade pasta. Recently, I've been discovering techniques and secrets of molecular cuisine."

Beside that he emphasizes :

"Due to the experience and competences I have received so far, I am ready to take responsibility and cooperation with others, as well as scheduling work tasks and timely adjusting of my obligations. I love team work, I am pleased to create, explore and invent new things."                                                                                                           

Alen also loves to play in theater roles and to appearing in movies. He was a member of the Youth theaters of Pandam, under whose auspices they have performed a famous drama: "The event in the City Goga". He also performed in a very known Slovenian series: "Carps are there, Esoxs are not", by Tone Partljič.

Peter is Alen's father. He is a Graduated Engineer of Mechatronics with many pronounced qualities. He is an experienced man, with a demonstrated history of working in the Consumer Goods Industry, Production development and Controling. He is skilled in Emerging Technology Applications, with extensive IT and Software programming knowledge. He is also above average in Sales negotiations, Business planning, Coaching and Advertising. Strong professional Attitude and the Innovation - oriented Entrepreneurship are deeply present. Peter is able to see situations from a variety of perspectives and come up with original ideas. He is also good at coming up with sound solutions to the problems we're facing. He took over the job of technical director of the company. In his youth he dealt with modeling and rocketry.

 

Our intention is to rise enough funds to finance an application production including all the programming works, setting up the entire system,  marketing activities for the immediate commencement of worldwide business - PIZZA ORDERING AND DELIVERY SERVICE -  by offering all kind of exclusive and for the contributors attractive perks :                

Perk No. 1 - Starting with Reflection of the Attention, mentioning you as a contributor in Social Media.                                                                            

Perk No. 2 - Delivery of crunchy /azzPIzza/ Pizza, ( 299.999999 AZZ Tokens Voucher added )  

 

Perk No. 3 - /azzPIzza/ T - Shirt, ( 299.999999 AZZ Tokens Voucher added )

 

 

 

Perk No. 4 - Ceramic Pizza Baking Stone Set (3pcs), (599.99999 AZZ Tokens Voucher added)  

 

Perk No. 5 - Tabletop Chimeneas Pizza Baking Oven (3,299.99999 AZZ Tokens Voucher added)  

 

Perk No. 6 -  Wood Fired Pizza Oven ( 8,999.99999 AZZ Tokens Voucher added )

 

Perk No. 7 - REAL GOLD azzPIzza Party for a backer and 20 of his friends for $1000.

Bidding will be conducted on the azzPIzza Official Facebook Page! We will offer one Perk per day, starting with the fifty-first day of  /azzPIzza/ INDIEGOGO campaign and running out at the sixtieth day of the campaign. Starting bid is set at $1000. In principle, this is a deposit that allows participation in the Auction. The Reserve is set at $39,999. The winner will have a 24 hours time span to pay the winning bid for a perk No.7.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Transportation by private jet for 8 pax is included in the price. ** Each of the participants will receive a hefty bunch of AZZ Tokens. Detailed rules of participation are published on all our social media channels. 

 

 

The campaign is so important to me, because I would like to prove myself, that the business is manageable at the global level and because, I would like to offer really good service to Pizza eaters and other Italian cusine lovers from one side and always to deliver highest quality product and best service to the other. In addition, we are introducing new technologies, that will save consumer time and reduce costs when ordering quality foods. 

 

Could we cover the territory from San Francisco over London and Moscow or Beijing and Tokio towards Sydney within a month ? 

One can say one thing : YES WE CAN! 

 

We would like to gather up at least USD 99,000.

We gonna spend it on an application production, on setting up the entire system, on marketing activities, to establish a network of azzPIzza bakeries. Additionally we will spend money on related travel expenses in terms of quality check of the suppliers and signing the contracts on site to secure early business operation.

Of course we are offering very unique perks to all of you, who believe in our idea and who are prepared to contribute to the goal.

From simple azzPIzza Pizza deliveries..........................The regular price is planned not to exceed 9.90 USD / EUR  ( depending on the market  ) per one of our 7 standard weekly available Pizzas plus one extra < Pizza of the week > at the reduced price of 9.00 USD as a Perk No.2,

over a azzPIzza T - Shirt for the same amount of money 9.00 USD as a Perk No.3,

to the Ceramic Pizza Baking Stone Set ( 3 pcs )  for 19.00 USD as a Perk No.4,

and a Pizza Baking Oven Tabletop Chimeneas for 119.00 USD as a Perk No.5.

A Perk No.6 is represented by the Wood Fired Pizza Oven.                                                                                          

*Just in case we wouldn't be able to deliver Pizzas at the territory you are comming from yet , we will replace this perk by delivering an azzPIzza T - Shirt to you. 

We consider adding one more attractive perk. A Perk No.7 is the REAL GOLD azzPIzza Party for a backer and 20 of his friends for $1000 starting bid.

By the way, have you ever eaten GOLD leaves ?  

 

Perk No.1 is simply a reflection of the attention. It's a $1 perk in exchange for a Thank you or Social Media Mention on our https://t.co/nH0Iz4dV5s website or on any of Social Media :

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/azzPIzzaWorld/                                 

Twitter : https://twitter.com/AzzPizzaWorld                                                             

Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/azzpizzaglobal/                                                                

Telegram :https://t.me/joinchat/HcVB4hHVoTnLs4Brb9Srhw?fbclid=IwAR0P5SZ_IzGo4HAKetv35lJmIO7juN82RsETXibNJe6WTcCshWtUgVcECaM; or elsewhere. 

 

When we won't reach our entire goal, we will still accomplish the project with limited resources. Most probably we needn't entail giving up any of the features.

 

* You need to be aware that the Funds, that could be used for the azzPIzza business set up and run are not equal to the sum, we will receive from you dear backers. The Perks have to be purchased and distributed to you as well.

  

App production sounds so simple! It is much more than that. We are producing and coding azzPIzza Web Pages, Landing Pages, Android and iPhone Applications, it is an Referral System running behind the scenes which incorporate a Back Office with an Up - To - Date Accounting System. Servers Maintenance is included as well. 

To be able to offer the best service to you Dear clients - Pizza eaters - Pizza lovers, we unite the best of family owned, small but dedicated Pizza Bakeries from all over the world. Here are some of by Pizza Management strictly defined demands to be fulfilled by the suppliers :

  1. To provide bio / eco / organic certified ingredients
  2. To ensure gluten free and dairy free products
  3. To be able to fulfill vegan and vegetarian demand
  4. To comply with HACCP food safety and hygiene regulations  
  5. To ensure delivery within a radius of 15 km in the span of 20 minutes

In order to meet our expectations regarding time scheduling, we have to use different ways to promote our business. We will do that by employing all kind of marketing strategies accompanied by the newest and the most popular available chanells for covering the masses. We certainly will search for an expert opinion of Chefs and the written word of  journalists from that line of business.

To reach all of you beautiful people, our Buyers and our Suppliers we need to travel a lot. 

 

The project is really valuable to you folks. Why?

Simplicity & Speed

By using the application your valuable time is beeing saved. Cashless payment is enabled.We are introducing Blockchain Technology, Smart Contracts, Cryptocurrency named AZZ, Mobile Wallets, Mobile Digital Money Registers, etc. In fact, you will never have to worry about cash in your pockets anymore.

Just grab your Smartphone and GO ! 

We see the future as : 1 Standard >azzPIzza< PIZZA = 1 AZZ Token.*

*The initial purpose of AZZ Token is to enhance the supply chain management of azzPIzza and to offer customers payment with digital currency.
AZZ Token is not designed or intended for investment or wealth management purposes. The Company makes no assurance regarding the market value or liquidity of AZZ Token as established through trading exchanges or any other mechanism. AZZ Token is an ERC20 token published on the Ethereum network.

Quality & Food Integrity

You can be sure, that only the best is comming at your table guaranteed by the implementation of the highest  food processing standards from the ingredients control up to the respect of hygienic conditions by HACCP system implementation. Hazard analysis and critical control points or HACCP is a systematic preventive approach to food safety from biological, chemical, and physical hazards in production processes that can cause the finished product to be unsafe, and designs measurements to reduce these risks to a safe level. In this manner, HACCP is referred as the prevention of hazards rather than finished product inspection. The HACCP system can be used at all stages of a food chain, from food production and preparation processes including packaging, distribution, etc.

Differentiation of azzPIzza business model 

  • azzPIzza - PI stands for PIZZA, shall become a pizza trendsetter and a synonym for tastefulness.
  • Always fresh, always crispy. Best eco ingredients only are guaranteed.
  • Worlwide delivery service is provided.
  • Delivery within twenty minutes is our challenge!
  • Why we shouldn't be thinking about using the drones for Pizza delivery?
  • 7 + 1 menu diversifies your pizza experience during all week long .
  • Our offer is as follows: for every 10 purchased Pizzas is 1 Pizza gratis plus there is an option to join azzPIzza Affiliate Program and get FREE PIZZAs or earn money.  
  • Last minute thoughts:  Would you be interested in the Pizza builder, when this function exists? You will be able to create Pizza with your favorite toppings, sizes and crusts.
    Your opinion counts !

 

What we gonna do if something is going to go wrong?

Of course risks and obstacles exist; we aren't naive.

We are pretty sure we will overcome them unharmed. Running my own businesses since 1990 successfully and having the entrepreneurship in my blood are sufficient guarantor for this claim. Of course the attitude and a strong passion are the most important part of my personal character and ultimately last but not least  > never give it up < philosophy characterize me as well.

How the challenges will be solved? First of all we won't allow just from the start, that something goes wrong by taking care of all > the little things <. Of course we would hire only highly qualified, capable and dedicated staff. 

 

Maybe some of you can't contribute, but you could help us in other ways.

  • Please make some noise about azzPIzza Campaign!
  • Share FREE PIZZA Idea!
  • Inform people about our azzPIzza Affiliate Program and possible Passive Income!
  • Is a good pizzeria in your neighborhood there? Go there and ask them, if they are ready to boost their sales by using the azzPIzza Application!
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo Share Tools!

 

  • Don't forget to follow the AZZ Token Pre-sale Campaign. 
  • You can earn AZZ Tokens by Participating in our Bounty Threads Program, or getting them for free during our Airdrops.
  • Gain AZZ Tokens as a Present by contributing to our INDIEGOGO Campaign, buying different Perks.
  • Please don't forget to download azzPIzza Mobile iOS and Android wallets when available! 

 

     IT'S A GENERATION * Z * FRANCHISING COMPANY!
story_txt:
My name is Robert Rupnik. I am a serial entrepreneur. My first businesses were begun in early 90's. I am an alumnus of Faculty of Electrical Engineering at the University of Ljubljana, Slovenia, EU. For the last twenty - five years I was actively running companies professionaly dealing with designing and manufacturing  of  Material handling products - plastic crates equipped with RFID systems, Biblioteca - RFID automatic library systems, High -Tech packaging machinery, Robotic systems , Material handling, Supply Chain management and Logistics in general. My professional career comprises good understanding of the matter and astounding achievements in all these fields. 
I have had a grand vision in my mind, since I was born. I am a adrenaline junkie, practicing car racing, extreme cycling, wind-surfing, sailing and off-piste skiing.I am also a former Basketball & Baseball Player.
I can calmly say, that I am an Optimistic Thinker, who can create a Compelling Vision of the future, with an Initiative. I enjoy being in charge and making decisions, and yes I am motivated to lead. Of course I am Self-motivated and Energetic too, and prepared to work hard, for a very long time, to realize my goals and goals of my Team. I am able to take Risks, and make Decisions, plus that I am Resilient as well. 
This is also a family business.
We all love to cook, especially my nephew, Alen who is actually generating his own recipes and is a proud member of top 13 amateur chef selection of MasterChef Slovenia season 1 in year 2015. He also joined this project as an important team member. 

Alen is following his motto "Food is Chemistry" faithfully.
He participated in school competitions, where he achieved some bronze and silver prizes from mathematics and physics, and also won gold award in logic. He led some school events, where he gained some experience in public speaking. He's always been interested in chemistry, on the basis of which he continued his studies. Alen is a Student at The Faculty of Chemistry and Chemical Technology of the University of Ljubljana. He is currently attending a master's degree program. 
He's done diverse student work, such as promotion, tasting, sales promotion, storage, easier construction work, work and production management. He is a team player, but he can also work independently. He has been participating in the Celje Students' Club as an activist and a member of the Supervisory Board for the fourth year where he has already organized many independent youth projects and gained experience in the field of organizing. As a member, he was able to attend various lectures and workshops on the topic leadership skills and teamwork.
He can recognize opportunities.
Alens's main hobby is cooking. From the beginning, he was inspired to create and bake cakes or various confectionery. Later, he was also overwhelmed by a bit more serious cooking, which led him all the way to participation in the MasterChef Slovenia competition, 1st season, where he passed the top 13. amateur chefs in Slovenia. He confirms his passion for cooking by stating :
"Now I am most pleased to discover and refine new cooking technics. I love cooking Italian food, I simply admire Italian cuisine, preparing those real, original pizzas and homemade pasta. Recently, I've been discovering techniques and secrets of molecular cuisine."
Beside that he emphasizes :
"Due to the experience and competences I have received so far, I am ready to take responsibility and cooperation with others, as well as scheduling work tasks and timely adjusting of my obligations. I love team work, I am pleased to create, explore and invent new things."                                                                                                           
Alen also loves to play in theater roles and to appearing in movies. He was a member of the Youth theaters of Pandam, under whose auspices they have performed a famous drama: "The event in the City Goga". He also performed in a very known Slovenian series: "Carps are there, Esoxs are not", by Tone Partljič.
Peter is Alen's father. He is a Graduated Engineer of Mechatronics with many pronounced qualities. He is an experienced man, with a demonstrated history of working in the Consumer Goods Industry, Production development and Controling. He is skilled in Emerging Technology Applications, with extensive IT and Software programming knowledge. He is also above average in Sales negotiations, Business planning, Coaching and Advertising. Strong professional Attitude and the Innovation - oriented Entrepreneurship are deeply present. Peter is able to see situations from a variety of perspectives and come up with original ideas. He is also good at coming up with sound solutions to the problems we're facing. He took over the job of technical director of the company. In his youth he dealt with modeling and rocketry.
 

Our intention is to rise enough funds to finance an application production including all the programming works, setting up the entire system,  marketing activities for the immediate commencement of worldwide business - PIZZA ORDERING AND DELIVERY SERVICE -  by offering all kind of exclusive and for the contributors attractive perks :                
Perk No. 1 - Starting with Reflection of the Attention, mentioning you as a contributor in Social Media.

story:
Short Summary

My story...at the age of eighteen, I made the decision to leave St. Lucia in pursuit of a new life in Canada.  This was a huge decision for a teen to make but I did it with a lot of learning experiences, fun times, love, laughter, family, a food truck business "Café du Monde Creperie and amazing new friends.  I am about to embark on a new adventure, one that incudes baking and distributing decadent desserts.  This campaign will help purchase equipment, we will invest in branding and packaging. 

I believe in supporting our community through Charity.  Over the years we have contributed to charities such as Big Brothers and Sisters, Monica Place, Caribbean Canadian Association of Waterloo Region, Canadian Diabetes Association and Sick Kids to name a few.   As Café du Monde Creperie grows, we will continue to support those within our community who need us.  Your contribution will not only help us, it will also help support the community we live in.  Learn more about us by visiting www.cafedumondecreperie.com .  

 

What We Need & What You Get

Funding will go towards:

  • Commercial hood vent and fan
  • Commercial convection oven
  • Commercial gas oven
  • Commercial deep fryer (for cannoli and other deep fried desserts)
  •  Environmental friendly packaging (we would like to move away from plastic)

What You Get

  •  $25 - mention on our social media outlets
  •  $100 - Café du Monde T-Shirt and a mention 
  •  $500 - Private one hour crepe lessons at our commercial space (two guests)

The Impact

Your contribution will help us build this small business without needing to take a small business loan from lenders who charge exorbitant amounts in fees and interest.  This is a huge deal for small businesses.  

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share! Share! and Share on your social media outlets.  Help us get the word out! THANK YOU!

story:
*LuBoX Part II

Dear Backers ,

We would like to give sincere thanks from core of our heart  by all our *LuBoX team and members to all our backers and supporters who backed us by contributing and supporting  in our first campaign. 

We are pleased to inform  you that after the launch of first campaign we got lots of enquiry and beckers support . And due to this support we are able to reach to next label and pleased to launch *LuBox Part II campaign.

Your support has been utilised to further strengthen our project. Our team is very dedicatedly involved in bring this concept into reality. 

Hope we will fulfill your desire to get this project .

This is our humble request to all to support to our part II LuBoX campaign  more and more and help us to bring it live. 

Thanks once again ! 

* LuBoX Team 

 

Designed for a digital lifestyle, *LuBox is the future of all lunch box . Our goal with *LuBox was to do the impossible: engineer a full‑size experience into the lightest and most compact food container ever. That meant re imagining every element to make it not only lighter and thinner lunch box but also better. The result is more than just a Lunch Box. It’s the future of the Lunch Box. We improved performance, more storage, and up to 10 hours of battery life,*LuBox is even more capable.

Enjoy  your meal anytime at ideal temperature  

 

It has been rightly said healthy and hygienic meal always keeps you away from doctor. 

Due to hectic life and tremendous work pressure it has become important for us to keep ourself healthy and hygienic.

HOW DOES THIS WORK 

LuBox is easy to operate: simply fill with yummy dish and connect it to a power supply like wall  adapter, Laptop USB. Within 5-10 minutes the LuBox will reach to desire temperature that you have set.

Inbuild LED light indicator allows you know that your meal is ready to eat. It changes colour as the change of temperature inside. 

We have developed a special system that helps to prevent leakage even during transportation or tilting. The heat then spreads evenly on the surface of the tray. When Lubox will get over heated then extra heat exhaust from the tiny holes build in fan back side of box, and maintained the temperature.

Lubox is connect with your mobile via bluetooth. You can control from remote place also. 

HEATING MECHANISM 

The Lubox's heating technology is elegantly built-in between the inner and outer walls of the container. Its interface is made up of clever, press and subtle light indicators to let you know when your food is just right. It is wirelessly powered by setting it onto it's compact, USB-powered side panel, so you can use it anywhere. To save valuable space for food and extend it’s lifespan, the *LuBox has chargeable battery built inside.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Once you've selected your perfect temperature, and watch it light up. 

If your food is hotter than the temperature you chose, it will glow RED. 

If it is colder, it will glow BLUE. 

When the*LuBox’s base glows ORANGE, its just right. Enjoy.

CHARGE *LuBox WITH ANY POWER SOURCE 

Just plug in your *LuBox. You can use your laptop, any power outlet . These multiple possibility   of different charging source give you ultimate flexibility in choosing time and place of your meal consumption.

Once it gets charged fully it will back up heating process for 10 hours .

USB Charging Ports

Charge your * LuBox lunch box and it will stand minimum 10 hours 

Allows you to Charge your Mobile while you are enjoying your meal

*LuBox is designed for Your Connected Lifestyles​

FOOD TRAY

The brilliant-quality, reusable inner tray makes transport and storage easy, compartment has been designed keeping in eye the daily need of your food. The non sticky  inner surface is easy to wash. Tray can we use separately as it is removable. 

KNOW MORE ABOUT  *LuBoX DETAILS 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION  

We set out to create the future of lunch box but we also wanted the *LuBox to stand on its own as a sleek and beautiful design AND IT IS EASY TO USE IN ALL SCENARIOS 

It is designed to complement your lifestyle and your daily life living. 

Here are the final product dimensions and specifications. 

Dimension (LWH) :300 mm (30 cm) x 220mm (22cm) x 55mm(5.5cm)

Weight : 600gm/0.600kg 

Volume: 500ml 

Voltage: 9W ( 5V 1.8 A)

10 Hours Battery Back Up

Led light temperature indicator

Beep Sound Alert

Temperature Sensors

Aluminum Containers 

On/Off  Pad button

Smartphone App (Android & iOS) 

Bluetooth Connectivity

High Temperature  80 degree C 

What's Included : 

Connect with Apps

1.5 Micro USB Cables

6 ft Micro USB Cables

USB wall Adapter

The *LuBox is designed to be the right size for your space. 

 

*LuBoX APP - CONNECT & START 

*LuBox comes with bluetooth connectivity features. Just connect your phone with lubox  and set the temperature program and  it will maintain the temperature  through out the day .

 Once temperature is reached to set temperature, the app automatically sense the temperature of your food from LuBox and it will send you instant notification to device.

You can also control remotely to your lunch box. 

you can see on your mobile device the battery percentage available on Lubox.

FOLLOW 6 SIMPLE STEPS TO USE *LuBoX

 

WHERE TO USE SCENARIOS 

You can use *LuBox anytime and anywhere. Use during your Office lunch time or you can enjoy healthy meal while having fun with your friends or family in picnic. 

During your workout time like GYM and YOGA  you can carry  * LuBox keeps your healthy and hygienic food all the time.

You can also use *LuBox at the time of travelling . 

1. OFFICE Lunch Time

2. PICNIC Party

3. GYM Time

5. YOGA Time

6. HOME Lunch Time

7. Travel Time

COLOR AVAILABILITY 

*LuBox's STORY

The journey for developing the *LuBox was a process that was driven by our love and passion for healthy and hygienic life. Our goal was simple: bring to life an awesome heated smart lunch box  system we would be proud to use ourselves and share with our friends.

We envisioned it would be functional and an attractive conversation piece. Take a closer look at our journey with the LuBox!

 

MEETING OUR DEADLINES

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES 

Because of its tech feature or a very complicated one production should go without major issues.

As with any first production run there might be delays caused by unforseen problems. We've taken a safe approach when we made our timeline and we'll do our best to have the products shipped as soon as possible!

Also we intend to keep you in the loop on a constant basis, sending regular updates with our progress!

WHY INDIEGOGO IN DEMAND​

Building a great product requires tremendous skills, effort and dedication. But most importantly, we need your support to help realize our vision of heated lunch box for everyone.

To propel our *LuBox project into mass production and market launch phase, we need your help. The raised funds will help account for the costs of: 

DFM (Design for manufacturing) process of the finalized product design 

Tooling, manufacturing & quality control

Sourcing material and components

Testing & safety certification (e.g. IEC, CCC, CE, UL) 

Handling and logistics    

WHOSE IDEA IS ?

 

We are  a young passionate designer, after year of working with some big companies, earning experience and understanding how a design gets from the drawing board to the finished product and also understand the need of consumer and giving via val solution to the consumer's need and problems.  We finally got the courage to make this big step, to create products that would make life better. This is our take on the lunchbox, and we really hope you’ll like it! Our goal is to create a healthy and hygienic lunch  box that would be easy to carry and use, with an impeccable design. 

 

PLEASE LIKE AND SHARE 

https://www.facebook.com/LuBox-129111060989955/

 

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT

And due to this support we are able to reach to next label and pleased to launch *LuBox Part II campaign.Your support has been utilised to further strengthen our project. Our team is very dedicatedly involved in bring this concept into reality. Hope we will fulfill your desire to get this project .This is our humble request to all to support to our part II LuBoX campaign  more and more and help us to bring it live. Thanks once again ! * LuBoX Team  Designed for a digital lifestyle, *LuBox is the future of all lunch box . Our goal with *LuBox was to do the impossible: engineer a full‑size experience into the lightest and most compact food container ever. story:
Although I have been very creative since early childhood, I decided to pursue a technical career for economic reasons. As I always had the urge to question and optimize existing solutions, it was easy for me to gain extensive experience in the automotive industry over the last 17 years. From production, maintenance and optimization to quality management and development.
But deep inside of me the desire to realize my own ideas was growing. So I decided to invest my extensive knowledge fully in my art.
After I finished some projects I had the idea to develop a 100l champagne bottle. When people say that it is impossible, I really start.
From the first drawing to the finished prototype it was an exciting journey. It should be more a finger exercise for future projects. But it turned out that there is actually a market for the 100l champagne bottle.
To bring the bottle into serial production and filling exceeds my present manufacture.

Therefore I hope for your support. I need a new room, tools, professional carbon processing tools and a larger paint booth.

If we reach the goal together, the first bottle from the series production will be opened at an event so that everyone who has helped can celebrate in style.
On request, this bottle can be provided with your name and photo. The size depends on the funding amount.
This piece will also be displayed on the website.

I am deeply grateful for every contribution. I hope that my project will succeed and inspire many people.

I would also be very happy if you would share this campaign everywhere.

 

Due to the increasing number of requests how the 100l champagner bottle is produced, the video of the production process is shown here with a wink.

In reality, a stainless steel tank is concealed which is manufactured by an outstanding supplier and has been pressure tested by an authority.

 

PERFECT LUXURY
                 COMPLETE YOUR DREAM

A monumental statement of exclusive taste can be found here:
The WARNECKE 100 litre champagne bottle, manufactured in carbon-stainless steel mixed construction, fills a gap in a segment where everything seems to already exist. 
It is an upgrade for every event. It gives every guest a lasting impression and makes every special moment even more special.
Take the chance to join a small circle of connoisseurs who have a sense for the special and love the pleasure.

 

 

UNIQUE SELLING PROPOSITION
                                                           100 LITERS
 
WARNECKE 100 - the largest champagne bottle in the world. Here a luxury article was created that is unique in the world. 
Finished free of any restrictions, manufactured with intelligent craftsmanship, in an environment where quality is a tangible element.

 

FORCEFUL
                   SAFE
 
Hidden under the high gloss carbon cover is an enormously robust stainless steel container that exceeds all safety standards by far. Furthermore, the WARNECKE 100 litre champagne bottle is equipped with a sophisticated transport safety device.

story:
Working towards a dream - 

Cora’s was born in the kitchen of my house with the family and with friends surrounding it. We realized that food is the center of everything, we all need food to live.  It is even better when we can enjoy it and it delightfully changes our mood. Our dream to share our kitchen with the public became a reality in 2019 when a small location became available, and we jumped on the idea of opening a small café and bakery. Unfortunately, Cora’s Bakery closed in 2020 due to Covid-19. Still, we decided to look again for another location, and while searching, we saw the charm of downtown Midland, Texas. So we decided that our spot should be there, after a couple of months we found the one. You will here soon find our location at 305 W. Ohio, where all types of buildings and businesses surround us. Even though we are about to finish it, we still need a bit more to open it up.

We are Edgar and Ana, owners of Cora's, and we believe food brings people together. In our travels and most important in everyday life of a person the most crucial time of a day is when we get to eat because food makes our souls happy. We want you to make Cora's your second home and the place where you can share a wonderful meal with friends and family.

 

What we need and the perks that you get

Even though we are about to be finished with Cora's Bistro, we need to complete some details inside the building. To be able to keep running the restaurant and have the ability to cope with the arising issues of a new restaurant, we are asking for $25,000. These funds will go towards finishing the final details and etc.

Not only will you contribute to the welfare of the restaurant and give us more freedom to create delicious food for you all, but it will also give us a chance to provide for you many perks as donors. The perks you will receive for your gracious contribution depends on the level and amount that you all wish to give.

 

Impact

We want to thank you all for the continuous support during these hard and uncertain times. For all those times you gave us your precious time and resources at the Farmers market and ordering Dinner and pastries from us.

We have torn, built, and changed the building to host this eatery to fit our vision. We believe our impact will be successful because we are thinking of creating art that you will love and enjoy in the form of food. 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge in opening a restaurant during this time is the uncertainty during Covid-19, but as a community we can all overcome this situation. Also, what makes it harder for a new starter is to have the exposure since we are new; not many people know us. These two risks may lie on us, but the food we provide is not cooked or prepared like us in other restaurants. We have been around for at least a year and are working the Farmer's Market to obtain the exposure we need, and it is working.

 

Helping us

We understand if you are not able to contribute to our cause, but if you can help us spread the word, we will greatly appreciate it. We hope you can visit us to enjoy some delicious homemade food and pastries once we open.

story:
http://www.babybearig.com

 

UPDATE 01/23/20-  we are halfway thru design with no major problems per the engineering team in Silicon Valley  !! 

Recently I was shopping for my grandson a consistent, easy way for preparing bottles.  I could not believe that not much had changed since 1983.....the methods were still the same.  The bottles looked a little different, but that is it!  The following morning I got up and prepared a cup of coffee.  The light went off in my head, if I can make the perfect cup of coffee like this, we can make the perfect bottle like this too.  The sketch is my rough idea of how this looks.  However, we are sticking to contemporary clean lines and an interchangeable panel that will slide over the spout to coordinate with your kitchen,.  With over 3.8 million births in the United States per year we feel this is a winner.  

Our goal is to make an easier life for the new parents.  One that you do not need to guess, is the bottle too hot, is the formula mixed properly, has it been opened too long in the refrigerator?  We want to take the guess work out of feeding, and put the time back in your hands to love on that new baby!  

We currently in the prototype stage and working with Rabbit Designs in Silicon Valley.  We have a panel of five engineers whom seem very excited about the project.   The engineers have told us that "The engineering aspect of this is simple, we just need to design the machine in the look you want".   We hope to be on the market by Christmas 2020.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $75,000 to get the working prototype and  2,000 machines manufactured and to the shelves.  We are offering the machines at 1/2 price, or $150.00 to each backer up that donates at least $150.00 to the campaign.  

The Impact

Your donation will have a huge "bearing" on the outcome of this machine.  We have taken it to the prototype stage but need help to finish the product.  You can Donate any increment to the project because you believe in it, or you can purchase a Baby Bearig for $150.00.  

Baby Bearig Joins Makers of Enfamil, Mucinex, and Airborne to partner with TerraCycle to recycle all Baby Formula Packaging.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is raising the funds to get the prototype perfected.  We have been told that the prototype is really just to find its flaws and it may take 2-3 tries to get it perfected.  

The next step is to get a license agreement with a formula manufacturer.  We are launching the machine with a reusable pod, but were hope to have a disposable pod system before we hit the market!  We are currently working on that.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If the Baby Bearig Campaign Contribution is not for you we totally understand, we just ask that you share this with family and friends to help us reach our goal!

Other Ways You Can HelpIf the Baby Bearig Campaign Contribution is not for you we totally understand, we just ask that you share this with family and friends to help us reach our goal!

Economical

Colours

We have realized many prototypes in order to obtain the best product to be shown to you!

Mass production will take about 40 days , factories for production , assembly and shipment are located in few kilometers between each other in order to optimize logistic issues and quickly reach shipment stage.

I am confident unexpected situations will be avoided, and we promise to keep our backers updated at all times.

story:
CHILKA Tableware
Never Wash Your Dishes Again!

In-a-Nutshell: Chilka is a thin modular plate which sits on top of a Strong Base Plate. The Chilka is replaced after every meal, keeping the same Base Plate, every time. This ensures that the hard base is always fresh, hygienic and clean without the need for washing plates.

Our Story

Combining the assortment and organisation of partition trays with the flexibility of simple plain everyday plate, CHILKA/TABLEWARE is a square plate that lets you choose your portions as per your preference - sized Intermediately for both Commercial and Residential use. 

 

What is CHILKA?

CHILKA/TABLEWARE is a designer tableware with a twist. It is a 2-layer plate design with a thin layer of eco-friendly & biodegradable plate which sits on top of a re-useable hard base making it a super strong product. The top layer is replaced after every meal, ensuring that the hard base is always fresh, hygienic and clean without the need for washing.

Design Specs

Features

The Plate comes in three different sizes, each with their own Compartmentalised CHILKA's:

  • 4” saucer plate - 1C, 2C, 3C
  • 8” dessert plate - 3C, 4C, 5C
  • 11” dinner plate - 5C, 7C, 9C

The Base Plates are currently available in 3 colour moods

  • Pop (Bright Blue)
  • Earthy (Olive)
  • Elegant(Pastel Pink)

& the CHILKA Layer is Transparent

Aspects

MODULARITY

The minimal base form provides ample compartment configuration opportunities for CHILKA with the use of the Grid thereby applicable to a wide variety of Cuisines.

 

ROTATABILITY

The square shaped plate allows one to Rotate for Comfort and ease in use

 

STORAGE

Chilka can be stored and stacked easily in your kitchen or your workplace. 

MATERIAL

The base plate is made using thick High Impact Polystyrene material - the same material that is used in your refrigerators & the CHILKA layer is made of a very thin later of using a special biodegradable & eco-friendly material. 

Time-Line

  • May 2017 - Idea Inception & Concept Design
  • July 2017 - CAD Models for Prototype 1 & Alpha Testing
  • August 2017 - New CAD Models for Prototype 2 & Beta Testing
  • October 2017 - Final Beta Tested Prototypes
  • November 2017 - Indiegogo Camp Work
  • December 2017 - Launch Camp on Indiegogo
  • February 2018 - Production of Remaining Moulds & Start Product Production
  • March 2018 - Deliveries of Perks

Prototypes

Prototype 1: Made by forming over a steel plate.

Prototype 2: New Design made using Japanese Minimalism in Mind

Our first Mould Production using special material imported from Germany

Our Team

We are a team of Product Designers and Polymer Engineers from Mumbai, India. We have invested our time and money into designing this product and developing the first set of molds to do beta testing. We intend to use the raised money to complete our product tooling in Aluminium and have the production ready for the best facility in India with all certifications. To be production ready, we need a certain volume for which we see crowdfunding as a way forward.

Rushabh, MSc Robotics from King's College London. Working at Machinecraft Thermoforming OEM at Mumbai, India where he works on operations & business development. Founder of Aesop Product Design Studio in Mumbai, India working as a Product Manager. 

Shreelekha, Masters in Product Design from Industrial Design Center (IDC) at IIT Mumbai. Working at Beat Root Product Design Lab, Chennai, India. Looking at Product Design of Chilka Range at Aesop Design. 

Jay, BCom from NMIMS, Mumbai. Working on Materials & Customer Support at Aesop Design, Mumbai. 

Palak, MSc Management from Imperial College London. Working on Digital Marketing at Aesop Design, Mumbai. 

Our Beta Testing Dinner

FAQs

1. What is Chilka Plate?
A. Chilka Plate is a plate made using special polymers that will help you eliminate daily dishwashing and help you compartmentalize your meals; help you with portion control; save water and go green. 

2. What are the plates made of?
A. The base plate is made of a special polymer called High Impact Polystyrene (HIPS) which is the same material used in your refrigerator interiors and the chilka plate is made of a Polystyrene (PS) blended with Bio-Tec's Eco-Pure material to make it biodegradable. 

3. Are the plates eco-friendly?
A. The plates are 100% recyclable and made of Eco-Pure's special biodegradable properties making it 100% eco-friendly

4. How is it different from standard disposable plates?
A. The Chilka design has been inspired by Japanese minimalism, so firstly the design is a differentiating factor, Secondly, because of the 2 layer design, the base is super strong so the plates are stronger to hold than standard disposable plates and the chilka layer is super thin and biodegradable making sure you do no damage to nature. 

5. What's next after Chilka Plates?
A. We want to invest the money earned into researching on new bio based materials to make the plates. Post this, we will have the next camp on Chilka based Tiffin Boxes made using Polycarbonate Material - the same as your luggage bag material.

story:
Hello, I'm here to share my idea about food world and I'm hoping that you will came along with my vision.

What do you want to do?

Well, it's simple. I want to buy a restaurant and to renovate with smart menu tables. Let's get rid of the classics paper menu and the risks of being ignored by the waiter until he/she notice you.

How it will work?

Well it's like an application on a phone, but it's on the table, it will be like a small bubble on the corners and you can scroll a variety of fast-foods, not junk-food, fast, in real terms. Healthy, lite, fresh, crunchy, crispy and all the kinds. You can select our food or you can create yours, the only thing you must do is to select the ingredients and we will put together. If you're pressed by time you can order from the phone application and the food will be done by the time you'll arrive.

Why this?

It's my dream to have a restaurant where I can offer people happiness and put a big smile on their faces through food because we all know that happiness goes through stomach.

Which are your plans?

I want to invest all I've got into this. I want to do home delivery 24/7 and a special night menu for those which are like owls and prefer night life.

I want it to make like a second home for some.

story:
THE VERGE PAYS FOR ITSELF IN THE FIRST 2 MONTHS!

On a weekly basis, if you go through 3 bags of 7 pound ice, you will be spending $15 to $25. Might not seem like a lot in the beginning but that quickly adds up to $780 in the lower end and $1,300 in the higher end. 

With that kind of money, you can buy 5 Verge Coolers and save yourself more money with the saving that come without purchasing ice packs. 

As shown in the chart below the Cooler is FREE in the long run and even helps you save money, which you can use towards a fancy VACATION.

 

VERGE PAYS FOR ITSELF IN 2 MONTHS

After the initial investment on the verge cooler not only will you be saving money on ice, but also on food because you won't be wasting food. 

According to futurity.org. The average American household wastes $1,866 of food per year. American households waste, on average, almost a third of the food they acquire, economists report. 

The Verge Cooler pays for itself in just 2 months and anything after that is pure savings. Instead of paying for ICE packs every week. The one investment of VERGE Cooler Ice Packs will pay for itself and save you money in the long run.

 

NO MORE MESS! NO MORE SOGGY FOOD!

On the left, you have the standard cooler which you can pick up in any big-box retailer. After 24 hours in the cooler with ICE, The food is soggy and inedible. 

The VERGE Cooler is on the right. Even after 24 hours in the VERGE cooler with the Magnetic Ice Packs, The food is still FRESH.  The VERGE Cooler Held the Cooler temperature longer without any moisture, to keep the food fresh longer. 

 

VERGE FEATURES 

Left Image: High-Quality Stainless Steel Handle
Right Image: Handle Locks into Place

 

Left Image: Easy open Lid, Open with one finger. 
Right Image: Stainless Steel Hinge Ensures Longevity and Helps with Structural Rigidity. 

 

Left Image: White circles show magnet locations.
Right Image: Gasket across the lid ensures a perfect seal and ensures no air leaks. 

 

Left Image: Multi-Purpose Tray can be used as a Cereal Tray or Key and Wallet / Keys Holder. 
Right Image: Hard plastic extrusion lip around the top ensures a tighter gasket seal.

 

Left Image: Bevanda Thick Coolboost™ Insulated Foam ensures no air passes around trapping the cool air and retaining the temperature longer than standard coolers.  
Right Image: Breakaway Stainless Steel handle is built with high-grade stainless steel to hold any weight and be impact resistant.

 

Left Image: Made from high-grade rubber ensures slip resistance. 
Right Image: Durable, Insulated & light at only 10lbs!

 

MAGNETIC ICE PACK FEATURES

Left Image: Slim and efficient ice pack design allow for more room so you can put more in the VERGE Cooler. 
Right Image: High-Quality Tura-Gel™ holds cold temperature and creates even cooling compared to liquid cooling from the competition. 

 

Ice packs create a 360-degree environment for cold air to circulate around the food consistently on all sides. Standard ice packs in a standard cooler provide uneven cooling, are unorganized, and take up a lot of room taking space from your food. 

 

ADVANCED COOLING GEL TECHNOLOGY: TURA-GEL™

 

STANDARD ICE PACKS VS. OUR ICE PACKS 

Left Image: Standard ice packs in a standard cooler provide uneven cooling are unorganized and take up a lot of room, taking space from your food. 
Right Image: Ice packs create a 360-degree environment for cold air to circulate around cooling the food consistently on all sides.

 

DIMENSIONS

 

AMOUNT OF BEER CANS THAT FIT INTO A VERGE

The VERGE Cooler Holds 22, 12 oz cans. The Ice Packs Keep Your Drinks Chilled For over 24 Hours. The No Ice Design Creates More Efficient Spacing and More Room For Your Beers.

 

AMOUNT OF BEER BOTTLES THAT FIT INTO A VERGE 

Over 24 hour Cooling For 12 oz Beer Bottles With The VERGE Cooler With The Ice Packs.  The No Ice Design Creates More Efficient Spacing and More Room For Your Beers.

 

NO MORE SPOILED FOOD

Left Image: The food on the left shows soggy food in a standard cooler after 24hrs. The food was ruined by melted ice water. 
Right Image: Shows food in perfect condition ready to eat after 24hrs due to lack of ice.

 

TEMPERATURE RETENTION

 

MAGNET GUIDE

 

EVERY VERGE™ INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING

 

THE VERGE™ PRICING DIFFERENCE 

 

 

VERGE™ DEALS

 

 

 

 

 

 

OUR STORY

 

FOLLOW US EVERYWHERE @ BEVANDAPRODUCTS

story:
BAR THE HOUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

 

Short Summary
We are having fun while replacing the old conventional business models for Bars and Restaurants!

 

We have combined the Social Economy/ Crowdsourcing Model with Bars and Restaurants!

Customers

Food & Beverage with Less hassle.Simple hourly rate (trip included) and order whatever you want on the BTH menu.  Pay like you do with your favorite Ride-sharing company - via mobile app and not exchanging cash. Get paid for sharing the idea!

Employees

Share in the profits! Make a difference and experience a bigger impact in your life. Make more money. Get paid what you are worth! Serve better clientele and rate your customers.

   

Owners

Gain more loyal customers. Attract dependable, higher quality employees. Tap into our loyal membership network and make more money!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn,t mean they can't help:
Help us by sharing our compaign with your social networks.

   

Thank you for helping by contributing and then sharing the
message with others today.

What We Need & What You Get

No matter which phase you choose to participate in, phase 1, phase 2, or both, The benefits are awesome.  We are breaking our project up into two phases:

Phase 1 - Spread Awareness: raise $3000 to create the project explainer video as well as a marketing budget for phase 2.

Phase 2 - Pilot:  Now that we have a professional explainer video and marketing campaign, we will raise money for building out the business model and first pilot location.

The Impact

We feel we can do better - we can treat each other better as a whole society. We are looking for others that have the same vision and are willing to prove us right.  It only takes one person to begin to change and impact all of society.  Wouldn't it be worth it?  We already have the technology today. Let's create a business model together that is self-sustaining and propagate the idea. Imagine the feeling waking up every morning knowing that you are a part of the movement that is finally changing society for the better.

Risks & Challenges

As with any movement there will always be challenges in the way. The team is ready to handle them.   The team is made up of business owners, restaurant and bar owners, attorneys, product manager, application designer, innovation project manager, and stay at home domestic engineers.

story:
Short Summary

As everybody knows, Italy is the land of espresso. In our country there are many little factories that in Italian are called "torrefazione". Little factories full of passion for coffee that realize everyday an high quality product. Our idea is produce Nespresso® capsules using that coffee.

We are a group of espresso coffe addicted people and we think this can be an excellent opportunity to give to that companies a way to survive to this market in right way, without losing quality. We choose "7 Grams of Pleasure" as name because this is quantity of coffee used to make a good italian espresso.

What We Need & What You Get

Realization of our IndieGoGo project is mainly based on prototyping of:

  • A website that will contains coffee store.
  • An automation chain (prototype will be realized using Arduino) that will be connected to website in way to make production in the right moment when a user do the order on website. This will permit also to keep high quality for used coffe that will be grind in the exact moment of the order.
  • Study and realize organic capsules that will contains 7 grams of coffee (the right quantity for a well done espresso) and will be entirely recyclable.

The Impact

There are many reasons to encourage this project:

  • Give to Italian little firm a way to continue to make high quality coffee.
  • Change the environmental impact of coffee capsules.
  • Have opportunity to drink a real italian espresso.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us also sharing this campaign in every way is possible.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
OCO Introduction:

We are OCO, a brand that is dedicated to artisan production of vegan and keto food, as well as food for diabetics. After a fruitful research, we have developed several powdered mixes for breads and desserts, very beneficial for keto diets, for people who follow a gluten-free diet and for diabetics, but that can also be used by anyone who cares about their health, we obtained a health score according to USDA of 9.9 out of 10. In this way each person can enjoy a healthy life without limitations. Beyond living, it is a healthy body and a healthy mind. At OCO we create products that feed your body and mind, keeping you prepared for any adversity that your body may face in your day-to-day life.

Our Chef & Products Introduction:

My name is Albertto and I am dedicated to the world of professional cooking now for more than 12 years. I have practiced my cooking skills in places like Alicante - Spain and Dubai - UAE. I am also certified as a national fitness and bodybuilding coach by IFBB, for more than 17 years. After all my professional career I have decided to put all my knowledge and experience in the service of those who care about their health, their life and their well-being and I have created the OCO brand.

After a long research, tests and a lot of work, we have developed a product especially dedicated to people who follow a ketogenic diet or follow a gluten-free diet or for people suffering from diabetes.

As you know, the ketogenic diet is a diet that many people follow today and is a diet as an alternative to intermittent fasting. This diet was originally designated for those suffering from epilepsy and today it has been taken again into consideration as a remedy in the fight against of this disease. But seeing its benefits and its importance for our health, doctors and nutritionists have begun to recommend the diet to all those who want to improve their appearance and physical condition. Several studies have shown its benefits at the cognitive level, in the treatment of breast cancer and in the fight against obesity.

Celiac disease is an autoimmune disease characterized by a permanent and chronic intolerance to gluten. It is suffered by people who are genetically predisposed and is characterized by a lesion of the mucosa of the small intestine that causes atrophy of the intestinal villi. This atrophy produces an inadequate absorption of the nutrients from the food we eat (proteins, fats, carbohydrates, mineral salts and vitamins), with the consequent associated health problems. An accidental ingestion of gluten by these people causes chronic diarrea, abdominal bloating, constipation, nausea and vomiting, anemia, generalized weakness, skin rashes, constipation, headache, tooth enamel changes, rickets, spontaneous fractures and can even lead to death. One in 100 people in the world suffer from this disease and each year it increases by 15%. But to this disease is added another one that is a sensitivity to gluten and of which doctors say that 10 out of 100 people suffer from it and 90% of them do not know it.

Diabetes is a disease in which glucose (sugar) levels in the blood are very high. Glucose comes from the foods you eat. Insulin is a hormone that helps glucose enter cells to supply them with energy. In type 1 diabetes, the body does not make insulin. In type 2 diabetes, the most common, the body does not make or use insulin properly. Without enough insulin, glucose stays in the blood. Over time, too much glucose in the blood can cause serious problems. It can damage the eyes, kidneys, and nerves. Diabetes can also cause heart disease, stroke, and the need to amputate a limb. Pregnant women can also develop diabetes, called gestational diabetes. Diabetes is considered the chronic disease of the 21st century, with the greatest increase in prevalence, since only in the year 2000, 171 million people were reported with this disease and it is estimated that by 2030 there will be 366 million patients, the leading cause of morbidity and mortality worldwide.

At OCO we have decided to do our bit and help all these people who need to improve their health and life. Our product supports and streamlines the day-to-day life of these people, in order to lead a normal life without restrictions or limitations. Help us to help, the fact of not reaching our goals in our campaign on Indiegogo, would be a great loss for these people and their lives could be affected, since right now, there is not a great offer of these types of products in the market . We know that you like and enjoy when you eat good bread, delicious cakes, tasty muffins, even sweet crepes. Please help others who cannot eat all this, given their health, that they also can enjoy eating the same like you. We hope that our product is to your liking and that together we can make all these people happy. We cannot do it alone, we need your help. Join us and together we can make millions of people happy.

Our gools:

At this moment we have everything ready, we only need enough money to be able to start the production. After finishing our campaign in Indiegogo on May 25, the manufacturing process will begin the following week, on May 31, and we will be able to deliver the product to those who help us within a period of 2 or 3 weeks, from June 1 to June 14. It all depends on you and your help.

We know that it is not an easy path, there is risk, there are challenges, there are ups and downs, but let's assume the risk and together we will win, the union is strength, because without sacrifices there is no victory. Without your help, all our work has been in vain and we have failed in our altruistic desire to help those in need. And failure is not an option, we want to win and we can do it only together.

Our Products:

We have a very varied range of products, based on nuts such as almonds and coconut. Our mixes also contain flax seeds, stevia and freeze dried or sun dried fruits. Freeze-dried and dehydrated fruits do not contain any other added ingredients, they are without sugar and without other additives or preservatives, they are as pure as nature has created them. All of our products are free of any additive, preservative, colouring, artificial aromas and are not pasteurized. 100% Natural ingredients.


Here is a list of all our products:

  1. Bread Baking Mix
  2. Pizza Baking Mix
  3. Tortilla Baking Mix
  4. Cake Baking Mix Plain
  5. Cake Baking Mix Sour Cherry
  6. Cake Baking Mix Cranberry
  7. Cake Baking Mix Raspberry
  8. Cake Baking Mix Blackberry
  9. Cake Baking Mix Blueberry
  10. Cake Baking Mix Forest Fruits
  11. Cake Baking Mix Cacao
  12. Muffins Baking Mix Plain
  13. Muffins Baking Mix Sour Cherry
  14. Muffins Baking Mix Cranberry
  15. Muffins Baking Mix Raspberry
  16. Muffins Baking Mix Blackberry
  17. Muffins Baking Mix Blueberry
  18. Muffins Baking Mix Forest Fruits
  19. Muffins Baking Mix Cacao
  20. Creps Baking Mix Plain
  21. Creps Baking Mix Cacao
  22. Pancakes Baking Mix Plain
  23. Pancakes Baking Mix Cacao
  24. Cookies Baking Mix Plain
  25. Cookies Baking Mix Sour Cherry
  26. Cookies Baking Mix Cranberry
  27. Cookies Baking Mix Raspberry
  28. Cookies Baking Mix Blackberry
  29. Cookies Baking Mix Blueberry
  30. Cookies Baking Mix Forest Fruits
  31. Cookies Baking Mix Cacao
  32. Churros Baking Mix Plain
  33. Churros Baking Mix Cacao

Nature is also important to us, all our packaging is completely ecological. Because we do car.

 

A healthy product:

This is the nutritional value in our products, varying a bit, depending on the ingredients. For those with fruit, the caloric intake is slightly higher but does not exceed 3% of the total calories per 100 g of product. We have to take into account that our products are not finite products, it is a mixture of ingredients that each one in his house will add water and oil, to obtain the final product. The proportion of the mixture and the water is approximately 1: 3 that is 1 part of mix and 3 parts of water. Therefore caloric intake will drop drastically. Then the caloric intake per 100 g of finite product would be about 184 cal.

 

The health score is a very high 9.9 out of 10, according to the USDA, one of the healthiest products on the market. We are very proud to achieve this. For this we are more than happy to share it with the world.

 

The glycemic index, as you can see is very very low. Also the glycemic load is almost negligible. In order to interpret the glycemic values, we leave some instructions below:

Money allocation:

We will use the money collected in the following way:
10% - Product Registration
25% - Marketing
50% - Purchase of Ingredients and Production
15% - Working Capital

We will have total transparency and each of you will be able to ask and find out how we are going to spend each cent. We will be more than happy to do so.

Help us make noise:

If at this time, you can't help us financially, help us make noise and share our campaign with the world, using Indiegogo's sharing tools.

Thank you very much for your time and we hope to see you among our collaborators!

story:
Cedrick Aquino helps babies to find or stay with a family; Grandma, Aunties, Neighbours or Foster Mums. Often Aunties or Grandmas come to us desperate holding a 1-month old baby who is quickly losing weight.

When incredible Women step in to take on the role of Mum we believe we should do all it takes to ensure they have the resources they need to be the best Mama possible. We do not want babies to be abandoned and made to be orphans again all because they could not afford the milk. We also know how babies suffer, if their family raises them without access to proper nutrition- no baby should know that hunger. 

This global pandemic has means that getting the quantity of milk we need to feed all the babies is becoming an issue. The milk is imported and due to shutdowns we need to secure a large supply

Your donations will allow us to buy enough milk to help us through the next 3 months So we can keep on saving lives and changing the system.

story:
We at Strite’s Donuts are asking the community to help us achieve our next level of development so we can continue to expand on what we’re passionate about. We’re not just passionate about donuts. In fact, we get even more excited about our community outreach opportunities that we have the privilege to do because of our donuts.

We have helped many incarcerated men and women by giving them a job once they’re released – this gives them the second chance that allows them to re-enter our community more easily. We have seen the lives of these incredible individuals changed by this opportunity and we want to be able to reach even more. We have also donated donuts to many community organizations including student groups at JMU, The Salvation Army, the Sherriff’s and Police Departments, Fire and Rescue, churches, schools, daycares… just to name a few. We take our trailer to local jails as well as taking it to visit various state prisons across Alabama under the We Care Prison Ministry.

So, why are we asking you to get involved? We need capital in order to be able to expand our brand and our mission. We want to establish a new location downtown (15K), which will allow us to offer jobs to more individuals in need of employment. To help the new location and our current location/trailers flourish, we’re also seeking to promote our brand (10K), gain professional assistance (10K), and expand our ministry to inmates (10K)

We are very appreciative and thankful for the community’s loyal support and following over the past years. Because of you, we were able to develop from our humble beginnings over 10 years ago where we worked from the back of our pickup to where we are now with several mobile units and a wholesale retail location on Port Republic Road in Harrisonburg. We would love to have you join us in this next phase of our development as well.

story:
Are you a smart investor? Then this deal's for you...Imagine investing money and getting drinks worth double that amount in return! That is precisely what we offer you at The Bank, Mumbai. Become an early bird investor in our business. Your contribution is so valuable to us that we are willing to give you double the return on investment in the form of drinks at our bar lounge, The Bank. 
Who said banking can't be fun?

story:
What's the story?

 

When we created Hopsters Co-Op, we wanted to do something a little bit different. You probably are asking " why are these guys setting up another brewery?" and it would be a fair question. We wanted to create a family, a community of like-minded people who want to learn beer, meet new people and share in our success. This is why we created a cooperative, based on 7 founding principles.

 

Voluntary and Open Membership
Cooperatives are voluntary organizations, open to all persons able to use their services and willing to accept the responsibilities of membership, without gender, social, racial, political or religious discrimination.

Democratic Member Control
Cooperatives are democratic organizations controlled by their members, who actively participate in setting their policies and making decisions. Men and women serving as elected representatives are accountable to the membership. In primary co-operatives members have equal voting rights (one member, one vote) and cooperatives at other levels are also organized in a democratic manner.

Member Economic Participation
Members contribute equitably to, and democratically control, the capital of their cooperative. At least part of that capital is usually the common property of the cooperative. Members usually receive limited compensation, if any, on capital subscribed as a condition of membership. Members allocate surpluses for any or all of the following purposes: developing their cooperative, possibly by setting up reserves, part of which at least would be indivisible; benefiting members in proportion to their transactions with the cooperative, and supporting other activities approved by the membership.

Education, Training and Information
Cooperatives provide education and training for their members, elected representatives, managers, and employees so they can contribute effectively to the development of their cooperatives. They inform the general public – particularly young people and opinion leaders -about the nature and benefits of cooperation.

Autonomy and Independence
Cooperatives are autonomous, self-help organizations controlled by their members. If they enter agreements with other organizations, including governments, or raise capital from external sources, they do so on terms that ensure democratic control by their members and maintain their cooperative autonomy.

Cooperation among Cooperatives
Cooperatives serve their members most effectively and strengthen the cooperative movement by working together through local, national, regional and international structures.

Concern for Community
Cooperatives work for the sustainable development of their communities through policies approved by their members.

Our goal is to reach $100,000.  This will allow us to finish the building of our taproom, allowing our members and the wider beer community somewhere to gather and enjoy everything that is good about beer. We have the followers, we have the beer...we now just need to build our home! All our members and directors have worked tirelessly, and for free as it happens, to ensure we build the foundations of something special. We are so close to the finish line, and we really need your help to launch. 

What We Need & What You Get

Let's break it down for you folks in a bit more detail.

We'll be honest here, we need $100,000 to make our dreams happen. And they will happen with your awesome support. Don't worry, we have some fantastic perks to keep you interested, ranging from vouchers to spend on our online store/in house to having a stool named after you! You don't even have to select a perk, as there is a button to simply donate. We will be forever grateful regardless of the amount you put in! Every little will help us here, and even if we don't reach our goal, we can still crack on with the necessities. 

Check out below what we are trying to finish. Believe it or not, that green storefront is going to be our new home!

 

 

The Impact

We have always wanted this to be more than a brewery and bar. Our aim, with the help of our members, is to provide a haven for beer lovers. A place to kick back and grab a beer, learn about brewing and the wider industry. All our members have a say on the beer made, the decisions we make as a democracy and also how we run the taproom. There isn't one big guy looking down dictating, we all have a say! Check out below, as we have made some pretty decent strides over the last couple of years.

 

Our members and our team.

As with any new venture, there are always risks involved. We have a robust membership base with some truly talented people offering advice and guidance when it comes to navigating the tricky world of licensing, customer service and beer! Check out some of our beloved members and the team below, they really are a fab bunch.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you cant help! Ask your friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about Hopsters Co-op. 

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

We are a small Detroit-based, vegan, fast-casual startup restaurant. We will be serving plant-based versions of classic diner food such as burgers, fries, hot dogs and sandwiches.

We are currently seeking an investment of $50,000 which would cover our initial investment costs. These costs include inventory costs, property acquisition and renovations, ServSafe certification and our Health Department costs and other government agencies fees. My brother-in-law who owns his own commercial and residential construction business will be doing the renovations. He and his wife will also help with the day-to-day operations of the restaurant.

My name is Dustin Vanderburg. I am the Co-Owner and Head Chef here at Vegan in the Hood LLC. I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration with a Major in Hospitality Management. My expected graduation is August 28, 2020. I currently work as a Shift Supervisor Rx for CVS. I also have experience with management at BabiesRUs and ToysRUs. All 3 positions allowed me to manage in a team setting. I have 15 years of retail experience and about 2 years of warehouse experience. I also have an Associate's degree in General Business and an Associate's degree in Multimedia and two certificates in Small Business Management and Entrepreneurs and Supervision.

My wife, Angela Vanderburg is the other Co-Owner. She has kitchen experience with a local community organization and also has retail experience.

Our current demographic is approximately 2% of Detroiters who are vegan and vegetarian and the unknown percentage of flexitarians and pescatarians here in Detroit. The aforementioned 2% of Detroiters are roughly equivalent to 106,300 people. We hope to reach many of these people with social media and marketing. We are already making a name for the restaurant and have already had calls regarding orders. We are trying to get this project off the ground so we can fulfill future orders that come in.

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently seeking an investment of $50,000 which would cover our initial investment costs. These costs include inventory costs, property acquisition and renovations, ServSafe certification and our Health Department costs and other government agencies fees.

At the $5 Level, you will get a handwritten thank you note from myself and my wife, collectively the co-owners. This will ship out on or around May 2020.

At the $25 Level, you will get a dish with your name on it. This is a limited prize due to our limited menu of course.

At the $100 Level, you will get an invitation to the Soft opening private food tasting. This prize is limited due to the cost and available space. If we can raise much more than the goal we can offer more of this prize level depending on the number of contributions.

At the $2500 Level, we are offering a Chef's Table after-hours private tasting of my favorite dishes in a 3-course meal setting.

The Impact

If we can reach our goal this will offer a healthy comfort food option to the food desert that is Downtown Detroit. Our mission is to bring a healthy alternative to the fast-food garbage that is served locally. We want to offer comfort food that we and the people around here locally grew up with but in a vegan format. This will also give vegans in the area some of the options they are missing or crave. Detroit is a hotbed for vegan food and we want to offer an alternative to the million and one non-vegan diners and Coney Islands around this area.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is the timeline for the Health Department certification and inspection. Once we tackle that hurdle it is mostly smooth sailing for the most part up until opening. Getting the building we want for a good price and getting the renovation done quickly and cost-effectively is the other major challenge facing us. The Health Department is a necessary evil that we must face and there is not much we can do to remedy that, however, getting funding for this project will help get the building and get the process started. Another major hurdle is advertising. We have already started to make a name for ourselves and have orders coming in even before we are open. This is great but to maintain customers we need a building and to advertise. We have already started on this process thanks to social media. We plan to increase this by reaching out to local news stations and radio personalities once we get closer to open to spread the word even further. We hope to catch the eye of the public like some of our competition. Of course, we also plan to utilize traditional advertising methods as well to increase public awareness of our location. We have selected a high traffic area in which to operate as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone has the funds to help us grow this business. However, you can help us in other ways by sharing this via the share tools above, sharing it on social media and sharing it with other friends via SMS (Text message) and other options like Kik and Snapchat. Thank you all and have a great day.

story:
In the Beginning...

Our story starts with two friends having beer in a garage in August 2014. It's rumored that the beer may have influenced the discussion, but at some point, Kevin remarked that he always dreamed of owning his own brewery. In less than a year a crazy idea turned into a fully functioning brewery in Fort Saskatchewan, with beer on the market all across Alberta! 

Onward! To Glory!

In 2017 we made the bold decision to pack up and move our operations from Fort Saskatchewan to Edmonton. It has been a long road, with more than a few bumps, but we are finally at the end.

How can you Help?

Many of our loyal fans have asked us how they can help get the new location open. This campaign is a fantastic way for those who are unable to make conventional investments contribute. We are trying to raise $50,000 to fund our final push to opening. This money will be used for all the finishing touches and last minute expenses that always crop up. It will also allow us to replenish our operating capital fund, which has been completely depleted due to the construction delays. In return you get some fantastic perks.
