story:
My name is Jasmine Hernandez. I am a young Orange County native and my passion is bringing the world delicious vegan dishes that have surrounded me as a Chicana in California. When I found Veganism I found my fire and now I want to share it with the world! I created Chicana Vegana to show people that healthier and happier lives are possible through delicious plant based foods! Underserved communities finally need food options that are both delicious and healthy and this is our chance! Any single donation is a stand for your family and our community and together we can make this vegan restaurant a reality! Are you ready !? Because we are!

Our main goal to fund is our kitchen buildout ! Even though our dream location is perfect there is no existing kitchen so we need to build out our very own! With out a kitchen there is no restaurant and thats where you come in ! If we reach our goal we can open sooner and without delay! This also shows that if we have this support our restaurant will too have lasting support once its open ! An average cost to build a commercial kitchen is around 10k to 20k and as close as we can get to any of those numbers will make us so happy !

Everyones contribution is a voice for change! Lets build a plant-based community and start with Chicana Vegana.

If we do not reach our goals our dreams of opening shop may still be possible but with much much delay. Again if we make our goal it helps us build our kitchen and gives us peace of mind knowing we have a community that supports us! Thank you so much familia!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Annie Montgomery, I was born and raised in New Orleans, LA., I come from a family of nine, both my parents have passed on, and just last year, June of 2018 we lost my oldest sister.   To show my appreciation and gratitude to my mom, I want to give her the credit for showing me how to cook like her.  Because of my mom, I have perfected her style and taste of New Orleans style seafood gumbo that makes me extremely happy and proud to share her taste of gumbo with California and the world.

 

About the owner:

I met my husband when I was just seven years old, never in a million years did I think that he   and I would end up together as husband and wife.  We have been married now for thirty nine years and counting.  We have three children, one girl and two boys.  We are blessed with five grand kids, one grand daughter and four grandsons.  We moved our family here to northern California, back in March of 1986  we have moved three times in the whole thirty three years we have been here.  I have been gainfully employed with the same company for the last 26 years and counting, and now it's time for me to start thinking about the years ahead.  

I'm dying to bring this unique flavor and taste to California and the world, that's why I have created this indiegogo campaign to get some financial support to help make my dream of making my mom proud of me.

What We Need & What You Get

I need your help with:

  • Equipment
  • Ingredients
  • Supplies
  • Business cards
  • Web Site
  • Certification
  • License

With your support, and the support of many more people, you will give me the opportunity to share this unique taste and flavor with the world.

The Impact

If you have never been to New Orleans, but always heard about the food and fun, the food is one of the best unique tastes you will experience.  Being from New Orleans, and living here in California, all of the years we have been living here, I have not come across an establishment that truly represents "New Orleans" flavor the way I do.  With your help, "Annie's Bowl of Gumbo can be readily available to the world with just the click of a button. 

Risks & Challenges

Annie's Bowl of Gumbo is a combination of seasonings and flavor of creole style cooking that incorporates some seasoning ingredients some people may or may not be able to consume.  This is why I have created this campaign, to use it as a test market platform that will give me the feedback I need to continue pursuing my goal of making my mom's recipe available to the world.  Food is an acquired taste no matter what it is, and the taste may or may not agree with everyone.  Based on the number of people who enjoy and can consume the dish will help determine  the risk factor for Annie's Bowl of Gumbo.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

For those of you who would love to contribute,  please help make some noise about my campaign, by telling family and friends about my indiegogo crowd funding.  

Thank you in advance for all your support.

story:
AMARGO 

AMARGO is a Portuguese biological and sustainable farm that want to grow the orchards, for that it needs your help 

Sponsor a lemon tree, give him a name, get a certificate and a plate on our orchard that you also can use as a gift and have the opportunity to visit the farm and your lemon tree!

You will also will get all the lemons from your lemon tree for a period of 5 years (shipping not included)

Help AMARGO to put 500 lemon trees on the ground, get biological and fresh lemons directly from the orchard to your kitchen

story:
Why I'm starting Inked Babes Relax Coffee...

I finally figured out what I want to be when I grow up, and what I want to do for the rest of my life.  Over the last year and a half, I have created Inked Babes Relax Coffee Co. - a THC/CBD themed coffee shop ran by happy, outgoing tattooed women.

I want to create an environment where people can enjoy a great cup of coffee, relax and be surrounded by happiness.  I know that there are people out there struggling, and I want to offer a place where we can be there for one another, drop all of the craziness in the world and enjoy a cup of coffee together.

Making tattoos a theme of my coffee shop embraces the individuality of each person that visits.  Tattoos for me have been a release from the pain I've experienced in life, and now i have beautiful art on my body because of it.  This is part of who I am, so I made it part of my brand.

Infusing herbal remedies, including CBD and THC, in our blends adds a unique twist because I want Inked Babes Relax Coffee Co. to symbolize healing and be a place where people heal.

Your support and contributions will help me grow the Inked Babes Relax Coffee brand and open my coffe shop dream come true.

Perks for your support!

My initial goal of $20,000 will allow me to lease the property, purchase the equipment and obtain the licenses necessary to open my Inked Babes Relax Coffee Shop.  Hopefully we can surpass that goal to reach at least $60,000 that will cover upgrades and operating expenses while we get the business moving.

To generate the funds, I am offering Inked Babes gear, coffee cups and even kcups of our original blend... along with other fun perks like a calendar featuring our beautiful Inked Babes and VIP tickets to our launch party when we open shop.

Thanks for making a difference!

Your contribution will help me create this incredible place where people can go to enjoy the best coffee with the best people. I know you will love the Inked Babes brand, and I hope you will visit whenever you get the chance!

Other ways you can help...

Money makes a huge difference, but there are other ways you can help!

  • Please help get word out and make some noise about Inked Babes Relax Coffee Co.
  • Please share the campaign on your social media

Thank you!!!
Saileen Marie

story:
Energy drinks are the fastest growing product in the beverage industry. There is nothing healthier than eating fresh fruit. In any case, adding a glass of fresh fruit juice to your diet is equally the same . If you do not consume fruits every day, the best alternative is to make fresh juice a part of your diet.

 

 

Beveradise is an energy drinks startup business, and currently we have just finished branding, and designing and are ready to go into the manufacturing stage. We are producing low sugar energy drinks made from fruit juice and coconut water designed to provide a healthier body, mental clarity, and stamina. Having a glass of our fresh juice every morning helps in detoxifying your body as our juice is made from 50% coconut water to add natural low sugar.

While most energy drinks are made with the cheapest ingredients to maximize profits and rarely focus on the consumer's true overall health, we use only the best most natural ingredients and have formulated our product to reduce most overlooked health dangers such as caffeine, calories, sugars, and sodium. We have experienced the firsthand problems that can arise from the consumption of most of today's energy drinks on the market. It is our goal to effect a change for the future and provide product that works and benefit each individuals, both short and long term.

 

 

Beveradise will help to strengthen your immune system, aid digestion, and prevents allergies and ailments from entering your system. Fruit juices detoxify your body and naturally flush out the toxins from your body which results in weight loss.

 

Our energy drink Juice has the advantage of providing water to your body, keeping it hydrated. Every juice comes with a certain health benefit and adds value to your system. If you are feeling hydrated, you can have a glass of our juice. If you are feeling exhausted after a long day at work, you can have a glass of our papaya or strawberry  juice as it restores the energy levels of your body.  Your body easily digests liquid and instantly provides nutritional value.

 

We have found through countless research the increasing numbers in those that are unable to enjoy an energy drink product because it does not meet all the desires and health issues of the consumer, including cost. The availability of our product will open many consumption avenues for individuals that currently do not exist.

 

 

50% of Coconut water adds natural low sugars. The coconut water adds these benefits.

  • Helps Weight Loss
  • Reduce Pigmentation
  • Healthy Skin
  • Helps in Digestion
  • Helps Recover from Hangovers
  • Helps Relief From Headache
  • Benefits of Hair Growth
  • Counter-acts Against Bloating
  • Helps Relief from Muscle Cramps
  • Strengthens Bones
  • Boosts Hydration
  • Helps Prevent Kidney Stones

VARIOUS FRUIT TO CONTAIN:

  • Fiber
  • Protein
  • Vitamin C
  • Magnesium
  • Manganese
  • Potassium
  • Sodium
  • Calcium
  • Anti-Oxidants

 

50% Coconut Water, 6% pure concentrated fruit juice, Carbonated, Caffeine, Taurine, and Vitamins & Minerals.

 

 

It is perfect for post-workout drinks as it restores hydration and replenishes electrolytes lost during exercise.

 

 

Beverages can be enjoyed by individuals without side effects and potential dangers. Consumers will be able to enhance their mood, increase performance, balance the body, and calm their mind all at once.

 With our low sugar energy drink, it will give students, professionals, business owners, and families a good energy boost. It keeps your red blood cells and nerves healthy. It helps to regulate the nervous system and maintains a healthy body.

 

 

WHAT WE NEED

Our goal through this campaign is to raise $30,000. The fund will take our business to the next stage and allow us to bring healthy and low sugar energy drinks to the public.

 All of the funds will be used to provide:

 

Branding & Manufacturing of the fruit Juice to various backers 

  • There is no other product available at this time that uses our formulated ingredient. This gives  us a unique position in the marketplace.

 

Marketing cost

  • Our marketing plan will be focused on interactions on social media, celebrity endorsements, radios/TVs and influencer.

 

Even the smallest of contributions will make a big difference for us. For every pledge, above $5 we will send a Personal Thank you email to you as a token of appreciation along with other rewards given for the donation.

 

 

WHAT YOU WILL GET.

Below I've detailed what you'll receive based upon your donation to this campaign

 

PERK $20

 

 

 

 

 

STRENGTH

 

Our strengths stand in the unique ingredient of our product. We do not follow the same path that so many others have chosen in producing their products. Many simply try to reproduce what others have already done. Consumers are looking for not only something new but different than the others. Our pricing and the unique formulation of our product is a direct answer to the consumers.

 

THREATS

 

We believe the biggest threat is no way to protect the replication of our energy drinks once on the market. We have been very careful not to release too much information about our product and the exact formulation.

 

 

With new businesses, there is always risk factors, and we have been overcoming these challenges and risks every day, but still many remain, and the company may not be as successful or go the way we want, but we guarantee that if we hit our minimum target we WILL start bringing these drinks out to the public.

 

As with most crowdfunding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowdfunding experience. If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop.

 

 

For further inquiries: you can contact us via our official email:

 

 

 

We would like to thank all the prospective supporters that took their time to look at this unique opportunity to be a part of the energy drink future.

In addition to supporting this project with your donation, you can also show your support by using Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign page link to your friends and loved ones on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms.

The more the people are aware, the more it will make this campaign a success.

Thank you.

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

We do respond to all emails to answer questions so feel free.

It is our goal to effect a change for the future and provide product that works and benefit each individuals, both short and long term.  Beveradise will help to strengthen your immune system, aid digestion, and prevents allergies and ailments from entering your system. Fruit juices detoxify your body and naturally flush out the toxins from your body which results in weight loss. Our energy drink Juice has the advantage of providing water to your body, keeping it hydrated. Every juice comes with a certain health benefit and adds value to your system. If you are feeling hydrated, you can have a glass of our juice. If you are feeling exhausted after a long day at work, you can have a glass of our papaya or strawberry  juice as it restores the energy levels of your body.  Your body easily digests liquid and instantly provides nutritional value. We have found through countless research the increasing numbers in those that are unable to enjoy an energy drink product because it does not meet all the desires and health issues of the consumer, including cost. The availability of our product will open many consumption avenues for individuals that currently do not exist.  50% of Coconut water adds natural low sugars. The coconut water adds these benefits.
Helps Weight Loss
Reduce Pigmentation
Healthy Skin
Helps in Digestion
Helps Recover from Hangovers
Helps Relief From Headache
Benefits of Hair Growth
Counter-acts Against Bloating
Helps Relief from Muscle Cramps
Strengthens Bones
Boosts Hydration
Helps Prevent Kidney Stones
VARIOUS FRUIT TO CONTAIN:
Fiber
Protein
Vitamin C
Magnesium
Manganese
Potassium
Sodium
Calcium
Anti-Oxidants
 50% Coconut Water, 6% pure concentrated fruit juice, Carbonated, Caffeine, Taurine, and Vitamins & Minerals.  It is perfect for post-workout drinks as it restores hydration and replenishes electrolytes lost during exercise.  Beverages can be enjoyed by individuals without side effects and potential dangers. Consumers will be able to enhance their mood, increase performance, balance the body, and calm their mind all at once. With our low sugar energy drink, it will give students, professionals, business owners, and families a good energy boost. It keeps your red blood cells and nerves healthy. It helps to regulate the nervous system and maintains a healthy body.  WHAT WE NEEDOur goal through this campaign is to raise $30,000. The fund will take our business to the next stage and allow us to bring healthy and low sugar energy drinks to the public. All of the funds will be used to provide: Branding & Manufacturing of the fruit Juice to various backers  There is no other product available at this time that uses our formulated ingredient. This gives  us a unique position in the marketplace. Marketing cost Our marketing plan will be focused on interactions on social media, celebrity endorsements, radios/TVs and influencer. Even the smallest of contributions will make a big difference for us. For every pledge, above $5 we will send a Personal Thank you email to you as a token of appreciation along with other rewards given for the donation.  WHAT YOU WILL GET.Below I've detailed what you'll receive based upon your donation to this campaign PERK $20     STRENGTH Our strengths stand in the unique ingredient of our product. We do not follow the same path that so many others have chosen in producing their products. Many simply try to reproduce what others have already done. Consumers are looking for not only something new but different than the others. Our pricing and the unique formulation of our product is a direct answer to the consumers. THREATS We believe the biggest threat is no way to protect the replication of our energy drinks once on the market. We have been very careful not to release too much information about our product and the exact formulation.  With new businesses, there is always risk factors, and we have been overcoming these challenges and risks every day, but still many remain, and the company may not be as successful or go the way we want, but we guarantee that if we hit our minimum target we WILL start bringing these drinks out to the public. As with most crowdfunding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowdfunding experience. If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop.  For further inquiries: you can contact us via our official email:   We would like to thank all the prospective supporters that took their time to look at this unique opportunity to be a part of the energy drink future.In addition to supporting this project with your donation, you can also show your support by using Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign page link to your friends and loved ones on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms.The more the people are aware, the more it will make this campaign a success.Thank you.We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.We do respond to all emails to answer questions so feel free.

story:
This is Gluconfidence:

Created by People with Diabetes

For People with Diabetes

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Concentrated. Convenient. Confidence.

30 Grams of Fast Acting,  Great Tasting Glucose, in a Convenient 2 oz Bottle

 

 


Our Story begins with Brian. In Spring of 2005, while serving in the United States Navy as a Helicopter Pilot, Brian  was diagnosed with Type 1 Diabetes.  He was passionate about not  allowing diabetes to limit his life in any way, and continued an active life style.   After living  with Diabetes for over 13 years, he saw the need for a concentrated, convenient source of glucose.....Gluconfidence was created!

We are a passionate team who are committed to creating and delivering better products for people with Diabetes. Diabetes is personal to us. Despite the daily challenges, we choose to live active lives and not allow Diabetes to hold us back in any way. This is why we created Gluconfidence.

We believed  that other people with Diabetes were not satisfied with their current glucose options. We surveyed thousands of people with Diabetes from across the U.S. and we received passionate feedback. You spoke. We listened.

 
 

The Input from these Surveys is being used to Launch

the First Production run of Gluconfidence

 

 

Testimonials:

 

 
 

We need your help to bring Gluconfidence to life!

These funds will be used to:

• Finalize Gluconfidence formula and labeling

• Order all bottles, caps, labels, shippers, and ingredients

• Cover the initial co-packer fees for our initial production run

• Help with shipping and handling of all initial orders

• Bring Gluconfidence to market

 

Diabetes is not convenient so we bring convenience to your Glucose needs with direct shipping and monthly supply orders. Get Gluconfidence NOW for the best deal!

 

The Perks:

 

For our Early Bird Supporters, we are providing

Discounts and 100% FREE SHIPPING AND HANDLING!

 

 

Risks and Challenges:

*As with every product launch, there is always a small chance for delays and other issues along the way. But, we will put 100% of our efforts into delivering you a high-quality product and deliver it on time.

*At Gluconfidence we keep communication channels open at all times. During the campaign and after the campaign, we’ll keep you up-to-date about everything happening, so you’ll know exactly where the Gluconfidence project is at.  

*Having 30 grams concentrated glucose in a drinkable 2 oz shot is the #1 Priority.  As we work to finalize the formulation, and receive more feedback from our users, our current flavor, Berry, may change to a flavor profile that more people love. 

* Gluconfidence does not claim to treat, cure or prevent any disease. We are simply 30 grams of fast acting, great tasting glucose, in a convenient 2 oz Bottle. 

 

Get FREE GLUCONFIDENCE

with our REFERRAL PROGRAM!

Other Ways You Can Help:

We Understand that not everyone will be able to contribute to our Campaign, but if  you have

a friend or loved one with Diabetes and want to see Gluconfidence  become a reality, 

  Please LIKE and SHARE our IndieGOGO campaign on Facebook!

Thank you to everyone for your support of our indiegogo campaign!

Please visit our site for more updates at www.gluconfidence.com

What's Next?

Once you've selected and pledged for your perk, it's not over! During the campaign and after, we'll be sending out regular updates to let you know how your order is coming along. In the meantime, why not spread the love and share Gluconfidence  with your friends!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Adam Jones (Marketing and Stakeholder Director for Our Nanobrewery Project) and along with my business partner Feisal Yaqub (Owner/ Manager of Yaqub's Steakhouse) we are looking to open an independent craft beer bar and bottleshop in the heart of Solihull.

This is important to us as we are both passionate about craft beer; educating people about the different styles and tastes, waking up people's taste buds to new and exciting experiences in beer.   

Your contributions would help our dream become an amazing reality, giving Solihull folk the craft beer bug and changing drinking habits forever. We desperately want to be able to run a sustainable drinking venue in Solihull and, if successful, continue to take the model further afield.

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • We need £5,000 to secure the first three month rent and begin to refit the modestly sized property
  • We have amazing beer related perks to give our supporters that take a chance on our dream
  • All funds will go directly into making this dream a reality.

If you have a passion for craft beer and small breweries then this the project is for you. Feisal and I are bringing a combined 30 years of experience to make this a success we just need a small amount to launch us into beery heaven.

Risks & Challenges

Our risks are small, Solihull may not be ready for craft beer 'but their kids are going to love it' - Note. We wont be selling to anyone under age even though I just said 'kids' :-)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate don't worry, you can still help by spreading the word to people you know in Solihull and those who have a passion for all things craft beer.

Thanks for reading!

story:
Short Summary

It seems that nothing gets people more passionate than their diets.  I get that and I'm here for that reason:

  • I started my Ketogenic journey December 8th 2017.  Five months later I was 135 pounds lighter.  
  • Two months into my Keto journey my mother took the plunge.  She had a really hard time getting the electrolytes she needed and had a history of hypothyroid as many do.  I needed a solution that would help with both that she would enjoy and comply with.
  • My cookie was the first thing that got her over the hump and on the road to recovery.  There are thousands of Keto dieters who struggle for electrolytes, portable foods, quick foods, and who are likely lacking thyroid support.  How about making the solution delicious, natural, and Keto?
  • By far the three biggest complaints I hear about Keto are lack of electrolytes, lack of easy and available portable foods, and a satisfying dessert that won't take 2 hours to make.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Lets make Keto possible, easier, and enjoyable for everyone:

  • I have dozens of recipes that I want to make eventually but lets start easy and make a chocolate chip cookie that's actually great for you.  NO SUGAR NO GRAINS!
  • How about a cookie with high quality fats, at least 250 mg sodium, 250 mg of potassium, 67 mg of magnesium, 57 mcg Selenium, and B Vitamins with just all natural foods!  2 G net carbs, more than 80% calories from healthy fats. Omega 3s.  NO SUGAR NO GRAINS!
  • I've found a place that will make these, but I'm just a normal guy with normal bills and normal money on hand.  I can't make these without your help to hit the minimum run required.

The Impact

This is just the beginning with your help :

  • Go through the grocery store and try to find something to take out that doesn't have SUGAR or GRAINS.
  • We are on the precipice of a food revolution.  The standard American diet is wrong and needs to be fixed.  The reality is that many of the people  that will turn to a Ketogenic diet will fail simply because it's too hard and there are not options for them to save the time they don't have.
  • I've spent thousands of dollars and dozens of recipes to find a group of quick, easy, portable foods that are Keto and great for you in many ways.

Risks & Challenges

I'm turning to you because I need help to make this happen.  I'm not rich, and it would appear some big company selling cheap poison for big profit isn't going to step in any time soon.

  • I've been overcoming doubters for a while now.  I'm not going to give up.
  • A revolution is on the way and I just want to help people make the changes to reach their goals. With your help we can remove the impediments that stop them.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford a case of cookies please get the word out:

  • Our LCHF friends on Twitter, Facebook, and Reddit are a good place
  • Chances are many of you know people on Facebook that are trying to lose weight, defeat diabetes, or simply eat healthy.  Let them know.

And that's all there is to it.

Two months into my Keto journey my mother took the plunge.  She had a really hard time getting the electrolytes she needed and had a history of hypothyroid as many do.  I needed a solution that would help with both that she would enjoy and comply with.
My cookie was the first thing that got her over the hump and on the road to recovery.  There are thousands of Keto dieters who struggle for electrolytes, portable foods, quick foods, and who are likely lacking thyroid support.  How about making the solution delicious, natural, and Keto?
By far the three biggest complaints I hear about Keto are lack of electrolytes, lack of easy and available portable foods, and a satisfying dessert that won't take 2 hours to make.

How about a cookie with high quality fats, at least 250 mg sodium, 250 mg of potassium, 67 mg of magnesium, 57 mcg Selenium, and B Vitamins with just all natural foods!  2 G net carbs, more than 80% calories from healthy fats. Omega 3s.  NO SUGAR NO GRAINS!
I've found a place that will make these, but I'm just a normal guy with normal bills and normal money on hand.  I can't make these without your help to hit the minimum run required.

We are on the precipice of a food revolution.  The standard American diet is wrong and needs to be fixed.  The reality is that many of the people  that will turn to a Ketogenic diet will fail simply because it's too hard and there are not options for them to save the time they don't have.

Our LCHF friends on Twitter, Facebook, and Reddit are a good place
Chances are many of you know people on Facebook that are trying to lose weight, defeat diabetes, or simply eat healthy.  Let them know.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Imagine being able to have your own wine cellar or distillery at home, without large containers either making a huge investment.

Imagine to age and customize all your drinks in hours.

 

Want to help us? Share on Facebook   |  Share on Twitter

 

Roblella is a carefully designed oak bottle that offers you a new way to customize and age your favorite drinks in just a few hours. Try it with wine, whiskey, brandy, tequila, white distilled drinks... Make your own cocktails to experience new flavours.

It's the only oak bottle in the world with a detachable base. You will be able to use it as many time as you wish. The removable base makes Roblella easy-to-use and easy to fill it up with your drink. It also makes it simple to keep it clean and in perfect conditions.

The wine will take the oak and fruit flavours. The whiskey, brandy, ... ancient millennial flavours. The Gin, rum, vodka, tequila, ... exclusive colours and aromas. The beer will take personality. With Roblella all your drinks are much more.

 

Thanks to the contact of the drink with the interior roasted oak, Roblella accelerates the aging process, allowing you to customize the wine, whiskey, tequila, rum …The roasted oak wood brings unique flavours and aromas.

 

AGING WHITE RUM TEST

Our product stands out because its removable base, special cap and he Infuser add-on with which you can customize your drinks as you wish. The limit is your mind.

  • Easy to use.
  • Accessible, because it's removable base.
  • Easy to clean and to keep up.
  • Reusable, use it as many times as you wish.
  • Transmits the temperature inside.
  • Complies with legal health regulations.
  • Patented design.
  • Sustainable and certified french oak. 

 

THE INFUSER IS A REMOVABLE DEVICE AND AN  OPTIONAL ACCESSORY WHICH ALLOWS CUSTOMIZE YOUR DRINKS AT THE SAME TIME YOU AGE THEM.

IT BRINGS LIFETIME USES TO ROBLELLA.

IT IS VERY EASY TO ASSEMBLE THANKS TO OUR REMOVABLE BASE.

INFUSE YOUR DRINKS WITH WHATEVER YOU HAVE IN YOUR IMAGINATION

 

USE THE ROBLELLA OAK BOTTLE WITH OR WITHOUT THE INFUSER.

THE INTERIOR TOASTED OAK ALREADY GIVES EXCELLENT AND UNIQUE FLAVORS, COLOURS AND AROMAS. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our anti splash and pressure reducer cap, complies with legal health regulations and allows you close your Roblella safely. In addition, its standard size, allows to use it on all standard bottles.

The click sound will indicate that your Roblella is closed safely.

Inside Roblella's packaging, you will got the instructions for it use. Few steps very simple and quick to do. Watch the video below.

 

 

Roblella was created by Petronilo Puche and his son, Javier Puche, who grew up in barrels, wine tanks, cooperage and unmistakable aromas.

In 2013, Javier Puche began thinking about how to bring this experience to people, avoiding the huge containers impossible to install in home or small-sized business. This made, with his father, inquiring about progress in the area of raising fermented beverages and distilled spirits. Due to this investigation, they verified that, if the contact surface of the wood with the liquid gets increased, the contribution of aromas, flavors and colors, get accelerated considerably and pleasantly. The size was important because, so it had to be easy to handle and maintain, reusable, keep cool the drink, fit in the refrigerator or dig and also it must be able to served directly to the table.

Then, around 2014, they began to create Roblella, an exclusive and premium oak bottle.

The name of our oak bottle is the contraction of the spanish word Oak (Roble) and bottle (Botella). Roblella contraction defines perfectly this innovative bottle that allows you to feel the aromas and the flavours of the oak (and more thanks to the infuser) in your drinks.

We collaborate with professionals with national recognition, such as Prof. María Encarna Gómez Plaza, professor at the department of food technology and nutrition at the Murcia University and also, wine specialist.

 

We work continually in search of improving our product.

Indiegogo has a huge community of 'early adopters' who can help us to keep moving on our project and improving it. We know Indiegogo community are very important for innnovative enterpreneurs who want to keep growing and we believe in their role to stand-up and support creative innovations such as Roblella. 

Together, we can do it. Join us and collaborate!

"A unique container able to age and provide flavor, color and aromas to any drink in a minimum time" -  La Opinión de Murcia

"Roblella offers an innovative and very attractive solution for the final consumer" - La Verdad

"A young wine that has not previously gone through a barrel gets, in a few hours,  the flavor and aromas typical of aging wines" - Murcia Diario

We have been working for 5 years to get the highest quality product. Collaborating with experts for the optimal development of each piece that Roblella is made with .

We are committed to fulfill our promises and bringing Roblella to all our backers, on the indicated dates. If there would be external factors contributing to the shipments delays have been included, we will make sure to keep our backers up to date, keeping the contact.

We also provide a communication at info@roblella.com

Shipping and other charges (excluding customs fees) vary form country to country. We are shipping to most countries in the world, so select your reward tier to see more about the details relevant to you. Import duties and taxes are not included in our reward levels. These charges are completely out of our control and vary according to each country. Keep in mind that you will be responsible for any charges and taxes that apply to your country.

Shippments that could not be delivered due to an inaccurately provided address (including failure to update an old address) will incur additional costs to be reshipped.

If you like Roblella but you can't back us, you can still help us and make Roblella success by sharing this Indiegogo Campaign or giving us your feedback about anything you want. Thank you!

Join us and collaborate!"A unique container able to age and provide flavor, color and aromas to any drink in a minimum time" -  La Opinión de Murcia"Roblella offers an innovative and very attractive solution for the final consumer" - La Verdad"A young wine that has not previously gone through a barrel gets, in a few hours,  the flavor and aromas typical of aging wines" - Murcia DiarioWe have been working for 5 years to get the highest quality product. Collaborating with experts for the optimal development of each piece that Roblella is made with .We are committed to fulfill our promises and bringing Roblella to all our backers, on the indicated dates. If there would be external factors contributing to the shipments delays have been included, we will make sure to keep our backers up to date, keeping the contact.We also provide a communication at info@roblella.comShipping and other charges (excluding customs fees) vary form country to country. We are shipping to most countries in the world, so select your reward tier to see more about the details relevant to you. Import duties and taxes are not included in our reward levels. These charges are completely out of our control and vary according to each country. Keep in mind that you will be responsible for any charges and taxes that apply to your country.Shippments that could not be delivered due to an inaccurately provided address (including failure to update an old address) will incur additional costs to be reshipped.If you like Roblella but you can't back us, you can still help us and make Roblella success by sharing this Indiegogo Campaign or giving us your feedback about anything you want. Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Peter Kuhn and I am a successful Australian Entrepreneur now living in Kiev, Ukraine. I am 61 years young and still have the energy and desire to create a new business in a foreign country. I have been living in Ukraine for 4 years and I find Kiev a wonderful and exciting city to live in.
  • Following 3 years of selling our tasty Australian Pies in the Kiev market to small outlets being cafes, pubs and clubs, we now have the opportunity to enter the major retail chain markets of supermarkets, petrol stations and large chain cafes. The goal of this campaign is to provide us with sufficient funds to facilitate a substantial marketing program, employ a professional sales and marketing team, and also to support a delayed cash flow due to the trading terms of these major retail chains. Also during this expansion period we will be purchasing new equipment for the factory to assist in reducing production costs.  
  • When we achieve our target contributions we will be able to expand the business to a level of sales of approximately $1,200,000 US per annum (30,000,000 UAH local currency) which will generate EBITDA profits of approximately $300,000 US per annum (7,500,000 UAH).

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking funding of $60,000 US which equals 20% of the nominated holding company and this will be invested in the following areas of the business. 
    1. New equipment - Filling Depositor $2,000 - Shock Freezer $4,000
    2. In store marketing campaigns that will include tastings of the products. We will produce "mini pies" of 40 grams for this purpose. This will occur in all selected supermarket outlets and will continue for a period of 3 hours per day for the 3 busiest trading days and times in each supermarket. We are anticipating a total of 30 supermarkets and each promotion will cost approximately $70 US giving a total budget of $6,300 US. Allowing for possible over time of the staff involved we suggest a total of $7,000 for these activities. Once the first run of these promotions have been completed we intend to do a second run 1 month later. Total budget for this will now be $14,000 US
    3. Printed marketing material will be required for all new outlets. These will be "Table Tent Menus" in cafes,pubs, petrol stations etc, external metal stand up signs, and also "descriptive flyers" to be positioned in the supermarkets. $5,000 US   
    4. Employment of Marketing Director to be covered for the first 6 months of this period of growth. $12,000 US
    5. Employment of professional sales team for the first 3 months of the growth period. $6000 US. Note that these salaries will be linked to sales performance once the sales begin to grow.
    6. A major balance of the funds will be required to cover the cash flow delay created by dealing with major retail chains. The standard trading terms of these retailers is 45 days for payment following the delivery. 45 days of production costs to service the anticipated sales of 800 products per day will be approximately $15,000 US
    7. The total of all the above is $58,000 US and the balance of $2,000 will be kept in reserve for further marketing programs and ongoing minor expansion costs. 
    8. The final goal for the business in Ukraine is to achieve sales of 5000 products per day. All the above costs are attributable to expansion in Kiev only and as the supermarkets begin distribution to outlets in other major cities we will need to continue with the promotional activities in each new location.
  • Perks can be many different varieties dependent upon the level of contribution and also the location of the contributor. Below we lay out the possibilities.
    • Contributors living in Kiev providing funds of $100+ US will have 10 of our delicious products delivered to their home.
    • Contributors living in Kiev providing funds of $1,000+ US will also receive the 10 products delivered to their door and will also receive a $50 US voucher that can be used at one of Kiev's great French Restaurants, Garchitsa!
    • For contributors living outside of Ukraine we will arrange the same values of the previous "perks" to be used at your preferred food outlet. 
  • Should we not achieve our desired funding within the period, all funds we do receive will be returned to the contributors minus any costs taken by the site provider, Indiegogo.

The Impact

  • The final value to each contributor will be of course a financial one, but we want to point out that this project is employing some of the good people of Ukraine during a time of tough economic conditions for them. When we reach our goal of 5000 products per day we will be employing approximately 20 local people. Our staff are all Ukrainian and are very wonderful and dedicated people to the concept and dream of bringing the iconic Australian Meat Pie to their fellow Ukrainian citizens. 
  • I was successful in Australia with other projects not linked to this type of project, but my dedication to this project included me spending 4 weeks working in a bakery in Australia, seeking consultants from the industry to provide professional advice on recipes and production processes, all to understand what was required to produce a fantastic product that is acceptable to this market. 
  • As I have always been interested in food this dream of taking Australian Meat Pies to Ukraine was born out of research carried out over a two year period prior to my relocating from Australia to Ukraine. Recognition of our product came from the largest supermarket chain in Ukraine which want our product placed in their "Bench of Tradition" section. We have brought the "Traditional Australian Food" to Ukraine for their enjoyment, and to date we have no complaints from people that have eaten this food!

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges to this project were partly determined when we commenced the business over three years ago. We appointed a local advertising agency to assist us with market research and advice on the purchasing culture of the Ukrainian people. The big risk was of course the local population not accepting the product! In the very early days the agency carried out "Focus Group"test sessions of three different socioeconomic sections of the community. They were "University Students", "Young Professionals",and finally "Families". All the groups provided positive feed back on the taste, price and presentation of the product. Results of this research are available.       

  • During the first periods of production and sales we began to understand better what the purchasing culture is in this country. Of course the revolution in 2014 and then the devaluation of the local currency caused problems with the affordability of what was considered a gourmet product due to the amount of meat product in each pie.
  • Our plans for overcoming these challenges were quite simple. We began to produce pies that contained products better known to the local market, such as "Potato and Mushroom Pie", "Cabbage and Mushroom Pie","Cherry Pie", and many other products more suitable to a broader market. We now have 25 recipes of Pies and Sausage Rolls, as well as other Iconic Australian bakery products and also we now produce Ukrainian pastry products that will be sold to the petrol station groups and chain cafes.  

Other Ways You Can Help

In closing, we trust that all people that are interested, or even just intrigued with the Australian man bringing this product to Ukraine, either contribute to the project or at the very least let your friends know all about us.

Thank you for your time and interest.

Kind regards

Peter The Aussie pie man in Kiev!!

story:
Wally Amos - The Undisputed Cookie King

Wally Amos forever changed the way America buys and enjoys cookies. With an impressive career spanning decades, Wally has had his highs and lows as he found it easy to whip up delicious baked goods but difficult to run a business.

Wally is 82 years old and he sees this as his last shot to "get it right"; to not only deliver the best gourmet cookies available anywhere but do so in a sustainable way.  Wally has two passions; making the best cookies he can and helping people to read through his literacy advocacy. 

Wally at The White House with President Ronald Reagan

The Best Cookies Have the Best Ingredients

Wally Amos knows better than anybody what makes a good cookie and only the best ingredients go into his cookies.  He only uses real butter and makes sure that chocolate chips are the #1 ingredient. 

And the results speak for themselves...

This Might Be the Sweetest Crowdfunding Campaign Ever

That's because when you back this crowdfunding campaign you get Wally Amos cookies using the original recipe that made him famous.

That's a sweet deal but we'll make it even sweeter....

Everyone who backs this campaign gets a FREE vacation stay with your choice of vacation destinations across the US and Mexico.  No strings attached.  Check the FAQ for details.

We Left the Best for Last - The Stretch Goal

If we hit $100,000 in funding we'll roll out a limited edition cookie tin filled with three pounds of cookie goodness baked by hand by Wally Amos himself.   Backers who grab this new perk will get their choice of cookies mixed up anyway they want and have a rare cookie tin suitable for sewing supplies, spare change or even more cookies when you re-order from our coming-soon website.

Wally Has Made Millions of People Smile for Decades.  Now It's Our Turn to Make Him Smile.

Crowdfunding is sought to raise the cash needed to bootstrap Aunt Della's Cookies into a profitable company shipping cookies across the country.  Learning from his experience and drawing upon the knowledge of a seasoned business executive who is "minding the store", Wally wants one more date with destiny and make people smile and live out the rest of his life being happiest doing what he does best.

You Can't Lose When You Back Wally Amos.

There are no risks or challenges here.  Wally's been making the best cookies for decades.  He knows exactly what to do and exactly how to do it. The businessman he's working with holds degrees in accounting and management and knows exactly how to run a profitable a business.

Every backer will get their cookies without fail.

story:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 

SHORT DESCRIPTION (<<spoiler alert!>>)

(If you have time and want to read the detailed description skip this part)

Los Grillos Hermanos is a startup of the Food & Beverage industry. We will be producing massive quantities of hyper-proteic edible cricket powder, which has a competitive advantage in terms of price/protein content ratio respect to meat. Our mission is to feed human beings that are in a state of poverty with cricket powder, our vision is that animal protein market around the globe will see an increase in the demand in the next future, but it can not avoid to consider the environmental emergency, so it will convert some of the supply into a green source like insect. 

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

What is Los Grillos Hermanos.

Before being a project of business and an opportunity to enter in a new market at the moment of its deregulation, Los Grillos Hermanos is the idea of using a raw edible material by exploiting at best its properties.

 

Do you know that everyday 10 thousands kids die in Africa because of malnutrition? And do you know that this malnutrition is mainly caused by diets poor in protein consumption? (Source: FAO)

 

We want to make our contribution in this struggle by massively producing cricket powder, a superfood that contains 60% of protein and several other crucial nourishments.

 

 

What are the benefit for their health, if malnutrished people start consuming insect proteins.

 

We already mentioned that 3.6 million kids die for malnutrition every year only in Africa and more than 30 million people worldwide. Having state that, we are admitting that there exist a market for protein that does not fulfill its purpose: allocating efficiently its resources. The reason of this failure is simple: animal proteins have a huge cost for extremely poor people.

 

By studying the production of cricket powder, a flour made by grinding dry crickets, we realized that we could offer the product for 4 €/kg in Third World Countries. Then we wanted to compare the price of our product with the one of our competitors, but we wanted to include in the reasoning not only the price but also the protein content, hence we decided to valuate by comparing the price of protein per kilogram. Meat in Africa has a price for protein content ratio of 35 €/kg, while cricket power's is 6.6 €/kg, which means that meat proteins costs 5-6 times more than cricket proteins.

[proteins in : a) meat: 20%, b)crickets: 60%; price per kg: a) meat: 7€/kg, b)crickets: 4€/kg; price for a kg of protein: a) meat: 35 €/kg, b)crickets: 6.6 €/kg]

The conclusion is self-evident, if you live in a Third world country and you are extremely poor, so poor that you cannot buy enough meat or fish to survive, you should try to buy insect protein, because beef proteins are more than five times expensive.

If you are in a state of absolute poverty, you should consider to consume insects not only for their proteins, but also for other several reasons:

  • Calories: 100g of insects contains 120 kcal roughly. You should know that the second main cause of malnutrion diseases is the lack of calories. Since cricket powder must be mixed with wheat powder in equal parts to get pasta or bakery products, the consumption of cricket powder is always positively correlated with the consumption of calories.
  • Vitamines: insects contain fundamental vitamines, such as B12, which is the missing element in veagan diets, that only animal consumption can offer. Among the many vitamines, the most concentrated are vitamines A, B1, B2, B12 and E.
  • Acid fats: insects contain Omega 3 and Omega 6, two fundamental nourishments for the healthy growth of a child, that is normally assumed through blue fish. Often, landlocked countries have problems in integrating their diets with these two acid fats. Insects may be a nice way to get around the problem with a costless and natural solution.
  • High quality amminoacides: relatively to proteins it is also important to consider the quality of amminoacides: insects contain high quality amminoacides, fundamentals for the muscolar growth. These nourishments are not contained in vegetable proteins, such as beans or soy.

 

 

What are the benefit for the environment if more and more people start converting their animal protein consumption towards insects.

 

 

The agribusiness is the second world polluter. Meat and fish markets are responsible for 24% of global emissions. This is mainly due to the fact that cows’ farts contain methan, which pollutes 25 times more than CO2. Since we raised cows population to billions, it became an issue. Agribusinesses pollutes also indirectly: 70% of agricultural land is used to produce vegetable proteins to feed animals. Since humans are globally increasing agricultural lands, partly by cutting down rainforests, reducing their lung breathing effect, we are deforesting to feed animals that will keep polluting.

 

As everyone knows, if humans does not invert the pollution trend, consequences may be catastrophic.

 

Insects may contribute to change things. Since 2003, the Food and Agricultural Organization, a UN agency, talks about environmental benefits in producing insects for human consumption. Insects are source of food incredibly more sustainable than traditional animal sources, crickets emit thousands times less Green House Gasses , they need 6 times less food to convert in edible product and they consume 4 times less water than cattles.

As world population grows, we will need to produce more and more proteins, but we clearly cannot afford to keep using polluting sources such as cattle, pork and fish. If insects start integrating human diet in an increasing proportion, we may be able to decrease the damage we are inflicting to our own Planet to feed our vast population.

 

What are our products?

Our project purpose is to raise large cricket’s farms. These facilities can sell cricket powder, as already mentioned, dry crickets, alive crickets, mainly to be fed to reptiles, cricket poo, which is a sustainable and high-quality fertilizer, methan produced by the fermentation of cricket poo and all the derivative products that can obtained (pasta, bread, crackers, protein bars, snacks,...).

 

 

What can be cooked with cricket powder?

Cricket powder should be considered equivalent to wheat flour, in an organic sense, and to meat and fish in the capacity of feeding a human being.

It can be transformed in bread, pasta, cakes, milk shakes, juices and several other things.

As an Italian company we believe that a natural outlet of cricket powder will be pasta. Cricket’s pasta is a perfect way to have a healthy meal if your economic resources are scarce and your struggling to buy meat and fish for your family: if you eat pasta with a vegetable sauce, such as tomato sauce, you are consuming high-quality proteins, vegetables, a fair quantity of carbohydrates, several important vitamins and acid fats.

 

In our website there will be a dedicated section about recipes. We will hire a chef to shoot videos that will show how to cook cricket’s powder, that will be uploaded also on our Youtube channel.

 

Who will be our customers?

In developed countries we will have two main kind of target consumers for the cricket powder:

  • People that care about sustainability of food: this people will consume our product because they believe in the cause of reducing the pollution emitted by our meals by choosing wisely what we eat. We will be able to reach this cluster selling to bio-shops, bio-supermarket, pharmacies and herbalists. In addition we will try to sell directly to retail customers through our website and our social media activities.

  • People involved in fitness: if you care about your body and you want to consume less carbohydrates and more high-quality proteins, you should start considering eating cricket’s powder based meals. We will be able to reach this cluster selling to fitness shops, supermarkets, energy snack producers, food integrators producers, and gyms. In addition we will try to sell directly to retail customers through our website and our social media activities.

On the contrary, in the Third world we will need to sell to entities that feed people that are in a poverty state: human organizations, schools, churches, soup kitchens, local governments or orphanages.

Another type of customer, that will be extremely important in the beginning of operations, will be reptile breeders. Reptiles, as some fishes and frogs, require to eat alive crickets. We will be able to deliver alive crickets in Italy and some other close countries, such as Switzerland, France, Austria, Germany and Slovenia. Currently, people can buy alive crickets from their local pet shop or by online shops, in both cases the majority of those crickets will come from Eastern European farms. Hence, the animals are suffering at least 24 hours long travels before getting to the reptile breeder, resulting in high mortality rates. Our purpose is to supply Italian pet shops with periodical deliveries of italian alive crickets for a competitive price. Touching the market with first hand we realized that is very easy to convince pet shop to change their supplier if they  know that your facility is close, because the advantage in travel times, hence in mortality rates, is clear.

Whole dry crickets will be an option in buying cricket powder and they are basically the ungrinded version of cricket powder. This product will be sold to exotic restaurants mainly, so they can actually show the cricket in their dishes, like in fried crickets.

Hydrogen, Methan and zero km fertilizer: crickets will produce tons of waste product, which is composed by poo and exosckeletons mainly. We will wet this product and we will ferment it to obtain methan bubbles, that will be gathered in methan clynders. The resulting fermentated waste will be then dried to obtain a high quality agricultural fertilizer. Then methan (CH4) will be chemically processed to isolate hydrogen from carbon.

 

 

What are our short-term targets?

 

This idea of business is very young in age, the study has began in August 2020 and it has been proposed to only two investors of capital, that immediately agreed on funding. Other two operating but still funding partners will join the business from January, taking care of biology, chemistry, humanitarian contacts, recruiting, legal and sales. Cash will flow to Los Grillos Hermanos from December 2020 and operations will officially begin in January 2021. 

To start operation in January and fund properly a digital marketing agency contract we agreed on asking to the community of Indiegogo 8000€.


Our original will was to start operations in Siena, so that we could also link our production to very ancient and famous local products of our hometown. We have tried for weeks to find a warehouse nearby Siena, but no opportunity was offered by local real estate market.

The closest appropriate facility we could find was in Certaldo (Firenze), a perfect spot to grow crickets, even if it is someway far from distribution centers.

Then we received concerns about the legal italian situation for commerce, so we decided to change everything and start producing in UK, in Birmingham, which is the second british city by population, and it is widely more affordable then London.

 

Right now we are taking into consideration the offer of one of our investor partner to produce in one of his warehouse in Milano. We are deepening legal situation to take the right choice...

 

Assuming that we would be able to start operation in January in Milano, our short term targets will be: 

  • Open losgrilloshermanos.com by January 2021;
  • Build a greenhouse inside a warehouse to breed cricekets by February 2021;
  • Breed crickets, hence harvesting first batches of crickets from April 2021;
  • Create a Youtube channel with our initiatives, like the live stream of our live zoo, the recipes of the Chef, our video material, ... by January 2021;
  • Begin the partnership with a digital marketing agency from January 2021;
  • Start selling pasta and other derivatives of the cricket powder from June 2021;
  • Create a network of commercial agents with a coworking office in the warehouse from February 2021;
  • Start producing methan and hydrogen from June 2021;
  • Open Los Grillos Hermanos Foundation from January 2021;
  • ...

 

Our short-term goals will be:

  • Sell to 50 pet shops in Italy a 1000 alive crickets box every two weeks. This mean we will be selling for 2000€ every month.
  • Sell 100 kg of cricket powder every month at an average price of 10€/kg, which will generate selling for 1000 €.

 

What is Los Grillos Hermanos Foundation?

 

Another feature of our website will be the donation section, where people will be able to do charity: we will select 5 charitable projects around the globe to whom donate supplies of cricket powder. We will create an independent no-profit organization named Los Grillos Hermanos Foundation that will raise money for feeding people in some Third World Country facilities with cricket’s powder. This entity will operate separately from the Italian firm, but will buy from it the powder at a convenient and locked price. Donators will be found by using proper social media campaigns. Los Grillos Hermanos Foundation will try to raise specific crowdfunding campaigns such as in the following example. Suppose that there is a massive famine in East Africa, which strongly hit Addis Abeba, a huge city of 5 million people. LGHF may identify a poor neighbourhood of the suburbs of Addis Abeba, populated by 100 thousands people; it will have to make the computation and then ask donations for feeding this specific suburb with cricket protein for a certain period, like “Feed Suburb X of Addis Abeba, heavily hit by famine, for 3 months with cricket proteins”. This campaign could be a large charity crowdfunding that may be sustained by large companies, hence it can ask for millions. Specifically, this campaign would need to raise money to buy 900 tons of cricket powder, so it will have to raise 2-3 millions of euros.

 

How we will reward your donation

 

Your donation will be rewarded with our merchandise, with a periodical supply of alive crickets or with cricket powder.

In case you choose to get rewarded with cricket powder we give you the chance to donate the product to our no-profit organization to be shipped to Third world needing facilities. By doing this, you will donate twice, once to a young social responsible business and once to needing people.

Otherwise, you can donate a simbolic amount to be rewarded with our colourfull merchandising:

  • Shirts: here you can see unisex models but we can deliver you also the shirt for girls. Colours are yellow, white+yellow, white+red, red, light blue.

  • Hat: available only yellow for the moment:

  • Apron: available only in yellow for the moment:

  • Facemask: available in yellow and in white:

 

 

How would we use extra-donations:

  • We can fund a research project on artificial selection of crickets, in order to raise a healthier, bigger and fast-growing animal.
  • We may fund a nutritional and economic research on the impact of large use of insect protein in poor populations.
  • We will be able to fund an automation research in which we will try to build a system of breeding containers that gets their food and water supply from a machine that moves on a binary.
  • We will donate part of the sum to the no-profit organization, in order to fund a contract with a digital marketing agency.
  • We will fund the purchase of an industrial machine and all the relative equipment for pasta production, in order to experiment some format and maybe start selling.

 

What can you do to support us

You can donate, but you can also do something even more important: you can share the cause of converting part of your protein consumption into insects, for the environment.

 

Share this information to your contacts and we will be already glad for your help, news and description are on our social media pages.

 

QUOTES:

 

"the idea of using a raw edible material by exploiting at best its properties"

"3.6 million kids die for malnutrition every year"

"reducing the pollution emitted by our meals by choosing wisely what we eat"

"share the cause of converting part of your protein consumption into insects"

"Our mission is to feed human beings that are in a state of poverty with cricket powder"

We sent out 500 free samples to our fans who supported us in our prelaunch efforts and asked them to let us know about their experiences.

The overwhelming response has been "Wow, it really works as I felt better the day after drinking".

We know it works as we've been testing it ourselves for months. Now it's time to spread the word and together we can help people feel better the next day after drinking around the world.

 

 

 

Two hours before you start to drink, PrePear superchargers your liver by creating the amino acids to help metabolize alcohol more efficiently. Using high-quality ingredients proven to help protect you from the ill effects of too many libations, PrePear is the perfect blend of nature and science. 

 

 

 

Also known as the Asian Pear or Apple Pear, Korean pears have been scientifically shown to reduce the effects of too much alcohol consumption by up to 21%.*** Korean pears act on the key enzymes involved in alcohol metabolism, alcohol dehydrogenase (ADH) and aldehyde dehydrogenase (ALDH) to speed up alcohol metabolism and elimination of acetaldehyde.*

 

Prickly pear cactus has anti-inflammatory properties and can alleviate symptoms such as dry mouth and nausea, which are common side effects from too much drinking. Furthermore, a study by Tulane Health and Sciences Center found that Prickly Pear Cactus lowered the risk of an enduring or severe hangover by half!

 

Studies suggest that these three ingredients work together to help protect the liver from alcohol damage through the production of the antioxidant glutathione. They also support more efficient alcohol metabolism while reducing oxidative damage to the body so you feel better even if you’d had a few too many.

 

 Proven to work, they keep your body feeling better, even if you’d had a few too many. 

 

 

Take after the last drink to speed up detoxification, protect the brain, and decrease the effects of consuming too much alcohol. Think of it as a healthy chaser to your last drink of the night to ensure you have a better tomorrow.

 

 

 

Extracted from the Oriental Raisin Tree, which has been used for medicinal purposes for thousands of years, DHM has been scientifically shown to bind to GABA receptors, reducing anxiety and hyperexcitability caused by alcohol exposure and withdrawal in the brain. Remember that sickly feeling headache you get after a night of drinking? DHM is here to protect you from that.** 

 

DHM also puts a protective shield around the liver by increasing the speed at which alcohol is metabolized and by increasing the activity of ADH and ALDH in the liver, enabling the body to metabolize and flush out alcohol and toxins faster so you feel better the next day.

 

Another match made in “drinkers heaven,” this powerful team of ingredients continues to protect the liver even after you’ve said your goodbyes and went home to sleep. The blend works swiftly to supercharge your liver’s ability to produce alcohol metabolizing enzymes so you don’t feel sick when your buzz wears off.

 

Ready to hit the hay? L-theanine and chamomile make the perfect pair, flooding your body with antioxidants, promoting relaxation and some much needed sleep!

 

If you’ve had experience drinking (and we know you have), you know that when you’ve had one too many, you’re in for quite a bit of nausea the next day. Ginger and Tumeric to the rescue! Long used for tummy troubles and detoxes, these ingredients help keep that sick feeling in your gut at bay. Enjoy your breakfast! Cold Pizza and a glass of chocolate milk, anyone?!!

 

 

John Serda

Fascinated by alcohol at an early age, John built his first still in the garage when he was just 17. Because it’s illegal to make moonshine in your garage, John decided to move on to making beer. Twenty-seven years later, John is still at it, opening Serda Brewing, a 30 barrel brewery located in beautiful downtown Mobile, Alabama. Unfortunately, with age comes bad hangovers and not one to ever quit, John began working on hacking his hangovers too. Two years later after intense research and clinical trials (aka, drinking a lot and seeing if it worked), John created a highly effective formula consisting of science-backed ingredients that alleviated his hangovers. “If it worked for me, it’s going to work for others,” he thought, so John began working on bringing his product to market. John teamed up with a lab and contract manufacturers in the U.S. to make sure his product was safe, made with only the highest quality ingredients and completely FDA compliant. Thus RePear was born! Today, John is probably on a boat or beach somewhere drinking one of his Tidewater Vienna Ambers with his RePear by his side thinking about how to graft marijuana in to hops.

 

References:

*A 2004 study led by Dr. Jeff Wiese at Tulane Health Sciences Center in New Orleans found that when taken before drinking, the extract of the prickly pear cactus can alleviate symptoms such as dry mouth and nausea, which is why it’s included in the RePear formula.

 

**One of RePear’s main ingredients, DHM (Dihydromyricetin), is extracted from the Oriental Raisin Tree, which has been used medicinally for thousands of years. Researched by the School of Medicine at UCLA, DHM is used to block GABA receptors, therefore, reducing anxiety, sleeplessness and hyperexcitability caused by alcohol exposure and withdrawal in the brain.  

 

***Asian or Korean pears have been scientifically shown to reduce the effects of hangovers by up to 21% by the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (CSIRO), an independent Australian federal government agency responsible for scientific research.

story:
Short Summary

We have been experimenting with vegan cheese for quite a while now and think we can do better than the commercial, artificially flavoured vegan products on the market. We're a young couple and have both worked as chefs in veg & vegan restaurants. 

Our cheeses have an aged flavour from natural probiotics and utelise almonds, macademias, hemp seeds, organic non-gmo soy, coconut fats and other natural ingredients.

What We Need & What You Get

Funding will go towards:

  • £500 - professional blender to get a creamy smooth texture from our cheeses
  • £200 - first stock order from wholesaler
  • £100 - packaging and branding
  • £200 - improvements to our kitchen space, small equipment & storage
Perks:

  • our cheeses, of course! (see side bar) These will be sent after our funding comes through and our full range is launched (we currently have a very limited preorder range). You will receive an email when this happens and can then select your cheese(s).

The Impact

Why we need a vegan cheese company:

  • very little decent vegan cheese available in the UK
  • more ethical than dairy cheese
  • the less people are 'missing out on', the more likely they are to go vegan

Other Ways You Can Help

We know some of you might not be able to contribute, but please:

  • share our campaign with your friends and on social media
  • follow our social media sites

story:
So we are willing to make small production of birch tree juice and make product available online.

The birch tree emits sap only for a short period of time (about four weeks) during spring. That period starts when the snow has melted away and the day-temperature reaches some degrees above freezing point. The rise of the sap stops immediately when the tree comes into leaf.
During sap-rising, a big old birch can give 15-20 litres per day, but this requires a tapping-hole of 5 cm diameter and 10 cm depth. The birch will endure such treatment only once, maybe twice in its lifetime.

So after collecting juice we are filling it in special designed eco paper water bottles.

story:
Benvenuti !

Hi ! I'm Juliette, a french girl living in Italy (in Bolzano) for almost two years now.
What am I doing here ? Well, I remained in Italy for love. Love of the italian culture, the italian food, and italian wines ! (and love for an italian man too!)
I had the opportunity to work in different places here, in Italy. Two of them were really important for me: a restaurant that gives an extreme importance to the products' quality and where everyhting's 100% italian, and a clothing e-commerce start-up. After those two experiences I thought "why couldn't I do the same?"

This is how I got the idea of Vini, Vidi, Vici ! We all know the Caesar's sentence: "Veni, vidi, vici" ("I came, I saw, I conquered"). And in fact, I want italian people to conquer their own land. I want them to drink, see and conquer something they didn't know before.
One of the biggest problem when you want to buy wine in Italy, is that if you live in North, you'll find only north wine and same thing in every region. You will find a lot of commercial wines, but nothing special.
By making a selection of different wines of different italian places everymonth, we could enable people to discover new wines.

People will pay for a subscription and everymonth, they will receive directly at home a box with two bottles of wine (selected by a sommelier), some recipes that go well with and the story of those wines and their producers. Wine has to be affordable for everyone. That's why our first price is €19.90/month. By choosing wines that are still unknown by the general public we can remain with a low cost. 
This is a way to gather people to their own culture and story, making them taste quality products.
Wine is often boring and difficult to understand and appreciate. With Vini Vidi Vici, anyone will be able to love it ! With the sommelier we'll write for the customers a little guide to help them, with simple words, to taste the wine.
Italian culture is my first passion, wines are my second, the third is Nadamas! My vineyard-lover cat will help me in this venture. I want Vini Vidi Vici to be sympathetic, funny and friendly !

Nadamas in the vineyards.
 

What We Aim to Fund & What You Get

 
Unfortunately, having a dream does cost money... That's why I'm asking you your help!
I'm asking 30.000€ to be able to begin this venture with solid foundations. It will help me to:

  • work legally (italian administration is hard for a french girl, and if I want to begin, I have to pay for some insurances and taxs, even if I don't earn anything)
  • launch the website (this summer) and begin some marketing actions
  • pay my wine producers (as nice as they are, they won't give me their wines for free)
  • buy all what wine needs to be well preserved (my appartment is too hot on summer, wines would be better in a cellar)
  • prepare the boxes (print the story of the producers, the recipes, buy the cardboard boxes)
  • go to some wine fairs to make Vini Vidi Vici get famous a meet personally the producers.

In exchange for your help, there are some little presents of the wine world we'd like to give you. Please check out how you can contribute on the right side of this page. Unfortunately as I said, italian administration is hard and so I can't send italian wine abroad for the moment. But I'll make sure that if we get more than the 30.000€ needed, it will be possible and I'll be happy to send some wine to my dear helpers!

You can also hit the "back it" button at the top of this page if you'd simply like to make a donation of any amount.

If you'd like to financially contribute to our campaign in a different way than what we have listed, please send an email to info.vinividivici@gmail.com. We are open to loan investments or other proposals. Every bit counts!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Outside of your contribution, you can help build buzz for us by liking our Facebook page, or following us on Instagram. Thanks!

 

Thank You ! Grazie !
