story:
Short Summary

Our Promoter, Mr Oladapo Loto, graduated with First Class honours in Biochemistry from The Federal University of Technology, Akure in 1987. He joined Nigerian Breweries Plc (The Heineken Subsidiary in Nigeria) in August 1988 where he trained as a Brewer. Subsequently he worked for Consolidated Breweries Plc and Guinness Nigeria Plc. He held many roles in the Brewing Industry some of which includes Shift Brewer, Brewing Manager, Development Brewer and Head Brewer. He has developed training manuals for Brewing training in the past, involved in Research and Development as well as Operations management. In the past five years he has been consulting especially in the area of ethanol fermentation and is currently setting up a 33,000 litres per day ethanol distillery for a Client in Ikorodu, Lagos, Nigeria

The Brewing is a sector of the Nigerian economy can create hundreds and thousands of jobs more than what currently exists if only people understand how to go about it. To achieve this we need to get many people involved in Craft brewing if it must make any meaningful impact in Nigeria, hence the idea of the Brewing School.
With over 20 million people and a sizeable expatriate population and no craft beer, a lot of potential exist for Craft Brewing right here in Lagos. We want to create a new industry segment.

This project intends to bring the Industry closer to the people in a way they can understand it and partake in it thereby deepening the economy and creating the much needed jobs for many of our youths and unemployed graduates. Anybody from any background can get involved in the craft brewing industry with the right training and exposure. This is what we hope to create right here in Lagos, Nigeria with this project.

If you help us to achieve this project, you will be helping to kick start a new area for economic development for Nigeria. The impact of this in the overall economy will be felt through the creation of many jobs. The Project itself will employ 15 to 20 people directly in the first 12 months and provide part time employment for resource persons that will be involved in our training ( Brewing, Quality, Marketing, Sales, Engineering, Catering Consultants etc). This will also ensure that a lot of our retired and working professionals will always have something to do. Our Trainees will be encouraged to seek certifications from recognized professional institutes after the training and we would assist them in this regard.

The Brewing School or Institute will train students in both theoretical and practical brewing and actually brew and package their own beer in the Pilot Brewery during the course of their training. We believe the Brewing Academy should be housed in a running Microbrewery to enable the trainees to appreciate what they are learning. It will further provide opportunities for internship for interested trainees after the training period.

What We Need & What You Get

The Brewing School will be be housed in an existing 200m2 Apartment in a Serene Estate in the Ojodu area of Lagos, Nigeria. The Microbrewery will be housed in another 100m2 apartment in the same location all owned by the Promoter. An additional 150m2 area exist in the premises that will be further developed for the Brewing School and Microbrewery.

Our target is to raise $95,000 dollars to be utilised as follows;

  1. Payment of Crowdfunding fees
  2. Acquisition of a Microbrewery complete with the following;
  • A 50 litres Pilot brewery dedicated exclusively to Brewing Training with all its Ancillary machines.
  • 200 litres per batch brewhouse capable of processing a high percentage of local raw materials
  • 8000 litres of monthly fermentation capacity
  • Bright beer filter
  • 1600 litres of Bright beer tank
  • Keg washing and filling machine
  • Manual bottling Machine
  • Kegs, Kegerators and growlers
  • Steam boiler, Glycol Chilling Plant, Air Compressor, Control systems, Cleaning systems and other ancillary machines
  1.  Other Training Materials and aids, books etc.
  2. Modification of the existing apartments for the Training School and Brewery

It is highly possible that we might not raise anything at all or fall far short of our target. But whatever we are able to achieve here we intends to actualize our goal of setting up the Brewing School and Microbrewery before the end of 2018. It may mean we have to scale down substantially on the Microbrewery part initially. But we don't intend to scale back on the training.

 We have a lots of perks for our backers. This perks includes personalised thank you letters from us, Invitation to the Brewery promotional events and discount on the purchases of our products.

Other backers will be invited to the Brewery for free tours. Others will be invited for brew days where they can experience brewing for a day. Others can join us for two days of brewing experience whereas, for others we can offer them eight days brewing training free of charge. This eight days does not necessarily have to happen at a stretch. it can be spread over a nine month period. For some of our big backers, we will give gift vouchers for substantial quantities of beer . For others, they will remain part of us for a long time because we will name some of our key equipments like fermentation and bright beer tanks after them and we would also name some of our key departments like Brewhouse, Fermentation room, Packaging room and Brewing School after our biggest backers.

The Impact

The Nigerian economy is one that is in dire need of diversification and developing the Microbrewery sector is a way of doing so. It will help to achieve the following;

  • Create new businesses for entrepreneurs and business owners
  • Create jobs for our ever increasing youth population in Nigeria
  • Create part time jobs for retired corporate executives that we will tap to provide additional resources for our training programmes. 
  • Create additional sources of revenue for government in terms of excise duties, taxes, corporate and personal income taxes.
  • Provide new markets for our farmers (grains etc)

You contributions will be helping to solve part of the social problems in Nigeria.

Risks & Challenges

Like all human endeavours, there are risks and challenges associated with every new venture. some that we have identified are as follows;

  1. Getting the relevant regulatory approvals (Customs, NAFDAC, SON etc) to set up the Microbrewery and the approval of the National Board for Technical Education (if we found it necessary) as it relates to the Brewing School since this is a vocational training school.
  2. Creating awareness about the existence of the Brewing School
  3. Building trust in people that we can actually deliver on our promise
  4. Building a market for Craft Beer.

Since we are not planning to set up a theoretical training school, setting up the Microbrewery is central for us to be able to actualize this project. In terms of getting the relevant regulatory approval, we are aware that a Microbrewery has started operating in Abuja and that is a good precedent that will help to quicken the issuance of our own excise licence to us by the Nigeria Customs services. However, we cannot apply for the licence until we are sure of the extent of funding we can raise. Once we get the excise license from Customs, it becomes easy to get the import permit from the Standard Organisation of Nigeria (SON) to import the Microbrewery equipment. Once the equipment are installed, the National Agency for Foods and Drugs Administration and Control (NAFDAC) will be invited to inspect and certify the Microbrewery.  

Oladapo Loto is a seasoned Brewer with long years of experience in the Industry whose experience includes relating with Regulatory authorities. He knows what to do to overcome issues relating to Government regulations.

We intends to start a massive social media campaign to create awareness for the Brewing School and the Microbrewery. Since the Microbrewery will be functioning, we will hold promotional events across Lagos especially in high profile bars, event centres and top Hotels. During the promotional events, we will also promote the Brewing School. 

Our Trainees and visitors will help us to create goodwill for the project once they can experience the facilities we have in place and the quality of our instructions.

As stated previously, the success of the commercial side of the project (marketing of craft beer from the Microbrewery) will help to build awareness for craft beer and help to start building the market for craft beer.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to back us financially, you can help us by spreading the word to your friends and network. Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tool.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Our Promoter, Mr Oladapo Loto, graduated with First Class honours in Biochemistry from The Federal University of Technology, Akure in 1987. He joined Nigerian Breweries Plc (The Heineken Subsidiary in Nigeria) in August 1988 where he trained as a Brewer. Subsequently he worked for Consolidated Breweries Plc and Guinness Nigeria Plc. He held many roles in the Brewing Industry some of which includes Shift Brewer, Brewing Manager, Development Brewer and Head Brewer. He has developed training manuals for Brewing training in the past, involved in Research and Development as well as Operations management. In the past five years he has been consulting especially in the area of ethanol fermentation and is currently setting up a 33,000 litres per day ethanol distillery for a Client in Ikorodu, Lagos, Nigeria
The Brewing is a sector of the Nigerian economy can create hundreds and thousands of jobs more than what currently exists if only people understand how to go about it. To achieve this we need to get many people involved in Craft brewing if it must make any meaningful impact in Nigeria, hence the idea of the Brewing School.With over 20 million people and a sizeable expatriate population and no craft beer, a lot of potential exist for Craft Brewing right here in Lagos. We want to create a new industry segment.
This project intends to bring the Industry closer to the people in a way they can understand it and partake in it thereby deepening the economy and creating the much needed jobs for many of our youths and unemployed graduates. Anybody from any background can get involved in the craft brewing industry with the right training and exposure. This is what we hope to create right here in Lagos, Nigeria with this project.
If you help us to achieve this project, you will be helping to kick start a new area for economic development for Nigeria. The impact of this in the overall economy will be felt through the creation of many jobs. The Project itself will employ 15 to 20 people directly in the first 12 months and provide part time employment for resource persons that will be involved in our training ( Brewing, Quality, Marketing, Sales, Engineering, Catering Consultants etc). This will also ensure that a lot of our retired and working professionals will always have something to do. Our Trainees will be encouraged to seek certifications from recognized professional institutes after the training and we would assist them in this regard.
The Brewing School or Institute will train students in both theoretical and practical brewing and actually brew and package their own beer in the Pilot Brewery during the course of their training. We believe the Brewing Academy should be housed in a running Microbrewery to enable the trainees to appreciate what they are learning. It will further provide opportunities for internship for interested trainees after the training period.

What We Need & What You Get
The Brewing School will be be housed in an existing 200m2 Apartment in a Serene Estate in the Ojodu area of Lagos, Nigeria. The Microbrewery will be housed in another 100m2 apartment in the same location all owned by the Promoter. An additional 150m2 area exist in the premises that will be further developed for the Brewing School and Microbrewery.
Our target is to raise $95,000 dollars to be utilised as follows;

Payment of Crowdfunding fees
Acquisition of a Microbrewery complete with the following;


A 50 litres Pilot brewery dedicated exclusively to Brewing Training with all its Ancillary machines.
200 litres per batch brewhouse capable of processing a high percentage of local raw materials
8000 litres of monthly fermentation capacity
Bright beer filter
1600 litres of Bright beer tank
Keg washing and filling machine
Manual bottling Machine
Kegs, Kegerators and growlers
Steam boiler, Glycol Chilling Plant, Air Compressor, Control systems, Cleaning systems and other ancillary machines


 Other Training Materials and aids, books etc.
Modification of the existing apartments for the Training School and Brewery

It is highly possible that we might not raise anything at all or fall far short of our target. But whatever we are able to achieve here we intends to actualize our goal of setting up the Brewing School and Microbrewery before the end of 2018. It may mean we have to scale down substantially on the Microbrewery part initially. But we don't intend to scale back on the training.
 We have a lots of perks for our backers. This perks includes personalised thank you letters from us, Invitation to the Brewery promotional events and discount on the purchases of our products.
Other backers will be invited to the Brewery for free tours. Others will be invited for brew days where they can experience brewing for a day. Others can join us for two days of brewing experience whereas, for others we can offer them eight days brewing training free of charge. This eight days does not necessarily have to happen at a stretch. it can be spread over a nine month period. For some of our big backers, we will give gift vouchers for substantial quantities of beer . For others, they will remain part of us for a long time because we will name some of our key equipments like fermentation and bright beer tanks after them and we would also name some of our key departments like Brewhouse, Fermentation room, Packaging room and Brewing School after our biggest backers.

The Impact
The Nigerian economy is one that is in dire need of diversification and developing the Microbrewery sector is a way of doing so. It will help to achieve the following;

Create new businesses for entrepreneurs and business owners
Create jobs for our ever increasing youth population in Nigeria
Create part time jobs for retired corporate executives that we will tap to provide additional resources for our training programmes. 
Create additional sources of revenue for government in terms of excise duties, taxes, corporate and personal income taxes.
Provide new markets for our farmers (grains etc)

You contributions will be helping to solve part of the social problems in Nigeria.

Risks & Challenges
Like all human endeavours, there are risks and challenges associated with every new venture. some that we have identified are as follows;

Getting the relevant regulatory approvals (Customs, NAFDAC, SON etc) to set up the Microbrewery and the approval of the National Board for Technical Education (if we found it necessary) as it relates to the Brewing School since this is a vocational training school.
Creating awareness about the existence of the Brewing School
Building trust in people that we can actually deliver on our promise
Building a market for Craft Beer.

Since we are not planning to set up a theoretical training school, setting up the Microbrewery is central for us to be able to actualize this project. In terms of getting the relevant regulatory approval, we are aware that a Microbrewery has started operating in Abuja and that is a good precedent that will help to quicken the issuance of our own excise licence to us by the Nigeria Customs services. However, we cannot apply for the licence until we are sure of the extent of funding we can raise. Once we get the excise license from Customs, it becomes easy to get the import permit from the Standard Organisation of Nigeria (SON) to import the Microbrewery equipment. Once the equipment are installed, the National Agency for Foods and Drugs Administration and Control (NAFDAC) will be invited to inspect and certify the Microbrewery.  
Oladapo Loto is a seasoned Brewer with long years of experience in the Industry whose experience includes relating with Regulatory authorities. He knows what to do to overcome issues relating to Government regulations.
We intends to start a massive social media campaign to create awareness for the Brewing School and the Microbrewery. Since the Microbrewery will be functioning, we will hold promotional events across Lagos especially in high profile bars, event centres and top Hotels. During the promotional events, we will also promote the Brewing School. 
Our Trainees and visitors will help us to create goodwill for the project once they can experience the facilities we have in place and the quality of our instructions.
As stated previously, the success of the commercial side of the project (marketing of craft beer from the Microbrewery) will help to build awareness for craft beer and help to start building the market for craft beer.
Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to back us financially, you can help us by spreading the word to your friends and network. Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tool.

story:
Short Summary

I'm Mark Canty, a wine drinking - craft beer loving Aeronautical Engineer who is looking to share the passion for wine and beer across Chicago and hopefully America!  I have had a successful run of 25 years or so (I'm 44 so can't admit to much more than that) at finding the right craft beer or gem of a wine.  

SpendWitty is launching two new clubs in Chicago, a wine club and a brewery club.  As members, you will be able to redeem monthly benefits at various Brewery's and Restaurants throughout Chicago each month.  These clubs will also provide our members unique opportunities for weekly meet ups, raffles, daily specials and events. 

We have built the technology and are currently beta testing our APP at a few bars in the burbs.  

We are looking for 1000 people to be part of the launch of these two exclusive clubs.  By supporting the campaign and expressing interest, you will be helping us gain more initial vendors for our April 15th Tax Day launch.  The more support we get, the more vendors we will be able to include in our launch. 

Each contributor will be invited (plus 1) to our kickoff event in Downers Grove in May of this year.  

Interested in seeing the tech, you can download the SpendWitty APP now.    We will have all of our participating vendors loaded by April 15!​

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking just support in the belief that a club that provides members benefits across multiple locations at a fair price is of value to both vendors and members.  The contribution you make will be rewarded with the opportunity to join our clubs with a free month of membership as well as entry to our inaugural party in May.   Looking for something more, join our steering committee and help us assure our clubs are run with members best interest at heart. 

The Impact

We believe that these clubs will not only present members great value and experiences, but also support local small businesses and communities.  The more we can visit local Brewery's and restaurants, their chances for success improves.  Their success assures we have fun, new and exciting local places to visit. 

Risks & Challenges

While the club concept has been proven successful, there is always risk with launching a new business.   We have proven the technology and beta testing it now.   To best mitigate our risks, our ability to add members is critical to our success.   Vendors will not want to be part of a club where membership does not affect their bottom line.  We will work tirelessly to gain both members for our vendors and participating vendors for our members!

story:
What is it?

Impeach is a drinkable protest. A bubbly form of dissent. Palette satisfying propaganda created to undermine the agenda of Trump. This peach seltzer is no ordinary drink. Each bottle's profits are raised for vital organizations such as: Planned Parenthood, The ACLU, The Environmental Defense Fund, and Everytown for Gun Safety. 

 

What will your funds do? 

The best way to undermine Trump is to support organizations that are doing just that. The majority of your donation will go to your non-profit of choice. Only a small portion will cover production costs. 

 

FUNDS WILL:

*Fund non-profits listed in the perk options.

*Help buy raw materials like bottles and ingredients for flavoring. 

*Partner with a bottling company to bottle, package, and distribute Impeach to supporters. 

 

Who are we?

We are creatives who are tired of watching as Washington does nothing. Together, our group of friends and collaborators formed a collective driven to aid positive change with ridiculous ideas like this one. 

 

Thank you for your support,

Josh Yeston & Spencer Campbell

 

Special Thanks To:

Sean Funcik 

Sean Delahunt

Frank Guzzone

Frank Norton Jr.

story:
Good day. My name is Christine Bailey.
I have a dream - I want to grow strawberries in large volumes. So far, all I have is a small greenhouse, so to speak, an eco-farm, where I grow various vegetables, salads and indoor flowers.
I really want to develop all this in a large format and put on a stream the cultivation of fruits all year round. In particular, strawberries, which I love more than life.
Choosing a good greenhouse is a basic rule of strawberry growing, but it is not cheap. In an ordinary film greenhouse, berries can grow only in summer, but this method is not suitable in the spring-winter period. In it, several crops can be harvested in a year, and the berries will be protected from pests and diseases. Special equipment will allow you to maintain optimal temperature, humidity and degree of illumination.
The most expensive, but also the most reliable way is to purchase a high-strength polycarbonate greenhouse for strawberries.
I calculated the costs, and in general, to my deepest regret, the implementation of this venture is incredibly difficult for me without your help.
Thanks to everyone who will not remain indifferent!

story:
Meet Trestle, the new coffee capsule adapter for the Aeropress coffee brewer. 

A first of its kind device, Trestle fuses the usability of K-cup coffee capsules with the simple and portable Aeropress Coffee Brewer. Our goal is to facilitate convenience and reliability with a low packing footprint, perfect for coffee brewing on the go—wherever you are. 

We set out to create a product that could make hot beverages anywhere you are. 

Trestle bridges the gap between the Aeropress coffee maker and the popular K-cup capsule system, focused on ease of use and convenience for busy beverage lovers. With Trestle you’ve got one device capable of making a wide range of beverages, from various coffee roasts to hot cocoa, teas and ciders. If it fits in a K-cup, it works great with Trestle! 

 Trestle’s innovative use of the standard one way brew valve allows for the user to have full saturation of the K-cup before brewing begins - which creates a better tasting cup of coffee. 

Simply attach Trestle to the top of your Aeropress, insert a K-cup of your choice, then add hot water and brew. The process is easy, clean, repeatable, and effortlessly convenient—a true adaptation of the versatile and beloved Aeropress brewing device. 

 

Trestle by Caffewerks is Patent Pending #:62/882,405

AeroPress® Coffee Maker is a registered trademark of AeroPress, Inc. Trestle and Caffewerks, LLC is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by AeroPress, Inc. 

K-Cup® is a registered trademark of Keurig Green Mountain. Trestle and Caffewerks, LLC is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Keurig Green Mountain.

About Caffewerks

Caffewerks is an innovative coffee company focused on design, branding, and original inventions. Founded by the father-daughter team of Terry Ziniewicz and Sara Michelman, Caffewerks draws on decades of experience in the specialty coffee industry to help push today’s culture forward. From inventions and design collaborations to preventative maintenance solutions, cafe design, branding and operations consultation, Caffewerks makes coffee work.   

Original logo design work by Zach Perkins for Caffewerks.

Original Kickstarter video production by Rako Media.

Industrial design by Morgan Misek.

Product Development by Terry Ziniewicz.

Brand concept by Sara Michelman.

story:
Più avanti la versione in Italiano / At the end the Italian version

EBROST®

World 1st IOT drinking glass that revolutionizes the way to drink

 

 

ALSO SEEN IN

 

With the smart phone, via Bluetooth BLE, you can set the color and the how/when start and stop the light.

All the electronics is mould inside and it can be washed in dishwashers. Thanks to the high quality plastic material it retains its gloss even after hundreds of dishwasher cycles. It looks like glass, until you drop it, but with the advantage it will not break if fall down and you can take it everywhere also where the glass is not allowed.

The internal lithium battery is charged with the provided Qi wireless charger, charger you can also use to wireless charge other devices and smart phones.

The Android and iOS Ebrost® Apps will be the reference App for the places and peoples who wants to stay connected each other’s worldwide.

Ebrost® calls the attention, promotes the meetings and involves the participants.

On the Ebrost® Points you will drink on the Ebrost® glass of the place, or if you bring your own Ebrost®  glass you can drink at discounted price. For this porpouse every glass is delivered with its silicone cup, to keep it clean during your travel.

Places, clubs, teams and organizations can  personalize the Ebrost® glass with them logo or image on the internal bottom of the glass.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Configurations

Choose your favourite colour

You can choose among the following:

  • mono-colour,
  • intermittent,
  • dynamic between any two colours.

Choose how to start and stop the light

Start or stop your Ebrost® glass with:

  • app command,
  • movement,
  • spatial position,
  • rotation,
  • double touch,
  • timer,
  • temperature.

Tech specs

  

 

Social specs

 

Ebrost Community

A community of affiliates and friends is growing around Ebrost®.

You can be a part of it through the free app which you can download from Google Play or the App Store.
It’s not necessary to purchase an Ebrost® glass to be member of the community.

With the use of the name “Ebrost® Friend” a member of the community is identified.

With the use of the name “Ebrost® point”, an affiliate place (bar/pub/club/disco) is identified where it’s possible to use the Ebrost® technological glasses. Bring your own Ebrost® and get a drink at a discounted price or get a drink in the place’s Ebrost® glass.


With the name of “Ebrost® service” the organizers of events that use the Ebrost® glasses and the Ebrost® glasses rentals are identified.

Benefit to be an Ebrost® Friend

 

Benefit to be an Ebrost® Point

 

Benefit to be an Ebrost Service

 

Project timeline

 

The campaign and the perks

Ebrost® Friends Perks

All people who support the campaign are Ebrost® Friend and your name, if you want, will appear on the thanks page of the website and App.

Stickers have not delivery costs and are VAT and fees free worldwide.

Ebrost® glasses  have not delivery costs in the European Community.

For EU countries VAT is applied as shipping cost during the contribution flow.

For Extra-EU countries VAT and import fees are excluded for glasses and must be paid at delivery time.

 

Ebrost® Points and Ebrost® Services perks

Your name and your place/team/organization, if you want, will appear on the thanks page of the website and App.

From 25 Ebrost® glasses up,  you can choose to have part of them in the classic Ebrost® glasses version for retail.

For the 150x perk, starting from the 5th year, in order to keep alive the subscription, you need to order at least 2 adv per year (30$), in this way we know you are operating and also you are an Ebrost® Point  or Ebrost® Service yet.

Every perk comes with at least 1 “Ebrost® Point” sticker to attach to the door of your place, and several “Ebrost® Friends” stickers for your clients.

Stickers have not delivery costs and are VAT and fees free worldwide.

Ebrost® glasses have not delivery costs in the European Community and worldwide from 18+ glasses.

For EU countries VAT is applied as shipping cost during the contribution flow.

For Extra-EU countries VAT and import fees are excluded for glasses and must be paid at delivery time

EU Shipping cost and VAT

Free shipping to European Union for glasses and stickers.

VAT (22%) added as shipping costs for the glasses, for EU only.

Please see reward details for the VAT cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship the first batch in May 2017.

 

Extra-EU Shipping cost and VAT

We are able to ship worldwide.

Free shipping worlwide for 18 glasses or more and for stickers. VAT and GST not included.

The shipping cost is calculated after indicating your shipping country on the selected perk.

We plan to ship the first batch in May 2017.

 

The company and the team

                           

iFrasca is a start-up founded in 2016 in Reggio Emilia and is the owner of the trademark Ebrost®. All products that iFrasca develops, have the main feature to be made entirely in Italy, with the best quality of the material available on the market and with supplier chosen with ethical principles.

The team of the campaign consist of Mirco Frascaroli,  Mirta Frascaroli, Alice Vandi and Camilla Marziani.

  

 

 

 

FAQ

Q: Is my smart phone compatible with the luminous glass Ebrost®?

A: Ebrost® uses the Bluetooth BLE communication (ver. 4.0, 4.1, 4.2), available from 2012 on Android phones and from the version 4S of Apple phones.

 

Q: How do I connect my Ebrost® to my mobile?

A: The connection is made through the app by focusing on the transparent QR code which is visible in on the bottom of the drinking glass.

 

Q: What is the maximum distance for programming it?

A: Up to tens meters away.

 

Q: Can I use the wireless battery charger for charging others devices?

A: Yes. It’s Qi standard compliant, so you can use it for charging other IOT devices and smart phones.

 

Q: Why plastic and not glass?

A: Because it is high quality plastics (Tritan), shatter resistance, so if it falls down it will not be damaged. Furthermore you can bring it also where the glass is not allowed. It looks like glass, until you drop it.

 

Q: Are there any precautions to hold for the washing?

A: No. The electronics are waterproof, so the glass can be wash in dishwasher. Thanks to the high quality material, it  retains its gloss even after hundreds of dishwasher cycles.

 

Q: Why should I buy Ebrost® while I can find it on the “Ebrost® point”?

A: Ebrost® is not only a glass, it’s also a trendy object which you can use at home with your friends. By using your own glass when you go to the “Ebrost® point”, you get a discounted price for the drink. This means that you recover some of the initial cost of the glass, while you have the full use of it.

 

Q: What about the hygienic preservation during the going travel and the bag cleaned during the back?

A: Every Ebrost® is provided with a silicon cup to hermetical isolate the internal of the glass and the lips contact zone  during the travel.

 

Q: Being that the app is free and everyone can download it, even if they don’t have an Ebrost® glass, will there be advertising?

A: There will be no banners or external advertising announcements. Only the events promoted by the “Ebrost® point” and the “Ebrost® service” will be presented. You can disable them at any time, filter after which zone you want or select individually. You can also set if you want to see them as notifications or only when you go to the related section in the app.

 

Q: I’m the owner of a pub that wants to become an “Ebrost® point” and administer drinks from both my own glasses and from private glasses. Can I distinguish between the different types?

A: If you purchase at least 12 Ebrost® glasses, you have the possibility to personalize them with the logo of your pub. They will then be printed as a visible but transparent image on the inside bottom of the glasses.

 

Q: I’m the owner of a pub that wants to become an “Ebrost® point”. Can I avoid to discount the drinks of the “Ebrost Friends” that come with yours own glasses?

A: In the app you can notify if your place have its own glasses, if you give drinks to external Ebrost Glasses or both. But if you give drinks to external Ebrost Glasses you MUST offer a discount or a larger quantity of drink at the same price.

 

Q: Why is it so expensive compared to other glass solutions?

A: For many reasons: 1) Because this is the first glass wireless charged and configurable via smart phone. 2) Because the wireless battery charger is included. 3) Because all the materials are the best on the market, for safety and characteristics, and it is made to work for many years and resist to hundreds dishwashers cycles. 4) Because it is completely made in Italy by companies selected for them ethic characteristics and not for the lowest cost.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for your support.

Please share the campaign and ask to your favourite pub owner to become an Ebrost® Point, as Ebrost® is not just the glass but it is a community of friends and places.

 

VIDEO IN OTHER LANGUAGES

EBROST® DA

 

EBROST® DE 

 
EBROST® ES

 

EBROST® FI

 

EBROST® FR

 

EBROST® JA

 

EBROST® NE

 

EBROST® NO

 

EBROST® PT

 

EBROST® RU

 

EBROST® SV

 

 

VERSIONE ITALIANA / ITALIAN VERSION

 

Ebrost ®è il bicchiere tecnologico che rivoluzionerà il modo di bere e di vivere i locali.

Grazie al colore e alla modalità di funzionamento che gli imposti via cellulare, sarai sempre sicuro di riconoscere il tuo bicchiere ed evitare di bere da quello di un’altra persona. Rimani connesso con I tuoi amici (Ebrost® Friend) e I tuoi locali preferiti (Ebrost® Point) in tutto il mondo attraverso l’App. Ebrost® richiama l’attenzione e favorisce gli incontri. E’ interamente realizzato in Italia. Fai parte della comunità.
 

EBROST®

Il primo bicchiere IoT al mondo che rivoluzionerà il modo di bere.

 

Il primo bicchiere IoT al mondo che rivoluzionerà il modo di bere.

Con il cellulare, via Bluetooth BLE, puoi impostare il colore e come e quando accendersi  e spegnersi.

Tutta la parte elettronica è impermeabile e il bicchiere può essere lavato anche in lavastoviglie. Grazie all’ottima qualità della plastica utilizzata, la lucentezza è garantita anche dopo diverse centinaia di lavaggi in lavastoviglie. E’ del tutto simile al vetro, fino a quando non viene preso in mano,  con il vantaggio che se cade non si rompe e che può essere portato ovunque, anche dove il vetro è vietato.

La batteria al litio interna è ricaricabile mediante il caricatore senza fili Qi fornito a corredo, che può anche essere utilizzato per la ricarica di altri dispositivi e cellulari predisposti.

L’App per Android e iOS diventerà l’App di riferimento per i locali e le persone che vogliono rimanere connesse a livello mondiale.

Ebrost® richiama l’attenzione, favorisce gli incontri e la socializzazione.

Negli “Ebrost® Point” potrai bere nei bicchieri Ebrost® messi a disposizione dal locale, oppure potrai recarti con il tuo e bere ad un prezzo scontato. A questo scopo ogni bicchiere è fornito anche di un coperchio in silicone che preserva l’igiene durante il trasporto.

Pub, bar club, gruppi sportivi e organizzazioni possono personalizzare i bicchieri Ebrost® con il proprio logo o immagine di riferimento visibile sul fondo interno del bicchiere.

NE HANNO PARLATO:

CONFIGURAZIONE

Selezione del colore

Puoi scegliere tra:

  • monocolore a luce fissa
  • monocolore a luce intermittente
  • dinamica tra 2 colori qualsiasi

 

Selezione della modalità di accensione e spegnimento

Accendi e o spegni il tuo bicchiere Ebrost tramite:

  • Comando da App
  • Movimento
  • Orientamento spaziale
  • Rotazione
  • Doppio tocco
  • Tempo trascorso
  • Temperatura

 

Specifiche Tecniche

  • Comunicazione:                  Bluetooth BLE 4.0/4.1/4.2
  • LED:                                       8 RGB con 16M colori
  • Batteria:                                Litio ricaricabile LiPo 500mAh
  • Ricarica batteria:                Wireless con caricatore Qi fornito
  • Sensori integrati:                Temperatura, Accelerometro a 3 assi per la rilevazione di movimenti e cambiamenti di posizione
  • Tempo di funzionamento: Da 3 a 8 ore con LED accesi, in funzione della luminosità impostata.
  • Materiale:                              Plastica ad alta resistenza, senza bisfenoli
  • Capacità:                              450 ml
  • Grado di protezione:          IP68
  • Temperatura operativa:    -20°C +65°C
  • App O.S.:                              Android /iOS
  • Bicchieri connettibili contemporaneamente:  255 max

 

Specifiche Sociali

  • Favorisce gli incontri
  • Rispecchia te stesso
  • Non ti fa passare inosservato
  • Richiama l’attenzione
  • Coinvolge il locale intero

 

La comunità Ebrost®

Una comunità di affiliati e amici nasce attorno a Ebrost®.

Puoi far parte di questa tramite l’App gratuita che potrai scaricare da Google Play e App Store. Non è necessario acquistare un bicchiere Ebrost® per far parte della comunità.

Con il termine di “Ebrost® Friend” si identifica un membro della comunità.

Con il termine di “Ebrost® Point”, si identifica un locale affiliato (bar/pub/club/disco) dove sarà possibile usare o trovare i bicchieri Ebrost®, recandoti con il tuo bicchiere Ebrost® bevendo a prezzo scontato oppure bere nel bicchiere Ebrost® messo a disposizione del locale.

Con il nome di “Ebrost® Service” si identificano gli organizzatori di eventi, catering che utilizzano i bicchieri Ebrost® e i noleggiatori dei bicchieri  Ebrost® .

 

Vantaggi  ad essere Ebrost® Friend

 

Vantaggi  ad essere Ebrost® Point

 

Vantaggi ad essere Ebrost®  Service

 

LA CAMPAGNA E I PERK

 

Perk per gli Ebrost® Friend

Chiunque supporta la campagna è un Ebrost® Friend, se lo vuoi il tuo nome rimarrà per sempre nella pagina dei ringraziamenti sul sito web e nella sezione dedicata dell’App.

Gli adesivi non hanno costi di spedizione e nemmeno tasse e IVA (VAT) in tutto il mondo.

I bicchieri Ebrost® non hanno costi di spedizione nella Comunità Europea (EU)

Per i paesi dell’EU l’IVA è applicata come costo di spedizione durante la fase di pagamento.

Per i paesi Extra-UE l’IVA e le tasse d’importazione non sono applicate, vengono applicate dal corriere al momento della consegna.

 

Perk per gli Ebrost® Point e gli Ebrost® Service

Il nome del tuo locale/squadra/attività/organizzazione , se lo vuoi, rimarrà per sempre nella pagina dei ringraziamenti sul sito web e nella sezione dedicata dell’App.

Da 25 bicchieri in su, puoi scegliere se avere parte di questi nella versione classica per la rivendita.

Per l’acquisto di 150 bicchieri la presenza nella lista dei locali in App è a vita, in ogni caso a partire dal 5° anno, per mantenerla attiva è richiesto almeno l’acquisto di 2 pubblicazioni di eventi (costo di 30€), in questo modo sapremo che sei effettivamente operativo e sei ancora un Ebrost® Point o Ebrost® Service.

Ogni perk contiene almeno 1 adesivo “Ebrost® Point” da attaccare alla porta della tua attività e diversi adesivi “Ebrost® Friend” per i tuoi clienti.

Gli adesivi  non hanno costi di spedizione e nemmeno tasse e IVA (VAT) in tutto il mondo.

I bicchieri Ebrost® non hanno costi di spedizione nella Comunità Europea (EU) e a livello mondiale per almeno 18 bicchieri.

Per i paesi dell’EU l’IVA è applicata come costo di spedizione durante la fase di pagamento.

Per i paesi Extra-UE l’IVA e le tasse d’importazione non sono applicate, vengono applicate dal corriere al momento della consegna.

 

Costi di spedizione e IVA nei paesi UE

Spedizione gratuita all’interno della UE per bicchieri e adesivi.

IVA/VAT (22%)  aggiunta come costo di spedizione per i bicchieri spediti in UE.

Verificare nella tabella dettagliata dei perk l’ammontare dell’IVA che viene applicata.

La spedizione del primo lotto di bicchieri è prevista in Maggio 2017.

 

Costi di spedizione e IVA nei paesi Extra-UE

Siamo in grado di spedire in tutto il mondo.

Spedizione gratuita in tutto il mondo a partire da 18 bicchieri e per gli adesivi. VAT e tasse d’importazione non sono incluse.

Il costo di spedizione è calcolato durante il processo di acquisto nel momento in cui viene inserito il paese.

La spedizione del primo lotto di bicchieri è prevista in Maggio 2017.

 

L’azienda e il team

         

iFrasca è una startup innovativa fondata nel 2016 a Reggio Emilia ed è proprietaria del marchio Ebrost®. Tutti i prodotti che iFrasca produce, hanno la caratteristica di essere realizzati completamente in Italia, con i migliori materiali disponibili sul mercato e da fornitori selezionati su principi etici.

Il team per la campagna di crowdfunding è composto da  Mirco Frascaroli,  Mirta Frascaroli, Alice Vandi e Camilla Marziani.

 

FAQ

D: Il mio cellulare è compatibile con il bicchiere luminoso Ebrost®?

R: Il bicchiere a led Ebrost® sfrutta la comunicazione via Bluetooth BLE ( versione 4.0, 4.1, 4.2) disponibile dal 2012 sui nuovi modelli Android e a partire dall’Apple 4S.

 

D: Come associo il mio Ebrost® al telefono?

R: L’associazione avviene tramite l’app, sfruttando  la telecamera e inquadrando il QR (codice a barre bidimensionale) visibile in trasparenza sul fondo del bicchiere.

 

D: A quale distanza posso programmarlo?

R: Si può arrivare a qualche decina di metri.

 

D: Posso usare il caricatore wireless fornito per caricare altri dispositivi?

R: Si. Essendo standard Qi, si può utilizzare per caricare anche altri dispositivi e cellulari previsti.

 

D: Perché plastica e non vetro?

R: Perché la plastica utilizzata è la migliore sul mercato (Tritan) resistente agli urti e graffi, se cade non si rompe. Inoltre lo puoi portare ovunque, anche dove il vetro è vietato. E’ del tutto identico al vetro, fino a quando non lo si prende in mano.

 

D: Ci sono delle precauzioni da tenere per il lavaggio?

R:Tutta la parte elettronica è impermeabile, perciò può essere lavato anche in immersione e in lavastoviglie. Grazie all’alta qualità della plastica utilizzata, la lucentezza rimane anche dopo centinaia di lavaggi in lavastoviglie.

 

D: Perché comprare Ebrost® quando posso già trovarlo negli “Ebrost® point”?

R: Perché Ebrost® non è solo un bicchiere ma è anche un oggetto di tendenza, che puoi usare anche a casa con amici. Inoltre  presentandoti con il tuo bicchiere presso gli “Ebrost® Point” avrai uno sconto sulle consumazioni,  che nel medio termine significa recuperare il costo iniziale, avendone sempre la piena disponibilità.

 

D: Come si garantisce la protezione igienica durante il tragitto casa – locale?

R: Ogni bicchiere Ebrost® è fornito con un coperchio in silicone che ne protegge l’interno e la zona dove le labbra vanno a contatto. 

 

D: Essendo l’app gratuita e scaricabile da tutti indipendentemente dal possesso del bicchiere Ebrost®, mi troverò della pubblicità?

R: Non ci saranno banner o annunci pubblicitari esterni. Sono presenti gli eventi da parte degli “Ebrost® Point”e degli “Ebrost® Service”, che puoi sempre abilitare, disabilitare, filtrare per zona o selezionare individualmente. Inoltre puoi impostare se visualizzarli come notifica oppure solo accedendo alla sezione dedicata su app.

 

D: Sono un locale che vuole diventare “Ebrost® point” somministrando drink da bicchieri miei e da bicchieri privati, come posso distinguere le diverse tipologie?

R: Acquistando almeno 12 bicchieri Ebrost® hai la possibilità di personalizzare con il logo del tuo locale l’immagine visibile in trasparenza  sul fondo interno del bicchiere.

 

D: Sono il titolare di un locale che vuole diventare “Ebrost® Point”. Posso evitere di applicare uno sconto agli “Ebrost® Friends” che si presentano con il proprio bicchiere Ebrost®?

R: Nell’app puoi definire se il locale ha i propri bicchieri, se somministri nei bicchieri Ebrost® esterni, o entrambi. Ma, se somministri nei bicchieri degli “Ebrost Friend” portati dall’esterno, DEVI offrire uno sconto o una quantità maggiore di drink allo stesso costo.

 

D: Perché è così costoso rispetto ad altri bicchieri?

R: Per diverse ragioni: 1) Perché è il primo bicchiere con ricarica wireless e configurabile via cellulare. 2) Perché il caricabatteria è incluso 3) Perché i materiali impiegati sono i migliori presenti sul mercato, per sicurezza e qualità, ed è concepito per lavorare molti anni e resistere a molti lavaggi in lavastoviglie 4) Perché è completamente prodotto in Italia da aziende selezionate su principi etici e non per il costo minore.

 

Altri modi per aiutarci

Grazie per il supporto.

Condividi la campagna con i tuoi amici e chiedi al tuo locale preferito di diventare un Ebrost® Point, poiché Ebrost® non è solo il bicchiere ma è una community di amici e locali.

Thanks to the high quality plastic material it retains its gloss even after hundreds of dishwasher cycles. It looks like glass, until you drop it, but with the advantage it will not break if fall down and you can take it everywhere also where the glass is not allowed.The internal lithium battery is charged with the provided Qi wireless charger, charger you can also use to wireless charge other devices and smart phones.The Android and iOS Ebrost® Apps will be the reference App for the places and peoples who wants to stay connected each other’s worldwide.Ebrost® calls the attention, promotes the meetings and involves the participants.On the Ebrost® Points you will drink on the Ebrost® glass of the place, or if you bring your own Ebrost®  glass you can drink at discounted price. For this porpouse every glass is delivered with its silicone cup, to keep it clean during your travel.Places, clubs, teams and organizations can  personalize the Ebrost® glass with them logo or image on the internal bottom of the glass.          ConfigurationsChoose your favourite colourYou can choose among the following:
mono-colour,
intermittent,
dynamic between any two colours.
Choose how to start and stop the lightStart or stop your Ebrost® glass with:
app command,
movement,
spatial position,
rotation,
double touch,
timer,
temperature.

website and App.From 25 Ebrost® glasses up,  you can choose to have part of them in the classic Ebrost® glasses version for retail.For the 150x perk, starting from the 5th year, in order to keep alive VAT and GST not included.The shipping cost is calculated after indicating your shipping country on the selected perk.We plan to ship the first batch in May 2017. The company and the team                            iFrasca is a start-up founded in 2016 in Reggio Emilia and is the owner of the trademark Ebrost®. All products that iFrasca develops, have the main feature to be made entirely in Italy, with the best quality of the material available on the market and with supplier chosen with ethical principles.The team of the campaign consist of Mirco Frascaroli,  Mirta Frascaroli, Alice Vandi and Camilla Marziani.        FAQQ: Is my smart phone compatible with the luminous glass Ebrost®?A: Ebrost® uses the Bluetooth BLE communication (ver. 4.0, 4.1, 4.2), available from 2012 on Android phones and from the version 4S of Apple phones. Q: How do I connect my Ebrost® to my mobile?A: The connection is made through the app by focusing on the transparent QR code which is visible in on the bottom of the drinking glass. Q: What is the maximum distance for programming it?A: Up to tens meters away. Q: Can I use the wireless battery charger for charging others devices?A: Yes. It’s Qi standard compliant, so you can use it for charging other IOT devices and smart phones. Q: Why plastic and not glass?A: Because it is high quality plastics (Tritan), shatter resistance, so if it falls down it will not be damaged. Furthermore you can bring it also where the glass is not allowed. It looks like glass, until you drop it. Q: Are there any precautions to hold for the washing?A: No. The electronics are waterproof, so the glass can be wash in dishwasher. Thanks to the high quality material, it  retains its gloss even after hundreds of dishwasher cycles. Q: Why should I buy Ebrost® while I can find it on the “Ebrost® point”?A: Ebrost® is not only a glass, it’s also a trendy object which you can use at home with your friends. By using your own glass when you go to the “Ebrost® point”, you get a discounted price for the drink. This means that you recover some of the initial cost of the glass, while you have the full use of it. Q: What about the hygienic preservation during the going travel and the bag cleaned during the back?A: Every Ebrost® is provided with a silicon cup to hermetical isolate the internal of the glass and the lips contact zone  during the travel. Q: Being that the app is free and everyone can download it, even if they don’t have an Ebrost® glass, will there be advertising?A: There will be no banners or external advertising announcements. Only the events promoted by the “Ebrost® point” and the “Ebrost® service” will be presented. You can disable them at any time, filter after which zone you want or select individually. You can also set if you want to see them as notifications or only when you go to the related section in the app. Q: I’m the owner of a pub that wants to become an “Ebrost® point” and administer drinks from both my own glasses and from private glasses. Can I distinguish between the different types?A: If you purchase at least 12 Ebrost® glasses, you have the possibility to personalize them with the logo of your pub. They will then be printed as a visible but transparent image on the inside bottom of the glasses. Q: I’m the owner of a pub that wants to become an “Ebrost® point”. Can I avoid to discount the drinks of the “Ebrost Friends” that come with yours own glasses?A: In the app you can notify if your place have its own glasses, if you give drinks to external Ebrost Glasses or both. But if you give drinks to external Ebrost Glasses you MUST offer a discount or a larger quantity of drink at the same price. Q: Why is it so expensive compared to other glass solutions?A: For many reasons: 1) Because this is the first glass wireless charged and configurable via smart phone. 2) Because the wireless battery charger is included. 3) Because all the materials are the best on the market, for safety and characteristics, and it is made to work for many years and resist to hundreds dishwashers cycles. 4) Because it is completely made in Italy by companies selected for them ethic characteristics and not for the lowest cost. Other Ways You Can HelpThank you for your support.Please share the campaign and ask to your favourite pub owner to become an Ebrost® Point, as Ebrost® is not just the glass but it is a community of friends and places. VIDEO IN OTHER LANGUAGESEBROST® DA EBROST® DE  EBROST® ES

nella sezione dedicata dell’App.Da 25 bicchieri in su, puoi scegliere se avere parte di questi nella versione classica per la rivendita.Per l’acquisto di 150 bicchieri la presenza nella lista dei locali in App è a vita, in ogni caso a partire dal 5° anno, per mantenerla attiva è richiesto almeno l’acquisto di 2 pubblicazioni di eventi (costo di 30€), in questo modo sapremo che sei effettivamente operativo e sei ancora un Ebrost® Point o Ebrost® Service.Ogni perk contiene almeno 1 adesivo “Ebrost® Point” da attaccare alla porta della tua attività e diversi adesivi “Ebrost® Friend” per i tuoi clienti.Gli adesivi  non hanno costi di spedizione e nemmeno tasse e IVA (VAT) in tutto il mondo.I bicchieri Ebrost® non hanno costi di spedizione nella Comunità Europea (EU) e a livello mondiale per almeno 18 bicchieri.Per i paesi dell’EU l’IVA è applicata come costo di spedizione durante la fase di pagamento.Per i paesi Extra-UE l’IVA e le tasse d’importazione non sono applicate, vengono applicate dal corriere al momento della consegna. Costi di spedizione e IVA nei paesi UESpedizione gratuita all’interno della UE per bicchieri e adesivi.IVA/VAT (22%)  aggiunta come costo di spedizione per i bicchieri spediti in UE.Verificare nella tabella dettagliata dei perk l’ammontare dell’IVA che viene applicata.La spedizione del primo lotto di bicchieri è prevista in Maggio 2017. Costi di spedizione e IVA nei paesi Extra-UESiamo in grado di spedire in tutto il mondo.Spedizione gratuita in tutto il mondo a partire da 18 bicchieri e per gli adesivi. VAT e tasse d’importazione non sono incluse.Il costo di spedizione è calcolato durante il processo di acquisto nel momento in cui viene inserito il paese.La spedizione del primo lotto di bicchieri è prevista in Maggio 2017. L’azienda e il team         iFrasca è una startup innovativa fondata nel 2016 a Reggio Emilia ed è proprietaria del marchio Ebrost®. Tutti i prodotti che iFrasca produce, hanno la caratteristica di essere realizzati completamente in Italia, con i migliori materiali disponibili sul mercato e da fornitori selezionati su principi etici.Il team per la campagna di crowdfunding è composto da  Mirco Frascaroli,  Mirta Frascaroli, Alice Vandi e Camilla Marziani. FAQD: Il mio cellulare è compatibile con il bicchiere luminoso Ebrost®?R: Il bicchiere a led Ebrost® sfrutta la comunicazione via Bluetooth BLE ( versione 4.0, 4.1, 4.2) disponibile dal 2012 sui nuovi modelli Android e a partire dall’Apple 4S. D: Come associo il mio Ebrost® al telefono?R: L’associazione avviene tramite l’app, sfruttando  la telecamera e inquadrando il QR (codice a barre bidimensionale) visibile in trasparenza sul fondo del bicchiere. D: A quale distanza posso programmarlo?R: Si può arrivare a qualche decina di metri. D: Posso usare il caricatore wireless fornito per caricare altri dispositivi?R: Si. Essendo standard Qi, si può utilizzare per caricare anche altri dispositivi e cellulari previsti. D: Perché plastica e non vetro?R: Perché la plastica utilizzata è la migliore sul mercato (Tritan) resistente agli urti e graffi, se cade non si rompe. Inoltre lo puoi portare ovunque, anche dove il vetro è vietato. E’ del tutto identico al vetro, fino a quando non lo si prende in mano. D: Ci sono delle precauzioni da tenere per il lavaggio?R:Tutta la parte elettronica è impermeabile, perciò può essere lavato anche in immersione e in lavastoviglie. Grazie all’alta qualità della plastica utilizzata, la lucentezza rimane anche dopo centinaia di lavaggi in lavastoviglie. D: Perché comprare Ebrost® quando posso già trovarlo negli “Ebrost® point”?R: Perché Ebrost® non è solo un bicchiere ma è anche un oggetto di tendenza, che puoi usare anche a casa con amici. Inoltre  presentandoti con il tuo bicchiere presso gli “Ebrost® Point” avrai uno sconto sulle consumazioni,  che nel medio termine significa recuperare il costo iniziale, avendone sempre la piena disponibilità. D: Come si garantisce la protezione igienica durante il tragitto casa – locale?R: Ogni bicchiere Ebrost® è fornito con un coperchio in silicone che ne protegge l’interno e la zona dove le labbra vanno a contatto.  D: Essendo l’app gratuita e scaricabile da tutti indipendentemente dal possesso del bicchiere Ebrost®, mi troverò della pubblicità?R: Non ci saranno banner o annunci pubblicitari esterni. Sono presenti gli eventi da parte degli “Ebrost® Point”e degli “Ebrost® Service”, che puoi sempre abilitare, disabilitare, filtrare per zona o selezionare individualmente. Inoltre puoi impostare se visualizzarli come notifica oppure solo accedendo alla sezione dedicata su app. D: Sono un locale che vuole diventare “Ebrost® point” somministrando drink da bicchieri miei e da bicchieri privati, come posso distinguere le diverse tipologie?R: Acquistando almeno 12 bicchieri Ebrost® hai la possibilità di personalizzare con il logo del tuo locale l’immagine visibile in trasparenza  sul fondo interno del bicchiere. D: Sono il titolare di un locale che vuole diventare “Ebrost® Point”. Posso evitere di applicare uno sconto agli “Ebrost® Friends” che si presentano con il proprio bicchiere Ebrost®?R: Nell’app puoi definire se il locale ha i propri bicchieri, se somministri nei bicchieri Ebrost® esterni, o entrambi. Ma, se somministri nei bicchieri degli “Ebrost Friend” portati dall’esterno, DEVI offrire uno sconto o una quantità maggiore di drink allo stesso costo. D: Perché è così costoso rispetto ad altri bicchieri?R: Per diverse ragioni: 1) Perché è il primo bicchiere con ricarica wireless e configurabile via cellulare. 2) Perché il caricabatteria è incluso 3) Perché i materiali impiegati sono i migliori presenti sul mercato, per sicurezza e qualità, ed è concepito per lavorare molti anni e resistere a molti lavaggi in lavastoviglie 4) Perché è completamente prodotto in Italia da aziende selezionate su principi etici e non per il costo minore. Altri modi per aiutarciGrazie per il supporto.Condividi la campagna con i tuoi amici e chiedi al tuo locale preferito di diventare un Ebrost® Point, poiché Ebrost® non è solo il bicchiere ma è una community di amici e locali.

story:
We began with a quest to craft a better cocktail and discovered that fresh spirit infusions were the key to creating remarkable cocktails. So we set out to design a bar tool that would simplify the process of spirit infusions. 

By marrying the timeless design of the classic distilling equipment with the beautiful simplicity of Italian espresso makers, Barmixta makes the art of infusion easy.

SIMPLE USER EXPERIENCE

STEP 1. Place ingredients and pods such as  fruits, spices, roots or botanicals into Barmixta’s stainless steel infusion basket, and then add a base alcohol like whiskey, gin, vodka or tequila into the base container.

STEP 2. Lock in place the infusion basket, press the on button, and The Barmixta will begin heating up the alcohol to unleash the natural flavors from your chosen infusion.

STEP 3. Watch the infused spirit pour out into the chilled collection container.  Once infusion is complete serve the infused spirit directly from the Barmixta collection container, or mix with other elements to create fresh, premium cocktails.

 

Prototype Development 

Stage 1 - Proof of Concept 

 

Stage 2 - Minimum Viable product (MVP)

 

Stage 3 - CAD Sketch of Future design 
 

FRESH INGREDIENTS. NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS. Virtually all flavored whiskeys and vodkas are made with added sugar and fake flavors concocted in a lab—not grown in a garden. Barmixta lets you craft superior-tasting spirits with fresh ingredients that are free of artificial ingredients, unwanted dyes, chemicals or added sugar.

Just add one of our pre-mixed pods or create your own custom mix of dried fruits, spices, herbs or botanicals and sit back and relax and allow The Barmixta to unleash the natural flavors from your chosen infusion.

Modern mixology made simple.

Barmixta is designed to simplify the spirits infusion process for professional and amateur drink-makers everywhere. The result is a perfectly balanced craft spirit that is ready to sip or mix into your cocktail creations.

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES. With Barmixta, anyone can become a DIY mixologist – creating infused spirits and cocktails with ingredients like fruits, spices, roots and exotic botanicals.

Be inspired by a farmer's market, the spice aisle at your local store, or even you own garden, and create unique combinations like Bacon-Sage Infused Whiskey, Lavender & Cucumber Gin, Cacao & Clove Bitters. The possibilities are as endless as your imagination!

BE A SHOW OFF. Barmixta will be the center of attention at your next cocktail party…or the star behind your cocktail bar.

FORM + FUNCTION. We eliminated all the clunky aspects of infusing spirits, resulting in an elegant form that functions perfectly.

INFUSE + SERVE. Go from infusion to serving in one simple step! 

Recipe Book - Now Included!

We've received several requests for a recipe book to help you recreate the infusions and cocktails we've shared on Instagram. So, as a special THANK YOU for getting us this far, I am happy to announce that every Barmixta will automatically include a FREE infusion recipe book.

Craft and serve custom infused spirits at home or in a bar. 

If our Kickstarter Campaign is funded, the Barmixta will go to production. Upon delivery, the art of transforming the ordinary into the extraordinary will be in your hands.

We invite you to get inspired to create, excited to indulge, and be a part of bringing this product and amazing craft cocktails to your bar or home.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love our project but aren't able to purchase a perk that doesn't mean we wouldn't love your help:

Just give us a shout out on your social media outlets to get the word out and make some noise about our Barmixta campaign.

Just use the Kickstarter share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Fine sparkling wine rarely meets most consumers in the UK. 

Supermarket supplies are low quality, mass produced wines whereas the online wine specialists are largely geared towards red and white wines. Bubble Box has been created by two people who love sparkling wine no matter what the occasion and travel the world to find the best bottles. They now want to bring that passion to everyone else in the UK who want to enjoy fine sparkling wine deliveries every month. 

Every month we will deliver a box of fine sparkling wine customised to your tastes alongside added extras including cocktail recipes, ingredients and treats. We want to make enjoying fine sparkling wine simple and fun so you can enjoy fine sparkling wine at home any time. 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to get started, we need to import bottles at a significant volume hence why we need to get early adopters on board to assist with cash flow. We have estimated that orders over £1,000 allow us to get the best prices so this £5,000 we hope to raise will give us the option to secure good volume deals at 5 different independent vineyards. 

If we were to start low with low volumes of subscribers then the price we would pay for bottles would be uneconomic. We would like to find people who would love to subscribe in order to bulk buy sparkling wine and ensure that we can offer our monthly boxes at sensible prices right from the start. 

We never intend to offer discounts other than first box deals as this is a premium product, therefore the extended discounts included here will be a one time offer which we hope you will enjoy. 

Risks & Challenges

We will be following through with this project regardless of funding, so even if we do not hit the target then we will honour all of the orders. If there are any issues, then we have signed up to Indiegogo's reserve fund and therefore refunds are guaranteed. This just allows us to kick start at a profitable level which will mean we can invest in the customer experience straight away and ensure we can continue to explore and import from the best vineyards. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to support this project, then we would love it if you could either share this page or our instagram page if you have any friends who love sparkling wine!

story:
HISTORY

Relations between the two unique countries that share the island of Quisqueya, Haiti and the Dominican Republic, have been intense and complex. In the last few decades, the progress of the Dominican economy has inspired a strong migratory movement of unskilled Haitian workers. It is calculated that more than one million Haitian immigrants live in the Dominican Republic, representing over 15% of the population.

Historically, the immigrants have dedicated themselves to cutting sugar cane, although without documentation (passports, birth certificates, visas, etc.). The sugar cane companies have offered them cards that identify them as company workers.  With this card they receive their salary, their insurance, and the cards can also be used as valid documents in the civil registry to declare their children.

With the passing of years, some of these temporary workers have wound up creating and living their lives in a more permanent form in the sugar cane fields. Some have families, while others live alone. The latter find themselves in an especially precarious situation.

Between 60 and 70 years of age, these elders have dedicated their lives to cutting sugar cane, and now are without a pension, due to a lack of awareness of their rights, and the complexity of the formalities. They do not have the money for the multiple trips that would be required to obtain their pension. They do not speak the language of the country, and do not know how to read or write. They are asked for identification documents that were never required for their years of labor (passport, visa, etc.). Without a pension, they depend solely on their ability to work to survive.  

The clock is against them. It is only a matter of time before they become sick due to their age and their poor level of nutrition. Without family, and without work, their sicknesses become increasingly severe until they simply die without ever receiving the pension they have worked towards their whole life.

The Association 180 for Cooperation and Development has created the youth group “Jóvenes de la Milagrosa Dispuestos a Superarse (JMDS),” or the Youth of Milagrosa Willing to Overcome. The group consists of community youth members that have organized themselves in response to the most pressing needs of their community. This group has identified 382 elders without pensions. Of those, 24 are in an extremely vulnerable situation due to health and nutrition concerns. Since 2011, this group has accompanied the elders through each step of the process in order to receive their pension. Some have finalized the process, but we find ourselves at the mercy of the authorities to review and accept each individual case.

Efforts have been made to guarantee a minimum level of nutrition and access to health care services in urgent cases. These efforts are the motivation for the presentation of this project that aims to improve and guarantee a better quality of life for these elders.

Main Objective:

To improve the quality of life for the elders that are without family or support by providing food, health care, and assistance in securing a pension, so that they may live an independent life. We hope to guarantee emergency health services for the people of the batey that, due to geographic distance and/or limited resources, find themselves cut off from basic rights.

Specific Objectives:

1 – Offer basic nutrition to the 24 elders most in need of care for one year.

2- Provide basic medication in cases of health care emergencies.

3- Continue the formal process of securing pensions.

Impact:

  1. 24 elders will benefit from daily meals over the course of a year.
  2. Elders will receive assistance during health emergencies.
  3. Increased number of elders receiving pensions.

HISTORIA

La relación entre los dos únicos países que conviven en la isla de Quisqueya,  Haití y República Dominicana, ha sido intensa y compleja. En las últimas décadas, la situación de cierto progreso de la economía de República Dominicana ha fomentado un fuerte movimiento migratorio de trabajadores no cualificados haitianos. Se calcula que más de un millón de inmigrantes haitianos viven en República Dominicana, representando más del 15% de su población.

Históricamente los inmigrantes se han dedicado al corte de caña azúcar, aun sin tener ningún documentación (pasaporte, acta de nacimiento, visado…) Las empresas cañeras les han ofrecido una tarjeta que les  identifica como trabajadores de la compañía. Con está tarjeta han cobrado y cobran su salario, cotizaban al seguro e incluso han sido utilizadas como documento valido en el registro civil para declarar a sus hijos.

Con el paso de los años, algunos de estos trabajadores temporales, se han acabado instalando y viviendo de forma permanente en los cañaverales. Algunos tienen sus familias, otros viven solos. Son especialmente estos últimos los que se encuentran en una situación de mayor debilidad. 

Con edades que rondan los 60 y 70 años, habiendo dedicado toda su vida al corte de caña de azúcar, ahora no pueden cobrar su pensión. Ya sea porqué desconocen sus derechos y la complejidad de los tramites. Tampoco disponen del dinero para hacer los múltiples viajes que se requieren. No hablan el idioma del país o no saben escribir y leer. En última instancia les piden todos los documentos de identidad, que no les pidieron nunca para trabajar (pasaporte, visado…) Sin pensión dependen de su fuerza de trabajo para sobrevivir.

Se encuentran a contra reloj. Solo es cuestión de tiempo que enfermen por su edad y por su bajo nivel de alimentación. Sin familia, y sin trabajar, sus enfermedades se hacen cada vez más graves hasta que simplemente mueren sin percibir la pensión por la que han cotizado toda su vida. 

La asociación 180º para la cooperación y el desarrollo a promovido la creación del grupo Jóvenes de la Milagrosa Dispuestos a Superarse (JMDS) Se trata de jóvenes de la comunidad que se han organizado para dar respuesta a las necesidades más apremiantes de su comunidad. Dicho grupo ha identificado a 382 ancianos sin pensionar. De los cuales 24 están en una situación de extrema vulnerabilidad por su condiciones de salud y alimentación. Este grupo desde el año 2011 ha estado acompañando a todos los ancianos para realizar los tramites de pensión. Algunos de ellos han finalizado el proceso, pero nos vemos sujetos a la determinación de las autoridades para aceptar cada caso.

Por otro lado, se han hecho esfuerzos para garantizar un mínimo de alimentación y el acceso a los servicios de salud en caso de urgencias. Todos estos esfuerzos son la motivación de la presentación de este proyecto que pretende mejorar y garantizar la calidad de vida de estos ancianos.

Objetivo General:

Mejorar las condiciones de vida de los ancianos que están desprovistos de familia o de ayuda alguna, proporcionándoles  alimentación, asistiéndoles en salud y gestionarles la pensión, para que puedan llevar una vida autónoma. Garantizar el servicio de salud y emergencias a las personas de los bateyes que por su lejanía o escasez de recursos se ven privados de un derecho.

Objetivos específicos:

1- Ofrecer alimentos básicos a 24 ancianos durante un año.

2- Colaborar en emergencias de salud con medicamentos comunes.

3- Continuar los tramites de pensiones.

Impacto:

  1. 24 ancianos beneficiándose de una alimentación diaria durante un año.
  2. Ancianos recibiendo asistencia en emergencias de salud.
  3. Aumentar número de ancianos cobrando pensiones.

Con el paso de los años, algunos de estos trabajadores temporales, se han acabado instalando y viviendo de forma permanente en los cañaverales. Algunos tienen sus familias, otros viven solos. Son especialmente estos últimos los que se encuentran en una situación de mayor debilidad. 
Con edades que rondan los 60 y 70 años, habiendo dedicado toda su vida al corte de caña de azúcar, ahora no pueden cobrar su pensión. Ya sea porqué desconocen sus derechos y la complejidad de los tramites. Tampoco disponen del dinero para hacer los múltiples viajes que se requieren. No hablan el idioma del país o no saben escribir y leer. En última instancia les piden todos los documentos de identidad, que no les pidieron nunca para trabajar (pasaporte, visado…) Sin pensión dependen de su fuerza de trabajo para sobrevivir.
Se encuentran a contra reloj. Solo es cuestión de tiempo que enfermen por su edad y por su bajo nivel de alimentación. Sin familia, y sin trabajar, sus enfermedades se hacen cada vez más graves hasta que simplemente mueren sin percibir la pensión por la que han cotizado toda su vida. 
La asociación 180º para la cooperación y el desarrollo a promovido la creación del grupo Jóvenes de la Milagrosa Dispuestos a Superarse (JMDS) Se trata de jóvenes de la comunidad que se han organizado para dar respuesta a las necesidades más apremiantes de su comunidad. Dicho grupo ha identificado a 382 ancianos sin pensionar. De los cuales 24 están en una situación de extrema vulnerabilidad por su condiciones de salud y alimentación. Este grupo desde el año 2011 ha estado acompañando a todos los ancianos para realizar los tramites de pensión. Algunos de ellos han finalizado el proceso, pero nos vemos sujetos a la determinación de las autoridades para aceptar cada caso.
Por otro lado, se han hecho esfuerzos para garantizar un mínimo de alimentación y el acceso a los servicios de salud en caso de urgencias. Todos estos esfuerzos son la motivación de la presentación de este proyecto que pretende mejorar y garantizar la calidad de vida de estos ancianos.
Objetivo General:
Mejorar las condiciones de vida de los ancianos que están desprovistos de familia o de ayuda alguna, proporcionándoles  alimentación, asistiéndoles en salud y gestionarles la pensión, para que puedan llevar una vida autónoma. Garantizar el servicio de salud y emergencias a las personas de los bateyes que por su lejanía o escasez de recursos se ven privados de un derecho.
Objetivos específicos:
1- Ofrecer alimentos básicos a 24 ancianos durante un año.
2- Colaborar en emergencias de salud con medicamentos comunes.
3- Continuar los tramites de pensiones.
Impacto:

24 ancianos beneficiándose de una alimentación diaria durante un año.
Ancianos recibiendo asistencia en emergencias de salud.
Aumentar número de ancianos cobrando pensiones.
campaign_city: Bateyes de Guaymate, La Romana, Dominican Republic

story:
Our Goals

   Within this campaign, we're aiming to achieve some major goals that we hope you'll become a part of:

  • First, we're focusing on the development of Exxe's product base. This means funding the costs to develop Exxe so that it has a desired flavor and effect. We've already formed a relationship with a partner company, but we require the funding in order to move forward. $20,000 of our target goal is in order to begin this process.
  • Second, we need to establish the design standards for Exxe. This includes guaranteeing that the product meets all standards for packaging, preparation, and customer satisfaction.
  • Third, we aim to expand the name out to retailers, investors, and other sources that will help us bring the product to market.

   Overall, we want to create an awesome product that serves as the perfect solution for consumers who, on a day-to-day basis, struggle with stress or anxiety.

"How did it all start?"

   At the age of 18, I began to notice a growing trend during my time at high school and college. Many people struggle daily from stress or anxiety. Whether it be at school or at the workplace, we all seem to face it throughout our lives. But this stress can leave a serious toll on people's health and well-being. For too long, I felt like I couldn't do anything to help fight against this growing trend of stress. But during my senior year in high school, I knew it was time to make a change, and after months of research, I came up with Exxe.

"So, what exactly is Exxe?"

   For many years, many have conceived the idea that we need caffeine to empower ourselves to do the things we love. Exxe is here to change that. Many don't like the jittery feeling or the drowsy after-effect that caffeine beverages provide. Not to mention, both coffee and energy drinks are usually loaded with sugar and artificial sweeteners. This formula is a recipe for disaster when it comes to individuals who are looking to lower stress and stay healthy. That being said, Exxe offers a different approach.

   Exxe fits into a category of products known as 'relaxation beverages', which are part of an emerging market aimed towards helping the user find relaxation and lower stress. In an age of nine to five workers and schedule-filled college students, this industry serves as a prominent solution towards aiding the fight against stress and anxiety.

   The formulation beats any in the industry. Practically all relaxation beverages limit themselves to one relaxation ingredient. Exxe stands out from the industry norm, and involves a specialized combination of over three major ingredients.

   Using a variety of natural chemicals & amino acids that help improve focus, calm the mind, and overall aid you into a relaxing state, Exxe serves as a perfect replacement. Exxe contains healthy dosages of each chemical, along with monk fruit, a natural, zero calorie sweetener. Here's a list of the main ingredients found in Exxe:

   Not only do we believe in building a quality product that helps you relax, but we also want to bring a sense of purpose behind the product. Exxe is centered around the idea of relaxation and lowering stress, a frequent problem in today's world.

   That being said, we're committing over 10% of profits from sales towards mental health research; more than any other relaxation beverage on the market. Exxe isn't the ultimate solution towards ridding society of anxiety and stress. To truly solve this problem, we must get to the root cause. That being said, we want to commit towards doing our part.

   Are your taste buds curious? If so, Exxe has you covered. We've planned three different flavors for the formulation pipeline. Each contains a different approach at finding your sense of relaxation. So far, we only plan to offer one flavor at launch. However, if we can reach our stretch goals, the process of developing the other two flavors can happen at a much faster rate, and we will be able to offer them as well at launch.

Stretch Goals

   We're have set our goal towards raising $25,000, but we are prepared to raise more. If we do raise above our set goal, we will work towards further improving Exxe in the following ways:

Stretch Goal #1 ($30,000):
  • A new, professional website design to improve our online appearance.

Stretch Goal #2 ($60,000):

  • Merchandise will become available on the website. We will offer t-shirts and posters to start, but there's a possibility that we could expand our horizons.
  • How does a new flavor sound? If reached, we'll include a new flavor at launch.

Stretch Goal #3 ($100,000): 

  • How about a third flavor? Just like our previous stretch goal, if met, we'll develop a third flavor ready for launch.
  • This amount will officially give us enough to mass manufacture and distribute to nationwide retailers.

Can't Donate, But Still Looking To Help?

No worries! We appreciate the fact that you're behind our idea. There are many ways you can contribute to our cause.

  • Feel free to spread our name & campaign through friends, family, and various social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.).
  • We'd deeply appreciate it if you could like and share our social media pages.
  • If you get the chance, provide feedback on our idea. We always love to hear outside opinions!

Overall, thank you so much for checking out our project, and we hope you'll stand behind us in revolutionizing the beverage industry to help millions of Americans who deal with stress every day.
