story:
Short Summary

Hello! My name is Josanne Carmino and for years my husband and I  have dreamed of setting up our very own ice cream shop.  Finally, we took the first steps of turning this dream into reality. We both quit our day jobs! This was a very exciting moment for us. We were finally living our dream of owning a successful ice cream business.

I want your help to turn our small ice cream shop into a bustling business that will one day become a globally recognized brand. I am passionate and determined to achieve this goal.

What We Need to Help Build Our Dream

 

We are looking to raise $45,000 for our ice cream shop. Here is how the funds would be used. Before we even consider upgrading our current equipment we want to start by upgrading ourselves.

In my country(Trinidad), unfortunately there are no courses to further enhance our knowledge in the ice cream industry.

With your help, we can attend the :

 

This 2 part course will cover all the fundamentals in making Gelato Ice Cream and the Business Course will cover all aspects of successfully running a frozen desert business. This course will equip us with the relevant knoweledge to help us expand our brand.

Please see link below for more info on courses:

https://www.gelatouniversity.com/usa/home

 

After the completion of the course, funds will also be used to set up a small cafe to better serve our customers.

 

The Impact

With your contribution, we will grow larger and what that means is:

  • We'll be able to create more jobs, first locally, then internationally
  • There will be thousands of smiles of happy customers, who buy our product
  • Once we are big enough, we want to give back and invest in sustainability around the world.

Risks & Challenges

Entrepreneurship is never easy and there will be difficulties on our path, but we are determined like never before and our passion is fueling us to strive continuously every day to make a difference and overcome the obstacles. 

Your Reward for Helping Us

We can all agree that the world needs some more inspiration right? Our main aim is to bring as much inspiration into the lives of others in the simplest way possible. We wanted to gift you with everyday items that some of us might overlook but it can help to bring added appreciation and gratitude into our lives.

We all go into our refrigerators on a day to to day basis so how about getting a daily reminder to make the best out of each day. A simple button on our clothing can help someone else to see how awesome they are and remind yourself each time you look in the mirror.

Our gifts to you all come from talented artists and designers who crafted each gift as an expression of their love.

 Our featured perk is from a teenage artist whose dream is to go Tyler School of Art for college. Your contribution goes a long way in not only helping us to build our dream but you help all the designers and artists build their dreams also with each purchase of their product.

In return for helping us, we shall reward you as follows:

  • For a small contribution of just $20 you receive a "You are Truly Amazing" button as a reminder of your awesomeness and a heartfelt "Thank You" letter from the CEO Josanne Carmino.
  • For a  $150 contribution, you will be added in our Hall of Fame and also you'll get the finest imported Belgium Chocolate Box sourced directly from Belgium. Do I hear yummmmm!

So please support us and help create prosperity and a positive change in the world!

story:
Short Summary

WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE PART OF THE FUTURE, DO A POSITIVE IMPACT AND BE PART OF THE COMMUNITY?

We aim to provide communities with a platform, where they can share, taste, monetize, and explore their unique culinary experiences with family, friends, colleagues, strangers, or those in need!

We are a startup of 4 founders based in Stockholm, Sweden, but individually we have a different background, but we all have the same intentions to:

  • CONNECT COMMUNITIES THROUGH FOOD
  • SAVE FOOD, HELP THE PLANET
  • START SAVING DELICIOUS SURPLUS FOOD
  • CREATING REAL CHANGE

Each co-founder is a different nationality (1x Sweden/Kuwait, 1x Czech, 2x India), for the last year we have been working remotely, building a startup remotely was a huge rollercoaster, but we can't be prouder how we got here. 

Two founders already have previous entrepreneurial experience, one founder has a successful entrepreneurial experience, against all odds, he managed to build taxijakt.se while fighting the Goliath (Uber and Bolt).

 

What Do We Need To Make The Change?

We aim for 150,000 EUR 

  • For that, we are planning to build a new Web App and Native App Development (80k EUR)
  • Partner-up with Cloud Kitchens (give chefs an opportunity to rent-out a real kitchen) - (We will pay the first month as a trial period: 10k EUR) 
  • Starter Packages for chefs (meal boxes - to pack their meals in, apron, brochure, mask, plastic gloves) (5k EUR) 
  • Delivery Solution Partnership (Will be ECO, already partnered up with weride.nu) (5k EUR)
  • Marketing and Operations (50k EUR)

For that amount, we will be able to build a truly unique platform with exciting features. We already have the Development Proposal with requirements. 

The platform will include the following features: 

  • Timelapse video (1min timelapse video, sequences during the cooking, the user then can see, how the meal was prepared in a quick video - just like Tiktok or IG reels!) 
  • Streaming (Chefs can stream through the time they cook! Chefs during their cooking period can stream themselves - do you also miss going through the food market and seeing all the great meals come together?) 
  • Verification process (Smooth, not-annoying, quick on-boarding process for chefs)
  • Shout-out feature (If you are hungry, raise hungry requests and chefs nearby will send you their offers)
  • Donation option (Buy a meal to a homeless shelter, partnered up with food-banks)
  • Partners/Affiliate program (Home Chefs, Bloggers, Farmers, Restaurants can register)
  • Home-restaurant (Add staff account, you can have a dedicated driver that will deliver meals for you!) 
  • Live-chat between the chef and hungry user
  • Live Map location tracking

Full list here

 

The Impact - Building Communities

People and communities are being polarized each day, we are sending people to Mars, yet over 800 million people go to bed with an empty stomach, yet we are in an economic recession, where thousands of restaurants go bankrupt each day and tens of thousands of people lose them jobs.

Let's give equal opportunities to everyone! Allow anyone to share and monetize their meal or food! 

It's hard for a regular person that has its own production to get recognized in a supermarket, allow them to give you products made with love, that are local and paints a smile at the end of the day!

Eat local. Eat affordable. Eat healthy. Waste less.

Risks & Challenges

We do always get a question and doubts regarding hygiene and how can we ensure the food from the chefs fulfills certain hygiene standards and how the local authorities are opened towards this idea? 

That was always our threat and priority at the same time. Nevertheless, thanks to our strict onboarding process, and rating system (just like Uber and Airbnb) we can provide the consumers with the same safety as any other restaurant. Individuals do value their business, quality, and transparency even more as their head depends on that. 

The community has been here ever since and soon if there's someone in your community that does not behave well, it will get quickly out there! Just out of curiosity, go to the Facebook marketplace, write "Food" and see how many people try to sell food out there, without even being permitted!  Therefore, in the end, we are a credible source of home-made dishes!

In Plate Hero, when on-boarding chefs, we do ask them for 7 photos of their kitchen, including their ID and signature meal. We do have a 30-minutes brief call with them to get them to know even better and see if they have the right intentions.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate any kind of help! We aim to make an impact all over the world, but without your help, it will take us longer! 

We would love you to be part of our ambassador program, spread the word, and love in your region and we will make sure to support you as much as we can, so the communities can be united and share the great moments at the table together!

Share the campaign with your friends, family, colleagues, neighbors so we can be soon in your city too! 

Once we plan to expand to your city, we know who to let to know!

story:
Overview

FreshOrganic is an online store, headquartered in Spain, and dedicated to offering our clients only organic food, from farmers and producers certified organic by their local authorities in Europe.

Become a member to obtain discounts of up to 50% on all of our products.

In this IndieGoGo campaign, you have a unique possibility to obtain a lifetime FreshOrganic membership which will not be available after the end of this campaign. 

Why FreshOrganic

We have gathered the best and healthiest organic products from all over Europe on one multilingual online platform which is accessible to everyone.

Did you know …

that the food industry uses many chemical and synthetic additives to produce the food we eat and the food we feed our children?

Such ingredients are used for many different reasons. For example: preservatives are used to prevent products from going bad, growth hormones make animals grow faster, antibiotics are used on livestock to eradicate illnesses and sicknesses, and GMO is used to give plants traits which don't occur naturally; there are many more such uses.

But these synthetic additives pose many health risks, as they are made in laboratories from chemicals which are damaging to our health. Preservatives are linked to breathing problems, asthma and bronchitis. GMO products contribute to the development of cancer. Artificial colourings can cause cancer and aggressiveness in children. Pesticides have links to blindness and can even cause death. Flavour enhancers can cause nausea and breathing problems.

Hence FreshOrganic.

How it works

FreshOrganic’s online store has been designed to be as simple as possible for our clients´ convenience. Go on FreshOrganic.org, choose the desired products and we will deliver them to your doorstep anywhere in the world.

What we offer

FreshOrganic.org offers a wide variety of organic products, including:

Baby care

Beauty products

Body care

Canned food

Charcuterie

Cheese

Coffee

Dried foods

Drinks

Home products

Hygiene

Oils

Pickles

Snacks

Superfoods

Sweets

Tea

How we created our network

Before the pandemic we traveled throughout Europe and met many organic suppliers, including farmers and producers. We researched their production methods and made sure they followed the guidelines for ultimate organic production.

This way we created a network of organic suppliers who can be found in our FreshOrganic.org online store.

Background of the FreshOrganic project

The project was co-founded by brothers Mikhail and Andrey Yasenyavskiy. Mikhail studied architecture at the Politecnico di Milano. Andrey studied international politics at Bocconi, Milano. Both have researched the production methods of the conventional food industry and decided to revolutionize it. This led to the concept of FreshOrganic. As they had previously worked together, Mikhail and Andrey asked their friends to join the team in order to bring the FreshOrganic idea to life. Having created a synergy of four people, the project FreshOrganic obtained its shape and was ready to launch.

Our FreshOrganic Membership

We have developed a project through which organic products are affordable for everyone. Organic farming is a process which requires a lot of effort and special technologies. Labour input is high, and output is low in relation to the demand. Therefore organic products come at a higher price than conventional products of the food industry. The modern food industry uses this factor to markup prices on organic food very sharply in order to increase margins. This makes healthy products unaffordable for most people.

We have decided to take a stance on this issue. We provide organic food at prices which are affordable for everyone.

And for only 99 EUR you can become a FreshOrganic member for a year and receive discounts of up to 50% on all products.

Consider the magnitude of what your contributions will help to achieve

We are thankful to our backers in advance for their extraordinary support which will give us the opportunity to stock up on organic products and start to bring joy to FreshOrganic.org customers by supplying tasty and especially healthy food.

Risks

Our risks lie in the fact that our suppliers are small organic farmers and producers and are producing small quantities of quality product. We run the risk that demand might be higher than supply, and we do not want to lower our production standards in order to produce more quickly and in larger quantities.

In that case we would increase our organic suppliers network, thus offering our clients an even larger variety of healthy organic produce.

Challenges

Our biggest challenge is to battle the conventional food industry which uses poison in the food it produces and puts at risk the health of its customers.

The conventional food industry invests billions of dollars in pretty but unhealthy products; overcoming this competition will only be possible with your help.

Support us to be part of a movement which fights for a greener planet and a healthier world!

Organic farmers will receive our support to the fullest extent to enable them to offer their produce to global consumers. Organic farmers and producers need FreshOrganic and we need you for a healthier and greener future.

We try harder and are ready to work for the good of humanity.

How much money we need and for what

For a successful project launch we require a total of 25 000 EUR.

This is needed for our first stock-up of organic products. This is a small amount but we see it as necessary to start FreshOrganic and fulfil our responsibilities to our backers.

We hope that our fundraiser will surpass our goal, which will enable us to begin with more possibilities and a larger stock.

In any case, our backers will receive the perks they choose. Our goal is to satisfy our customers’ needs and wants for healthy and organic food.

Other ways you can help

If you are unable to back our project you still have the option to share our campaign on social media. You will contribute to our success by spreading the word about this green project. FreshOrganic relies on you!
story_txt: OverviewFreshOrganic is an online store, headquartered in Spain, and dedicated to offering our clients only organic food, from farmers and producers certified organic by their local authorities in Europe.Become a member to obtain discounts of up to 50% on all of our products.In this IndieGoGo campaign, you have a unique possibility to obtain a lifetime FreshOrganic membership which will not be available after the end of this campaign. Why FreshOrganicWe have gathered the best and healthiest organic products from all over Europe on one multilingual online platform which is accessible to everyone.Did you know … that the food industry uses many chemical and synthetic additives to produce the food we eat and the food we feed our children?Such ingredients are used for many different reasons. For example: preservatives are used to prevent products from going bad, growth hormones make animals grow faster, antibiotics are used on livestock to eradicate illnesses and sicknesses, and GMO is used to give plants traits which don't occur naturally; there are many more such uses.But these synthetic additives pose many health risks, as they are made in laboratories from chemicals which are damaging to our health. Preservatives are linked to breathing problems, asthma and bronchitis. GMO products contribute to the development of cancer. Artificial colourings can cause cancer and aggressiveness in children. Pesticides have links to blindness and can even cause death. Flavour enhancers can cause nausea and breathing problems.Hence FreshOrganic.How it worksFreshOrganic’s online store has been designed to be as simple as possible for our clients´ convenience. Go on FreshOrganic.org, choose the desired products and we will deliver them to your doorstep anywhere in the world.What we offerFreshOrganic.org offers a wide variety of organic products, including:Baby careBeauty productsBody careCanned foodCharcuterieCheeseCoffeeDried foodsDrinksHome productsHygieneOilsPicklesSnacksSuperfoodsSweetsTeaHow we created our networkBefore the pandemic we traveled throughout Europe and met many organic suppliers, including farmers and producers. story:
Short Summary

 

My name is Bob Bottieri and I am an artist.I'm a painter,Production Designer for film and most recently a distiller. It is said that distilling is 75% science and 25% art. It is that 25% that Intrigues me. We at One Foot Crow approach the craft as an art form.

We have worked hard and have overcome a variety of challenges both financial and bureaucratic but now our goal is in sight. We are down to the details. The bottles,the pumps and hoses, the final finishes to our tasting room. Contributions can take us there and are the final puffs in our balloon.

We have set a goal of 24,000.00. Any part of this goal will be helpful in bringing our dream to fruition. All contributions over 75.00 will receive a 500ml bottle of our 100 Proof spirits, either Vodka or Gin. Contributors of 700.00 or more will receive a case of twelve 500ml bottles.

As with any business venture, there are risks. That we will produce a fantastic product is not in question. The challenge will be in bringing our products to market. We do have a vigorous campaign in mind. We plan to market in Japan, where both Canadian spirits and black food and drinks enjoy a great deal of popularity.

story:
Hi! My name is Sebastien and I am a serious tea lover. I usually use tea bags to brew my tea. But as I am a bit clumsy and obsessive about cleanliness in the same time, this operation often turns into a disaster: all of the teabag falling into the mug when pouring in water or when I try to squeeze it, droplets of tea falling on the counter when I lift the tea bag out of the mug to throw it out…

 

I did try to use some kitchen gadgets to make things easier and avoid this special moment to be wasted. The problem is that it makes extra dishes: I need one to stir the tea, then another to squeeze the teabag and a caddy to store it. As this magic tool didn’t exist, I decided to create it!

So Teanoops was born: to bring a practical solution for all the tea lovers out there by eliminating the mess teabags leave when brewing tea.

 

Tea time! Teanoops could avoid tea tag to fall into the cup when pouring in hot water:

 

Once your tea has steeped, simply lift the teabag over your cup and straddle the string parallel with the handle. Then wrap the string around by threading it through the lateral notch. This will squeeze the teabag into the cup so it doesn’t drip everywhere. 

 

The handle end is designed to keep a drop of tea when taking out Teanoops from the mug. When you place the tag of the teabag onto the hole, it absorbs into the tag and makes sure it stays stuck on the tool.

 

When you put the stirrer down on the counter, the only two parts in contact with the surface are both dry. This includes the upper part of the spoon and the handle end that is covered with the teabag label. This means that the table and counter remain clean.

 

The first goal of this campaign is to finance the manufacturing of the plastic injection mold. I managed to ensure the development of Teanoops until now, but the rest can’t be done without the support of the Indiegogo community. The success of this campaign is therefore an essential step in to bring Teanoops to life. At the same time, we keep working on the packaging and website.

 

If you like this campaign, you can share it on social networks by clicking the links below. Your support is extremely important as nothing could be done without your help, thank you so much!

 

 

Risks and challenges:

I've been working on this project for more than two years so I had the time to review all the aspects and to find solution for each problem. Technically speaking, Teanoops is a quite simple product to industrialize as it is composed of one piece of plastic without electronic component or programming. 
I also already have the quote of the supplier and this one is a very reliable partner working with big names in the food industry including a Swiss group specialized in coffee. Yes, what else? So, I am confident regarding to the quality of the final product.

story:
Beef Jerky is perferct for soldiers! It's the ultimate trail food and a complete delicious protein

Israel is a young country surrounded by hostile neighbors, and  sadly, since its establishment, has been forced to maintain a compulsory army service. Our humble strip of holy earth is every citizen's front lawn and back yard, and  At the age of eighteen, every young man and woman is called on to enlist, rather than go off to college or travel the world.

I branded my beef jerky company "Field Rations" as a satirical, but positive twist named after the box of canned food preserves that Israeli soldiers eat when in the field. Imagine for a moment that you are with your closest comrades, in a field, in a thorn bush, on a hostile border, for weeks at a time, eating nothing but tuna, canned beans, peanuts, and sesame halva. Now imagine how much your quality of life and marale would improve with a portion of beef jerky. 

I want to put a pack of natural handcrafted beef jerky and in the hands of every soldier I can, because it’s delicious, fun, and packed full of protein. Did I mention that Field Rations are free of sodium nitrate, sugar, gluten, and soy, instead are full of indigenous Israeli spices and sweet date honey?

In order to make this goal a reality I need your help to jump start my company by sponsoring at least one pack for one IDF soldier - Back it for $7

My name is Chaim Davids. I'm a Chef, husband, father of two, and lover of Israel and the Jewish people.

I've always wanted to build a life in the land of my heritage, and finally at the age of twenty seven i packed my bags and moved from the US to Israel.  Absorbing into a country with a strong army fraternity like culture after the draft age, encouraged me to catch up quickly and acclimate myself in other ways. I spent several years cooking, traveling and studying until i discovered my greatest culinary passion - creating delicious fun, and functional food products that tap into the pulse of different elements in israeli culture.

My newest project "Manot Krav", or in English - "Field Rations" brand Beef Jerky, was born from recognizing a gap in the niche market, and wanting to fill it properly with goods and goodwill. That's why I’m smoking and marketing the meanest beef jerky in the region, and dedicating 10% of our campaign profits after the target goal to lone soldiers, specifically to our partners at The Lone Soldier Center in memory of Michael Levin.

Beef jerky is a common product in America, securing shelf space in  gas stations and gourmet markets in every city and state. In Israel however, this American classic is still far behind in trend.

You can Back this campaign for only $7 and put a pack of beef jerky in the hands of an IDF lone soldier.
